khat-um David sapa Jisu Christa, pilepu ngai ramingrui kha hingaihi eii.
Abraham in Isaac anei; Isaac in Jacob anei, Jacob in Judah khat-um ama unai ngai anei;
Halli Judah le anumei Tamar in Pharez khat-um Zerah innei, Pharez in Hezron anei, Hezron in Ram anei,
Ram in Amminadab anei, Amminadab in Nahshon anei, Nahshon in Salmon anei,
Salmon li Rahab in Boaz innei, Boaz li Ruth in Obed innei, Obed in Jesse anei,
khat-um Jesse in Reng David anei. Uriah numei leika-e kha David in aneiya Solomon inleinei;
Solomon in Rehoboam anei, Rehoboam in Abijah anei, halli Abijah in Asa anei,
Asa in Jehoshaphat anei, Jehoshaphat in Joram anei, Joram in Uzziah anei,
Uzziah in Jotham anei, Jotham in Ahaz anei, Ahaz in Hezekiah anei,
Hezekiah in Manasseh anei, halli Manasseh in Amon anei, Amon in Josiah anei,
halli Josiah in Jechoniah le a-u anai ngaikha Babylonna raalringnga insurra inruoi pheiweikhan inleinei.
Halli Babylonna inruoi suonuk Jechoniah in Shealtiel anei khat-um Shealtiel in Zerubbabel anei,
Zerubbabel in Abiud anei, halli Abiud in Eliakim anei, Eliakim in Azor anei,
Azor in Zadok anei, khat-um Zadok in Achim anei, halli Achim in Eliud anei,
Eliud in Eleazar anei, khat-um Eleazar in Matthan anei, halli Matthan in Jacob anei,
halli Jacob in Mary ruothar Joseph anei, Mary hi Christa Jisu nu eii.
Khanthoa, Abraham makheiya David katunghi khang soomleimili eii, David makheiya Babylon raalringnga inruoi katung khang soomleimili eii, khat-um khamakheiya Messiah innei katung khang soomleimili eii.
Jisu Christa hi hinthoa inleinei. Anu Mary hi Joseph sik ah inleibiak, takkha inmani moi inruoima, Ratha Inthiangnga inphut ama'n nai awonjei ti inleijetjei.
Aruothar Joseph hi mikatha akatuun katho miring inkhat ejarra, ama'n Mary hi mipui maikuungnga minjakzoot mak ah ruuk ah inthenpui nasik alei-ngaidon.
Ama'n hiwa jarra angaidon laikhan, Pumi marwaan tirton inkhat ama ramangnga inlarra ati, “David sapa Joseph, nanumei Mary hi kaneisik chimaro. Ama naiwon hi Ratha Inthiangnga inphut eii.
Ama'n sapa inkhat aneisik eii, halli nang in araming Jisu tia naphuo sik eii, ajarchu ama'n ami ngaikha inmanu ah inphut akatansik eii.”
Pumi khan Pathian chongkachoi ngai diangnga ileiril ngaikha inthiangnga atungnasik hiwa rakip hi tuun asuokjei.
“Enru, inthiang nungaak inkhat in nai lawonta sapa inkhat aneisik eii, halli ama ramingkha Immanuel tia inkoi sik eii” (hiwa tinachu, “Einile kaom suom Pathian tina eii”).
Joseph in ahong inthei pha Pumi marwaan tirton ileiti angnga ama'n Mary kha anumeiya aneijei.
Takkha Mary in sapa kha aneimak laiseng khan Joseph in amale lei-inchunpui mak, halli Joseph in ama raming kha Jisu tia aleiphuo jei.
Herod in Reng achanglai, Judea ramsuungnga kaom Bethlehem khuopuiya Jisu hi innei suopha, nisuo tiangnga arsi larik kathei mi ngaikhan Jerusalemma inhongnga,
inhongrakel, “Jihudi ngai sik ah innei reng naiteii kha hun omme? Ajarchu keini'n nisuo tiangnga ama arsi kha kinmu khat-um keini ama chubei kathosik ah kinhong eii.”
Reng Herod in hiwa chonghi ajetpha, amale Jerusalemma kaom miring rakip inmalung aleipoong.
Ama'n thiampu kalian rakiple dan karu ngaikha akoichunna inmani diang, “Christa hunme inneisik?” tia aleirakel.
Inmani'n amadiang inleimasang, “Judea ramma kaom Bethlehem khuopui khan eiiz” “Ajarchu Pathian chongkachoipa khan hintia aleimajia:
‘E Judah ramma kaom Bethlehem, Nangchu Judah Reng waikaroon ngai karra akasiinkhet kha emakche; ajarchu kami Israel ngai lamkakei inkhat kha Nang diangnga inphut alahongsuok sik eii.’ ”
Khawa jarra Herod in nisuo tiangnga kasing-kathei ngaikha ruuk ah akoiya angtikpha tak khanme khawa Arsi kha kasuok tikha inmani diang katha ah ajetjei.
Khawasuo khan ama'n inmani kha Bethlehem tiang aleitirra, “Nangni'n si-inlang naiteii jarra katha ah entok inlang ningmu pha kei um kasiya chubei katho nasik keidiang naminjetru aleiti.”
Inmani'n Rengchong kha inrangaiya insijei, halli enru, nisuo tiangnga inleimu arsi khan naiteii omna chungnga ahongngir maklaiseng inmani matiang asijei.
Inmani'n arsi kha inmupha, karok khan aleisip.
Inmani'n Innsuung kha inluut ah, naiteii khan anu Mary le inleiom inmupha, kemurkhup inthep ah inmani'n chubei inleithoa inkutchoi ngai inmalongnga, Soonna, Berou, khat-um myrrh, inkeisuoa amadiang kutchoi inleipeii.
Khawasuo khan Pathian in inmani kha Herod diang kirkhaimaru tia inramangnga aminjet ah inmani'n lam khattiang inrouwa inramtiang inleikirjei.
Inmani'n inmathaanna insi suonuk, enru, Pumi marwaan tirton inkhat Joseph ramangnga inlarra ati, “Intheiro, naiteii khat-um anu ruoi-inlang, Egypt tiang taanru, kei'n khawa munkha mathaanru katimak laiseng khawakhan omru, ajarchu Herod in naiteii kha thatnasik ah ahong entoksik eii.”
Joseph in zaankhan intheiya, naidoong le anu kha aruoiya, Egypt tiang inleisijei,
Pumi'n Pathian chongkachoipa diangnga iril kha, “Kei'n Kasapa kha Egypt makheiya kakoi” tikha huuitungnasik Khawa munkhan Herod thimaklaiseng aleiom.
Halli Herod in nisuo tiangnga kasing-kathei ngai'n ama diang maleisei innathojei ti ajetpha, araangtheiya, arsi larik kathei ngaidiang inthiangnga ijet dungjuiya Bethlehem khat-um akoolla kaom ramsuungnga pasal naiteii kumni makheiya nuoitiangnga kaom rakip hi chong apeya aleimithat.
Hinthoa Pathian chongkachoi Jeremiah ileiti kha huuitungjei:
“Ramah ah rasa inkhat inleijet, khawa kha kapoongthei kachap rasa eii. Rachel in asa ngaisik achap; ama kha matheemtai matormu, ajarchu inmani inthisuojei.”
Herod thisuo nuk, enru, Egypt ah Pumi marwaan tirton inkhat in Joseph ramangnga inlarra ati,
“Intheiro, naiteii li anu kha ruoi inlang, Israel ramtiang heikirtaro, ajarchu naiteii kha thatsik katho inmani ngaikha inthijei.”
Khawa jarra Joseph intheiya, naiteii li anu aruoiya, Israel ramtiang inheikirjei.
Takkha Joseph in Archelaus hi apa Herod rathuulla Judea Reng ejeiti ajet ah, khawa munkhan kasisik aleichi. Halli Pathian in aramangnga kheella amindik ah ama'n Galilee ram khattiang aleisijei,
Pathian chongkachoi ngai'n inleiril, “Amahi Nazareth mi intisik eii” intikha huuitungnasik ah Ama'n Nazareth inti khuopui khan ahong-omjei.
Khawapha takkhan John Baptist in Judea neelramma aheisuok ah chongril aleiphut,
“Manu ah inphut ningmalung thuultaru,” “Ajarchu marwaan Rengram kha anaijei!”
Ajarchu Pathian chongkachoi Isaiah in ileiril kha, “Neelram ah Mi inkhat in akheek, ‘Nangni Pumi sik ah lam boolru; Ama lamkha mintuunru!’ ” tia irilkha John hi eii,
John apumtak Salaileem mulla inbool puondiar aleitho; ama'n sawun koongkhit akoongnga aleikhit, halli ama bak-inchu khaisor li ram khuoining alei eii.
Jerusalemma inphut, Judea rampumpui, khat-um Jordan Tuidung sirra kaom mipuingai amadiang inleihong.
Inmani'n inmanu inrilsuok ah, khat-um ama'n inmani Jordanna baptize aleitho.
John in Pharisee le Sadducee ngai baptize thonasik inheiwa amupha khan, inmani diang ama'n ati, “Nangni Maruul sangai akahongsik Pathian rachaakna akajuosik makheiya taanru tia tu-in nangnidiang narilpiya me?
Manu ah inphut ningmalung thuulna kanaminmu sik chuon ngaikha thoru,
Keini kinpu Abraham om keengnga poongraalna ah inphut taansuok mator kinte ti-inlang ngaidonmaru, ajarchu kei'n nangni diang kati, Pathian in hiwa lung ngaihin Abraham sangai amin eii mator!
Tuuntak hin thingkuung ngaikha tukpur nasik rei kha insuuk ah omjei; khawa jarra kara katha kakaramak thingkuung rakip kha intuk khiak ah mei suungnga indeeng luutsik eii.
Malung thuulna jarra kei'n nangni tuiya baptize kanatho, takkha kei kanuk ah akajuopa khachu keineek ah alok, keichu ama Hureikhaang kachoi sik um rahoi suokmong, Ama inchu nangni Ratha Inthiang li meiya baptize anathosik eii.
Ama'n saangzaapna kha akut ah achoi khat-um asaang kha inthiangnga zaapthiangta Ama'n saang ngaikha asapang suungnga athunsik eii, takkha arasi ngaikha akathimak mei suungnga adeengluut sik eii.”
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n Galilee makheiya John diang Baptize intho nasik Jordan katung aleihong.
Takkha John in zootmak ah aheiti, “Nang in kei kha baptize nanatho sik keeng,” “takkha nang in keidiang nahong bejei?”
Halli Jisu'n aleimasang, “Tuunna sikchu nazootpi diro, ajarchu Pathian imanuom rakip kha hintho ah eini'n nithosik eii.” khawa jarra John in aleizootpi jei.
Jisu baptize atholi, tui makheiya ahongsuok jei, halli marwaan kha inlongjei, halli Pathian Ratha kha wathu angnga juochumma ama chungnga ajuochong kha aleimu,
Halli marwaanna inphut rasa inkhat in ajuoti, “Hiwahi kei'n kiminriang khet kasapa kha eii, ama chungnga kamalung atai.”
Khawasuo Ratha khan Jisu kha neelramma Seitan in matheem nasik aruoi jei.
Halli suun li zaan nisoommili bu angeipha, Jisu awon ahongchaam jei.
Akathamak Seitan khan ama diang ahongli ati, “Nang Pathian Sapa kha na-e inchu, hiwa lung ngaihi waipool uolru ti-inlang chong pero.”
Takkha Jisu'n aleimasang, “Chong inthiang in ati, ‘Waipool bitkhan miring ngai'n ring matormu, takkha Pathian murra kasuok chongramol ngaikhan inring sik eii.’ ”
Khawasuo khan akathamak Seitan in Jisu hi Inthiang Khuopui khan aruoiya, Biak-inn insaangkhet chungnga aminngirra,
ama diang ati, “Nang Pathian Sapa kha na-e inchu, natheinuo ah inchoomthaak ro, ajarchu chong inthiang in aril, ‘Pathian in nang jarra ama tirton ngaidiang chongpeii apesik eii; nakeii kha lungnga intook maknasik, inmani'n nangkha naleipom inte.’ ”
Jisu'n ama diang amasang, “Hiwahi um chong inthiang in ati, ‘Nang in Napumi Pathian kha madan in enmaro.’ ”
Khawasuo khan akathamak Seitan in insaangtak chingbungnga aruoiya nuoipilchung rengram rakip le inmani rakip poina ngaikha ama diang aleiminmu.
“Nang in keihi kemurkhup thep ah chubei nanatho inchu,” “Kei'n hiwangai rakip hi nang kanapesik eii” Seitan in ati.
Khawapha Jisu'n aleimasang, “Siro, Seitan! chong inthiang in ati, ‘Napumi Pathian bitkha chubei thoro halli sepa thoro!’ ”
Khawapha akathamak Seitan khan Jisu kha alei mathaanjei; halli marwaan tirton ngai'n injuo ah ama kha inleisanjei.
John hi mikhumna ah indajei ti Jisu'n ajetpha, Galilee tiang aleisijei.
Ama'n Nazareth amathaanna, Zebulun li Naphtali ram Galilee tuidiil koolla kaom khuopui Capernaumma asiya ajuo omjei.
Hiwahi Pathian chongkachoi Isaiah diangnga ileiminril kha huui tungna eii,
“Zebulun ram li Naphtali ram, tuipui lamma kaom Jordan raalkhat tiang, Zaatlop ngai ram, Galilee!
Aziingna ah leikaom miring ngai'n war kalok kha inmujei. halli thina raliim ramma kaom ngai chungnga war kha ajuowar jei.” iti kha huui tungnasik eii.
“Ningmalung thuulru, ajarchu marwaan Rengram kha anaijei!” iti achong kha khawa pha makheiya Jisu'n karil aphut jei.
Jisu'n Galilee tuidiil khamma aheiwapha, Peter intia inkoi Simon khat-um anaipa Andrew, ama'n unai inni tuidiil khan leen inwor kha aleimu, ajarchu inmani kha ngakasur in eii.
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Heiwaru, kei najuiru, halli kei'n nangni mi kasur naminchu kate.”
Khawapha takkhan inleen inda ah anuk inleijui jei.
Ama'n hin aheiwapha unai inni khat, James le John, Zebedee sa ngai, inpa Zebedee le inruoiya rakuong inkhat ah, inmani leen inboolla in-om aleimu, halli Jisu'n inmani aleikoi,
Khawapha takkhan inmani inrakuong khat-um inpa inda ah, ama nuk injuijei.
Khawasuo Jisu'n Galilee rampumpui khan asi ah synagogue ngaikhan aleiminchu, halli rengram jarra Chongkahoi ngai arilpiya, rirai rakip karoon mi ngai khat-um kanangai aleimindam.
Ama jarra chongngai hi Syria rampumpui kha alei-inthang jei, khawa jarra mi ngai'n ama diang akana, rirai rakip kana ah kapoong ngai: ratha kathamak kaluut, rikei karoon, apang kathi rakip inhong ruoiya Jisu'n inmani rakip kha aleimindam jei.
Galilee le Khuo Soom tiya injet (decapolis), Jerusalem, Judea, khat-um Jordan ram raaltiangnga inphut mipui katamtak in ama nuk inleijuijei.
Jisu'n mipui ngaikha amuli chingtiang khan akaljei, halli in-ongnga ompha, Ama siamruoi ngai'n akoolla inlei-inchun,
halli ama'n inmani kha kaminchu aphut jei:
“Ratha ah kasuol kin-eii ti kajet ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu Marwaan Rengram hi inmanita eii.”
“Malung kapoong ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu Pathian in inmani alaminhoi sik eii.”
“Malung kadai ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu nuoipilchung hi inmanita esik asuok.”
“Chuon katuun sikbit ah wonchaam tuikaraal ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu Pathian in inmani kha alaminkhop sik eii.”
“Minriang kajet ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu Pathian in inmani diang aminriang sik eii.”
“Malung inthiang ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu inmani'n Pathian kha inlamusik eii.”
“Hoina daina sik ah chuonkatho ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu inmani kha Pathian sangai tia akoisik eii.”
“Chuonkatuun jarra inrachaak ngaikha rawaan intha; ajarchu Marwaan Rengram hi inmanita eii.”
“Kei jarra mi ngai'n nangni innaran khat-um innarachaak, halli nangni chungnga kathamak rakip innanoon jei inchu nangni ningrawaan atha.”
Hoiru khat-um rokru, ajarchu marwaanna nangnisik chuonthoman kalok kha inda, ajarchu nangni matiangnga leikaom Pathian chongkachoi ngaikha hinthoa inleirachaak.
“Nangnichu nuoipilchung machi kha ning eii. Takkha machi khan al makjei inchu, khawa kha angtho-thoa nimin-al sik me? khawakha kalekjuonna mi ngai keiiya intou eleiya iteii um anemna ommakjei.”
“Nangnichu nuoipilchung pumpui war kha ning eii. Chingnga insak khuopui kha thup thamak.”
Mi ngai'n sariakmei kha inminkaili kok nuoiya damu; khawa rathuulla sariakmei kechungnga indali, innsuungnga kaom mirakip munasik inminwar.
Kha angnga mi ngai'n nangni chountho katha kha inmuwa marwaanna kaom ning Pa kha minpaak nasik nangni war kha mi ngai maikuungnga warrase.
“Kei'n Moses Dan khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngai chongkha kaminmang sik kijuo eii tia ngaidonmaru, keichu kaminmang kijuo emong, takkha khawa ngai huui kamintung kijuo eii.”
Ajarchu kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiril hi eii. Marwaan li nuoipil ahek maklaiseng, Dan chongramol kasiin khet emakli wiarkhat bit um hiwarakip atungmaklaiseng inmangnuni.
Khawa jarra, tuka-ang inkhat in chongpeii karra akasiin khet inkhat kha amakoiya mi ngaidiang khajek kha thoru tia aminchu inchu marwaan Rengramma akasiin khet esik eii, Inkhattiang, tuka-ang inkhat in Dan kha ajuiya mi ngaidiang aminchu inchu, amakha marwaan Rengramma akalok khet esik eii.
Ajarchu kei'n nangni diang kiril hi eii, nangni chuontho katuun kha Dan ocha ngai khat-um Pharisee ngai neek ah kheella ningthomak inchu, nangni marwaan Rengram supluut luut nutun.
“Mi ngai'n matiang khan inleiril kha nangni'n ningjetjei, ‘Mi thatmaru; tuka-ang inkhat in mi athat inchu achungnga chongtan kangar kha omsik eii.’
Takkha tuun kei'n nangni diang kati: tuka-ang inkhat in ama unai ngaidiang araang inchu chongtan kangar amusik eii, halli tuka-ang inkhat in a-u anai ngaikha ‘Anemna kaboi nang!’ tia akoi inchu ama kha Katar ngai maikuungnga inkeisuosik eii, halli tuka-ang inkhat in ka-am anemna kaboi nang atia akoi inchu chikaom meikhurra achulsik eii.
Khawa jarra nang in Pathian diang maichaam khan kutchoi nape siktiang na-u nanai ngai'n nachungnga angmekhat hoimakna kaom kha nahong ngaidon inchu,
nakutchoi kha maichaam ma-khan da-inlang, woikhat kirnook inlang na-u nanai ngai khale juo-inzoot naru, halli heikir inlang Pathian diang nakutchoi kha jopero.”
“Nang inhalpui mi inkhat in nang chungnga zootmak ah chongtanna munna anaruoi inchu, lamma ningsi lai innot ah inzootnaru, kha emak inchu ni-inhalpui ama'n nangkha chongkatanpa diang khan napeta, halli chongkatanpa in nangkha mikhumna kangaak ngaidiang napeta nang mikhumna khan nadasik eii.”
Kei'n nang diang inthiangnga karil, nang in ahekna napesik kasuok sial kha nape maklaiseng khawa munna inphut heisuok thanunijei.
“Zool-inthai emaru, ‘inleiti kha nangni'n ningjetjei.’
Takkha tuun kei'n nangni diang kati, numeisa inkhat kha taksa manuom nakhan ka-en mi rakip in ama malungnga ama khale inruoiya zool-inthai kha ejei.”
Halli namit changtiang khan nangkha manu ah anamachul sik e-inchu, kel-inlang kalekjuonro! ajarchu napumtak kha meikhurra kaminluut sikneek ah nataksa saram inkhat kamang khan nang sik ah athawiai.
Nakut changtiang khan nangkha manu ah anamachulsik e-inchu, tan-inlang kalekjuonro! ajarchu napumtak kha meikhurra kaluutsik neek ah nataksa saram inkhat kamang khan nangsik ah athawiai.
“Hiwahi inleiril jei, ‘tuka-ang in anumei inthenpui inchu, inthenpuina chongmajia kha numeisanu diangkhan perase.’ ”
Takkha tuun kei'n nangni diang kati: zool-inthai jarra elekleiya, mi inkhat in anumei inthenpui ngai asuok ah halli anumei khan inn aneinook inchu ama'n anumei kha zool-inthai amin ejei, halli numeisanu kaneinook mi kha um zool-inthai amin ejei.
“Nangni'n, matiangnga mi ngai'n inleiril kha nangni'n ningjetjei, khachu ‘Nangni chong inkhitna kha makoi maru, takkha angme chongkhomaak ni-insaam kha Pumi diang khan thoro.’
Takkha kei'n nangni diang karil: Chong ning inkhit pha chongkhomaak insaam maru, marwaan rakook inlang khomaak insaam maru, ajarchu hiwahi Pathian in-ongna eii,
emakli nuoipil rakook inlang-um khomaak insaam maru, ajarchu ama ke dana kha eii; emakli Jerusalem rakook inlang-um khomaak insaam maru, ajarchu akalok Reng khuopui kha eii.
Nalu ma-ou inlang khomaak insaam maro, ajarchu nang in samramol inkhat bit um minbang kate emakli minwom kate nimator emak.
Hintiro ‘Oh’ natili ‘Oh’ tiro emakli ‘Ngang’ natili ‘Ngang’ tiro. hiwa chungtiang heikasuok ngaisengchu Kathamak Mipa makheiya aheikasuok eii.”
“Hinna inleiti kha nangni'n ningjet, ‘Mit inkhat sik ah mit inkhat, ha inkhat sik ah ha inkhat.’ ”
Takkha kei'n nangni diang kati, nangni'n akathamak mi kha phaphu luok maru. Tuka-ang inkhat in nangem changtiang kabeen inchu, nangem kaangkhat tiang um doupiro.
Halli tuka-ang inkhat in nang kha chongtanna khan anaruoiya nasongkol aleizoot ah chongkal inchu, ama diang khan napuonsil kha um leirase.
Khat-um tuka-ang rup inkhat in aphur kha nazootmak pumma mile inkhat naminchoi inchu, mile inni choipiro.
Tuka-ang inkhat in nang diang phur khat anani pha, ama diang khan pero, halli tuka-ang inkhat in phur khat apuukzoot pha, ama diang khan minpuuk ro.
“Hinna inleiti kha nangni'n ningjet, ‘Na-indiang na-inwaipui ngaikha minriangro, ni-inhalpui ngaikha matirro.’ ”
Takkha tuun nangni diang kei'n kati: nangni inhalpui ngaikha minriangro, khat-um nangni kanaminpoong ngai sikbit ah nina neipiru,
Kha angnga marwaanna kaom ning Pa sangai kha ning esik eii, ajarchu ama'n akase li akatha ngai chungnga in-angnga ama'n kani aminsuok, halli mi katha li mi kathamak ngai sik um ruo aminsur.
Ajarchu nangni'n nangni kanaminriang mi ngaibit ningminriang inchu Pathian in nangni diang angtho-thoa thoman anapesik me? rampar kakhoom ngai innum khan intho emak abe!
Khat-um nangni'n ning-u ningnai ngaidiang bit khoya ningtho inchu, mi ngai diangnga nangni'n ang kakheel ningthome? zaatlop ngai innum khan intho emak abe!
Khawa jarra Marwaanna kaom ning Pa in pui itung angnga Nangni um puikatung kha eru.
“Mipui maikuungnga inmani namu nasik ah nangni chuon katha ngaikha thomak nasik inringtheiru, khawakha ningtho inchu Marwaanna kaom ning Pa diangnga nangnisik thoman iteii um ommak.”
“Khawa jarra mi ngai naminpaak nasik akatha inleem ngai'n synagogues ah khat-um lampuiya intho angnga, nangni'n kutchoi ningpe pha malar maru. Kei'n inthiangnga nangni diang kati, inmani'n inthoman kha kahuuiya inralaang suojei.”
Nangni'n kaneimak ngaidiang kutchoi ningpe pha ningkut changtiang ningtho kha ningwei tiangnga ningkut in jetmarase,
Ajarchu ruuk ah kanamu ning Pa in nangni diang anape kirna sik ah; ningpe kha ruuk ah inpe erase.
“Nangni'n ningni pha, akatha omchan kathongai angmaru! ajarchu mi rakip in inmani inmu nasik ah, chubei thona inna khat-um lamraki ngaikhan inngirra kani inmanuom. Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kati, inmani'n inthoman kha kahuuiya inmujei.
Takkha nangnichu ningni pha, ning innsuung luutru, ning innkhar kha khar inlang, mit ah inmumak, ning Pa ama diang niru. Halli ruuk ah kanamu, ning Pa in nangni diang najuope kirte.”
“Halli nangni ningni pha, zaatlop ngai itho angnga anemna kaboiya inlet-inlet ah nikirmaru, ajarchu inmani'n kasoot ah inni kha inpathian ngai'n najetpite tia inngaidon.
Khawa jarra inmani angmaru, ajarchu nangni'n ama diang ningni maklai nangni sik ah angme insam kaom kha ning Pa in anajetpi.
Khawa jarra hintho inlang nangni'n niru: Marwaanna kaom kin Pa: Naraming kaya omrase;
Narengram juotung rase; marwaanna nalungdou intho angnga nuoipilchungnga inthorase.
Keini sik arei kaom bak le in awini napero.
Halli keini chungnga kamasial ngai kinrangaidam angnga, Keini itho masialna ngaikha narangaidamro.
Halli keini matheemna khan naminchulmaro, takkha Kathamak ah inphut keini nasanro. Ajarchu Rengram, ranak khat-um lurna-lianna ngaihi hektik kaboiya nangta erase Amen.”
Ajarchu “Nangni'n mi ngai intho masialna ngaikha ningngaidampi inchu, marwaanna kaom ningpa Pathian in nangni kha um anarangaidam sik eii.”
Takkha nangni'n mi ngai ningngaidam mak inchu, ningpa Pathian innum nangni itho masial ngaikhan narangaidampi nuni.
“Halli nangni'n bu ningngei phakhan, akatha omchan katho ngai angnga maisuo kapoong malarmaru. Ajarchu inmani'n bu kinngei ti mi rakip in namurasu tia kapoong meelsuo inmalar. Kei'n inthiangnga kati, inmani inthoman kha kahuuiya inmusuojei.”
Takkha nangnichu bu ningei pha, ninglu ah sariak kanoot ru halli ningmai phiaru,
halli ningbu ngei kha mi ngai'n jetmarasu, takkha mit ah inmumak ning Pa bit khan ajetsik eii. Halli ruuk ah kanamu, ning Pa in nangni diang najuope sik eii.
“Inngeii li thir-ek ibakmator halli inruup ngai'n inmakoiya inmaruup mator neipilchung hin nangni sik ah neinaak bukmaru.”
Takkha inngeii li thir-ek inbak matormakjei halli inruup ngai innum inmakoiya inmaruup theimak marwaanna nangni sik ah neinaak kha inbuk ru.
Ajarchu naneinaak omna khan namalung um aomsik eii.
“Taksa sik ah meiserchu mit eii, khawa jarra namit atha inchu, napumpui kha war in asipsik eii,
takkha namit athamak inchu, napum kha kaziing in asipsik eii. Khawa jarra nasuungnga kaom war kha aziing inchu, angtuk chikaom tak ah kaziing mejei!”
“Tu inkhat innum karu inni suok ematornutun; ajarchu inkhat amatir li inkhatpa kha aminriang sik eii, emakli ama'n inkhat sik nangir li inkhatpa kha donnuni. Khawa jarra nangni'n Pathian li sialsum inni suok emator nutun.”
“Hiwa sik ah kei'n nangni diang kiril eii, nangni'n ringna sikbit ah angme baksik, angme insik halli puondiar sik jarra angme kinthosik ti-inlang ningmalung mindongmaru.” Ringkhuo khan bak li in neek ah halli nipum in puondiar neek ah kakheel emak abe?
Chungnga wa ngaikhi enru, inmani'n wor um wormu, aat um aatmu, halli sapangnga um bukmu, takkha marwaanna kaom ning Pa in inmani kha aminbak! nangnichu wa ngai neek ah aman katam emakchube?
Halli nangni tu inkhat in amalung minpoongli aringkhuo lekkhat kaminsei mator ningommabe?
“Halli puondiar jarra ang sikme malung poongna ningnei? Leiya rei ngaiso angtho-thoa inmoongme enru: inmani chuonnum thomu, pat um khermu,
takkha kei'n nangni diang kati, khachu Reng Solomon in inei neilenung rakip ah inliang innum hiwa reipar ngai thadan leiphamak.”
Takkha awini moongnga kaom leihar ziingngachu meiya haalsik ramma kaom leihar kha Pathian in hituk katha ah aminliang inchu, E, ngamna kasiin ngai, ama'n nangnile kheella naminliang makniabe?
“Khawa jarra angme baksik, angme insik, emakli, angme kasilsik tia malung minpoong maru.”
(Ajarchu zaatlop ngai'n hiwa phur rakip hi in-entok.) Halli marwaanna kaom ning Pa in phur rakip hi nangni diang arei om ti anajetpi.
Takkha nangni'n Pathian Rengram khat-um ama dikna kha ma-insa ah entokru, halli phur rakip hi nangni diang kheella anapedel sik eii.
Khawa jarra ziingnga sik malung minpoong maru; ajarchu ziingnga sikchu ziingnga atheinuo ah malung inpoongte. Nisuo khat ah poongna khan nisuo khat sik ah kahunthek kha ejei.
“Mi leiilak chungnga chong tanmaro, kha e-inchu Pathian innum nangni chungnga chong natannuni,
ajarchu nangni chongtan khale in-angrip ah, nangni kha chong analatansik eii, halli nangni'n ningjuo uol dan khale in-angrip ah nangni diang um ana uol sik eii.”
Halli namit ah kaom thinglek khachu khaisik ngaidon mak cheya, na-u nanai ngai mit ah kaom madir kha angsik ah ni-enme?
Halli namit ah thinglek ompumma, angtho-thoa na-u nanai ngaidiang, namit ah kaom madir kha kei'n nakhaipi kate, natisikme?
Akatha inleem nang! nang in ma-insakhet ah namit ah kaom thinglek kha khaidiro, halli khawasuoli nang in na-u nanai ngai mit ah kaom madir kha inthiangnga khaisik munate.
“Inthiang phurkha ui ngaidiang pemaru; halli ninglungman katam ngaikha wokngai matiang dapimaru. Inmani'n khawakha inkeiiya intouli khan inhong-inheiya nangnikha na-eicha.”
“Niru, nangni diang napete; Entokru, nangni'n muningte; halli inkhar kha rakhoongru, nangni diang namalong pite.
Ajarchu akani mi rakip in inchang, aka-entok rakip in inmu, halli akarakhoong amadiang inmalong pisik eii.
Nangni karra tume asapa in bu anili lung amadiang kapesik?
Emakli nga ananili amadiang maruul kapesik?
Nangni ningthamak innum, ningsa ngaidiang akatha kutchoi ningpethei inchu, marwaanna kaom ning Pa in akani inmani diang kheella akatha phur kha apemaksik!”
“Khawa jarra nangni'n mi ngai ningchungnga ningmintho zoot angrakip kha nangni innum inmani diang khan thoru: ajarchu hiwahin Moses Dan khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngai minchuna kha eii.”
“Nangni'n kot kasiin khan luutru, ajarchu poongnamun katung kot kha alok khat-um lam kha jui abei, halli mi katam in khawakha injui.
Takkha ringna katung kotchu asiin khat-um lamkha jui-intak, halli khawa kaluut mi intoom.”
“Keelngam omchan katho, halli asuung ngachu awonkachaam malang angnga nangni diangnga kahong Pathian chongkachoi inleem ngaikha insingtheiru.”
Nangni'n angme intho khan inmani jetningte. Raling kuung makheiya theibom, halli raling kuungnga theichang inra ngai abe?
Khawa jarra akatha thingkuung rakip in akatha kara inra, khat-um kathamak thingkuung in kathamak kara kha inra.
Akatha thingkuung in kathamak kara inramak, halli akathamak thingkuung khan akatha kara karamak.
Akatha kara kakaramak thingkuung rakipkha intukkhiak ah meisuungnga indeengluut.
Khawajarra, inmani kara khan nangni'n inmani kha jetningte.
“Kei diang ‘Pumi, Pumi’ kanati mi rakip in marwaan rengram kha luutnunu, takkha marwaanna kaom ka-Pa lungdou akatho ama bitkhan aluutsik eii.
Chongtan Nikhuo khan, mi katamtak in keidiang intisik eii, Pumi, Pumi! nang ramingnga keini'n Pathian chong kha kinleiril emak abe, nang ramingnga keini'n ratha kathamak angjet ngai kinleinong suok emak abe, khat-um inlakchuon angjet kinleitho emak abe?
Khawa phakhan kei'n inmani diang inthiangnga karilsik eii, Kei'n angtikniteii nangni najetmong; nangni thomak sik kathongai, kei diangnga inphut suoktaru!
“Khawa jarra, kei kachong ngaihi jetli kajui miring rakip kha lungpui chungnga a-inn kasak akasing mi inkhatle in-ang.”
Halli ruo katamma ahongsur, tuidung kha ahonglian, khat-um thi kana ah ahongraangnga inn kha aseem jei, takkha inn kha lung chungnga insak jarra leipurmak.
“Halli kei kachong ngaihi jetli kajuimak miring rakipchu neel chungnga inn kasak aka-am mi inkhatle in-ang.
Halli ruo katamma ahongsurra, tuidung ahonglian, khat-um thi kana ah ahongraangnga, inn kha aseempur jei. Khawa kha setheiya apurjei!”
Jisu'n hiwa rakip arilsuo pha, mipui ngai'n ama minchuna kha inleingak,
ajarchu ama'n inmani Dan karu ngai khale in-angleiya; thomatorna kanei inkhat ah aleiminchu.
Jisu'n chingnga inphut ajuochum pha, mipui katamtak in ama nuk inleijui.
Halli enru, takbangri karoon mi inkhat in ama koolla ahongnga chubei thoa ati, “Ocha, nang in nanazootpi inchu, keihi nanaminthiang mator.”
Jisu'n akut aheisoonna ama kha akatook ah ati, “Kei'n kazootjei,” “Nang kadam etaro!” Khawaphatak takbangri kha inthiangjei.
Halli Jisu'n ama diang ati, “Rangairo! nang tu-inkhat diang rilpimaro, takkha siro, thiampu diang napumtak juominmuro, halli inmani diang nang nadam jei tina sakhi inpenasik; Moses chongpeii dungjuiya pesik doiphur kha juopero.”
Halli Jisu'n Capernaum aluut pha, Roman raalmi rajakhat lamkakei inkhat in ama diang hongnga, nasanro ahongti:
“Ocha, kasuokpa kha apang kaangkhat kathi kana khan kapoongtak ah ana ah sithei mak ah inna azaalla omjei.”
Jisu'n amadiang ati, “Kei'n sikata halli ama kamindamsik eii,”
“Emak ocha,”Raalmi rajakhat lamkakeipa khan aheimasang, nang in ka-inna nahongsik hi “Kei rahoi suokmong, takkha chongbit kha pero kasuok kanapa kha damte.
Ajarchu Kei kapumtak um, ranak kanei mi inkhat nuoiya kaom ka-eii, halli kanuoiya raalmi in-om, halli hiwa mipa diang, ‘Siro!’ katili ama asi; mikhat diang, ‘Heiwaro!’ katili aheiwa; halli kasuokpa diang, ‘Hi thoro katili’ ama'n atho.”
Jisu'n hiwahi ajet pha, angak ah anuk kajui mipui ngaidiang ati, “Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga karil, Kei'n Israel ngai karra hituk ngamna kanei miring inkhat um lamumong.
Kei'n nangnidiang karil, nisuo tiang li niluutna tiangnga inphut mikatam khat hong-inta marwaan rengramma bubakna khan Abraham, Isaac khat-um Jacob ngaile in in-ong suomsik eii.
Takkha Rengramma kaom sik ngai khan mi ngaikha rengram makheiya aziingna munkhan indiangjuon sik eii, khawamun khan inmani chapna li hakarialna esik eii.”
Khawasuoli Jisu'n raalmi rajakhat lamkakeipa diang aheiti, “Na-inna siro, na-inngamna angnga nangsik intho rase.” Halli khawa phatak khan asuokpa kha adamjei.
Jisu'n Peter inna aheiwa pha, Peter tarpi ritun ana ah zaalmunna izaalkha aleimu.
Ama'n akut akatook pha ritun khan amathaanjei; halli ama intheiya ama kha sepa aphut jei.
Kholei aheitung pha, mipui in Jisu diang raikhuo kaluut angjet inheiruoi. Jisu'n kana rakip aleimindam khat-um chongnga ratha inthiangmak ngaikha aleipuutsuok.
Pathian chongkachoi Isaiah diangnga ileiminril, “Ama apumtak in eini nana ngai kha anakhaipi khat-um niri nirai ngai anaroonpi” ti pui tungnasik eii.
Jisu ama mipui ngai'n inhei-um amu pha, tuidiil khamkhat tiang rakaannasik asiamruoi ngaidiang chong aleipeii.
Dan ocha inkhat ama diang aleihongnga ahongti. “Ocha,” “Kei nasina rakip nanuk kajuisik ka-insuuk suojei.”
Khawapha Jisu'n amadiang aleiti, “Ram-ui ngai'n inkhur innei, halli lairalak ah wa ngai'n rabu innei, takkha Miring Sapa alu danasik munchu ommak.”
Siamruoi karra inkhat in ati, “Ocha, kapa kaphuum kasisik hi ma-insakhet ah nazootpidiro.”
Takkha Jisu'n ama diang aleimasang, “Kanuk najuiro,” “Halli akathi ngaikhan inmani intheinuo ah inphuum rasu.”
Jisu'n rakuong inkhat suungnga aleiluut pha, asiamruoi ngai ama nuk inleijui.
Halli enru, jetlei-theileiya tuidiil chungnga akangartak thipui inkhat ahongraangnga, rakuong kha tuithisiip in aheimakhujei; takkha Jisu chu aleizaalla alei-om.
Khawakhan siamruoi ngai'n insia ama injuokeitheili inti, “Pumi, nasanro!” “Keini kinthisik ejei!”
Halli Jisu'n aleimasang, “E ngamna kasiin ngai, angsikme khatuk ningchi?” Halli ama'n intheiya thikaraang khat-um tuithisiip kha chong apeli akhaapjei; halli pumdai ajuodaijei.
Halli mi ngaikhan inngak ah inti, “Thikaraang li tuithisiip ngai innum achong injui, hiwahi ang mi chat me?”
Jisu'n Gadara tuidiil ram raalkhat tiang ahongpha, ranak kanei thaanna inphut heikasuok raikhuo iruoi miring inni alei-intongpui. Inmani kha chikaomthei in ejarra, khawa lam khan tu inkhat um leisi matormu.
Halli enru, inmani'n inkheekli inti, “E Pathian Sapa, angme nang in keini diangnga nimanuom? apha heitungmaklai nang in keini naminpoong sik niheiwabe?”
Inmani makheiya kalaakdet ah wok rahooi katamtak inbak ah inlei-om.
Halli raikhuo ngaikhan Jisu diang inti, “Keini nanapuut suoksik e-inchu, wok rahooi ngai suungnga keini natirro.”
Jisu'n “Siru,” inmani diang ati; halli inmani'n inheisuok ah wok ngai suungnga inleiluut jei. Enru, Wok rahooi rakip ngaikha insuk tuidiil pangtiang sumpalingkhang inthoa tuiya intali inthijei.
Khawapha wok kakhaal ngaikhan intaanna khuopuiya inluut ah, akasuok thurchi rakip khat-um raikhuo in iruoi mi ngai jarra inleirilpi jei.
Khawa jarra khuopui makheiya miring rakip in Jisu inmupui nasik inheisuokjei; khat-um inmani'n ama inmupha, inmani ram makheiya mathaan nasik inleiti.
Jisu'n rakuong chuongnga khat-um tuidiil rakaanna akhuopui tiang akirnookjei,
Halli enru, miring lekkhat in zaalmumna zaalla kaom apangkathi miring inkhat, ama diang inhongruoi. Jisu'n inmani ngamna kha amu pha, apangkathi miringpa diang ama'n ati, “Kasapa namalung minhoiro! namanu ngaikha kana-ngaidam pijei.”
Halli enru, dan ocha lekkhat in, “Hiwa mipa in Pathian diang kase ah aril jei!” tia inmani inkhat li inkhat inlei-inti
Jisu'n inmani ingaidon angme ti ajet ah aheiti, “Nangni'n kha ka-ang kathamak angsik ah ningngaidon me?
‘Namanu ngai kha kana-ngaidam suojei,’ emakli ‘Inthei-inlang siro’ tihi, hume kheella kabei?
Kha-enchu kei'n nangni diang nuoipil chungnga Miring Sapa in manu ngai ngaidamna ranak anei tikha namalarpi kate.” Halli apangkathi mipa diang ama'n ati, “Inthei ro, napher rut inlang, inna siro!”
Mipa kha intheiya inna asijei.
Mipui'n khawa inmu pha, inmani'n inleichi, khat-um mipui diang hika-ang ranak kape Pathian kha inleiminpaak.
Jisu'n khawa mun amathaanna, khat-um ama'n hin aheiwa pha, ama'n rampar kakhoom araming Matthew inti inkhat, achuon thona munna, in-ongnga kaom aleimu. Ama'n ama diang ati, “Kei najuiro.” Matthew in intheiya anuk aleijui jei.
Jisu'n Matthew inna bu abaklai, rampar kakhoom katamtak ngaile aleiilak manu karoon ngai'n inheiwa ah Jisu le ama siamruoi ngai bubakna khan inlei in-ong.
Pharisee lekkhat in hiwahi inleimu khat-um ama siamruoi ngaidiang inleirakel, “Angsik ah me nangni ochapa'n hika-ang rampar kakhoom khat-um manu karoon ngaile inruoiya inbaksuom?”
Jisu'n inmani iti aleijet halli aleimasang, “Akanamak mi ngai sik achu kathiam rangai mak, takkha tuka-ang akana ngai sik bit chu arangai.
Si inlang entokru chong inthiang in angme iti tikha: ‘Kei imanuom khachu riangwai kha eii, sa ah doiphur inpe kha emak.’ Kei'n kijuo hichu mi kadik ngai kakoi emong, takkha manu karoon ngai kakoi kijuo eii.”
John Baptist nukkajui ngai'n Jisu diang inhongnga inhongrakel, “Keini le Pharisee ngai'n bak-in kinngei, takkha nasiamruoi ngai inchu angsik ah me bak-in inngeimak?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Moipa in moiruoina khan omlaiseng asap-asuon ngai poong inte tia nangni ningngaidon be? kha emak! Takkha nikhuo kha laheiwate inmani diangnga inphut moipa kha inlaruoi suok nasik, khanna inphut inmani bak-in inngei sik eii.”
“Tu inkhat innum songkol maruo chungnga puon kathar lek khat kathuidel ngai mu, akathar inkathuidel puon khan heikeirinta khat-um songkol kachet kha kheella achetpui sik eii.
Tu inkhat innum tuong kamaruo khan theibom tuithar kha thunnamu, ajarchu tuong kha koita, theibomtui kha inhiai sik eii, khat-um theibomtui tuong kha ajuomang sik eii, Khawa rathuulla, theibom tuithar kha theibomtui tuong kathar khan inthun, halli innireella katha tak ah inda.”
Jisu'n hiwa arillaitak khan, Jihudi chuonkaroon inkhat ama diang aleihong, ama maikuungnga inbok ah ati, “Kei kasanu hi tuuntak khan athijei; takkha heiwa inlang ama chungnga nakut najuoda piro, halli ama hongringte.”
Khawa jarra Jisu intheiya ama nuk ajuijei, khat-um ama siamruoi ngai ama le inleisi suomjei.
Kumsoomleini thikasarra kana numeisa inkhat Jisu nuk ah aheijui khat-um ama puonmor aleikatook.
Ama'n atheinuo ah inti, “Kei'n ama puon bit kakatook inchu, Kei kadam sik eii.”
Jisu'n numeisanu diang ahei-inlet ah aleiti, “Kasanu, malung minsiin maro! Na-inngamna khan anamindam jei.” Khawa pha chei khan numeinu kha adamjei.
Khawasuoli Jisu'n chuon karoonpa inna aleiluut. Akathinu phuumna sik ah khuongli dar katho ngaile mipui chorkati ngaikha ama'n ajomu pha,
ama'n ati, “Mi rakip suokru! Naipangnu hi kathi emak ama hi akalazaal eii!” Khawa pha khan inmani rakip in ama innuipuina inleinei.
Takkha mipui masuoksuoli, Jisu'n naipangnu omna inn tiang aluut ah akut ajuo ma-ou ah ama ahong intheijei.
Hiwa chong ngai jar rakip hi rampumpui inthangjei.
Jisu'n khawa mun mathaanna, khat-um ama'n hin aheiwapha, mitkacho miring inni'n ama kajui inleiphut. “David Sapa, Keini naminriangro!” tia inmani'n inleikheek.
Jisu'n innsuung aluutsuo pha, mitkacho miring inni ngai ama koolla inheiwa, khat-um inmanidiang ama'n aleirakel, “Kei'n nangni kanamindam mator tihi ning-inngamna be?” Inmani'n inleimasang, “Oh, ocha!”
Halli Jisu'n inmani mit katookpiya khat-um aleitipi, nangni inngamna dungjuiya ningchungnga, “Hiwa kasuok etarase!”
halli inmani inmit inhongmujei. Jisu'n chong kangartak inmani diang aleiril, “Enru tu inkhat diang um hiwahi rilmaru!”
Takkha inmani inmathaanna khawa ram pumpui khan Jisu jarra chongngai inleiril thangjei.
Inmani'n insuok pha, miring lekkhat in Jisu diang raikhuo kaluut chong kasuokmak miring inkhat inhongruoi.
Takkha raikhuo kha apuutsuok li apuutsuokmak, mipa kha chong ahongriljei, halli mi rakip inleingakjei. “Keini'n Israel suungnga hinna kati iteii khat-um lamu ngaimung!” inleiti.
Takkha Pharisee ngai'n inleiti, “Ama'n raikhuo ngai waikaroonpa ranak ah hiwa raikhuo ngai ipuutsuok eii.”
Jisu'n khuopui rakip le khuo rakip khan aleisi. Synagogue suungnga ama'n aleininchu, Rengram jarra chongkahoi ngai aleiril khat-um rirai kana mi ngaile kana rakip aleimindam.
Ama'n mipui ngai kha akakhaal kaboi keelngam ngai angnga inmalung inpoong khat-um kasansik kaboi kha amupha, amalungnga inmani kha aleipoongpui.
Khawa jarra ama'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Leirakhool sik chu alok, takkha khawa akarakhool sik chuonmi chu intoom.
Ama leikarakhool sik chuonmi kha ajuotir nasik leimapupa diangkhan niru.”
Jisu'n ama siamruoi soomleini ngai aleikoichun halli ratha kathamak ngai puutsuok nasik khat-um rirai le kana rakip mindam nasik thomatorna ranak inmani diang aleipeii.
Hiwa ngaihi tirton soomleini ngai raming ngaikha eii: Inkhat changna, Simon (Peter tia inkoi) khat-um ama anaipa Andrew; James le ama anaipa John, Zebedee sangai;
Philip le Bartholomew; Thomas khat-um Matthew, rampar kakhuompa; James Alphaeus sapa, le Thaddaeus;
Zealot Simon, khat-um Judas Iscariot, Jisu kapesuokpa.
Hiwa miring soomleini ngaihi anuoiya minchuna angjet ngaile inruoiya Jisu'n aleitir suok: “Zaatlop ngai ram khan simaru emakli Samaritan khuopui khannum luutmaru.”
Khawa rathuulla, Israel mi ngai kamangnga kaom keelngam ngaidiang nangni siru.
Nangni'n hin ningsipha, Marwaan Rengram hi anaijei! ti-inlang rilru.
Akana kha mindamru, akathi kha minring nookru, tuka-ang chikaom taksa kana in kana ah kaom ngai mindamru, raikhuo ngaikha puutsuokru. Nangni'n aman kaboiya ningmu kha, aman kaboiya peru.
Nangni ningmarsa ah soonna, dangka, emakli sumsenpum iteii choimaru;
Ramma ningsipha, sialkok, songkol inliak, kekok emakli sinasik kherol inchoimaru. Ajarchu chuonmi khan angme inmanisik arei kaom kha inpesik eii.
“Nangni'n khuopui emakli khuo inkhat ningluut ah ningheiwa pha, tuka-ang inkhat in nangni karok ah kanadon ngai entokru, halli khawa munkha ningmathaan maklaiseng amale omsuomru.
Nangni'n innsuung ningluut phakhan, nangni chungnga kahoi kadai erase, tiru.
Khawa inna kaom mi ngai'n nangni karok ah innadon inchu, ningmalung kadai donnachong kha omchak rase; takkha inmani'n karok ah innadon emak inchu, ningmalung daina donnachong kha nangni diang heikir rase.
Khat-um innsuung emakli khuopui lekkhat in nangni karok ah innadon emakli nangni innarangai emak inchu, khawa munkha mathaanru halli ning keiiya rahut kha kathing thaakru.
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga karil khachu khawa khuopui mi ngai diang neek ah, Chongtan Nikhuo khan Pathian in Sodom li Gomorrah mi ngaidiang kakheel riangwai amalarsik eii!”
“Rangairu! kei'n nangni hi malang ngai karra keelngam khale in-angnga kinatir eii. Maruul angnga insingtheiru khat-um wathu angnga malungkadai eru.”
Insingtheiru, ajarchu khawa khan nangni kanasursik tuka-ang inom khat-um chongtanna khan nangni innaruoisik eii, halli inmani'n nangni Synagogue ah inawuoksik eii.
Halli kei kajarra ramwai karoon ngaile rengngai maikuungnga zaatlop ngaile inmani diang sakhi sik ah innaruoisik eii.
Inmani'n nangni sakhi sik innakeisuo pha, angme katisik emakli angtho-thoa karilsik me tia ningmalung minpoong maru.
Nangni rilsik chongramol ngaikha nangnita enuni; chongramol ngaikha nangni diangnga karil ning Pa ratha ah inphut hongkasuoksik eii.
“Mi ngai'n inmani unai ngaitak kha thatna sik ah inpesuoksik eii, khat-um pa ngai innum khale in-angrip ah inmani sangai diang inthosik eii; halli sangai innum inmani nu le pa ngai chungnga hei-inlet inta inmani inminthatsik eii.”
Kei jarra mi rakip in nangni innamatirsik eii. Takkha ahekna katung kadei ngaikha inringsik eii.
Khuopui inkhat ah inmani'n nangni innaminpoong pha, khuopui inkhat tiang taandelru. Kei'n inthiangnga nangni diang karil Miring Sapa juokir makma, nangni Israel khuopui rakip ah ningchuon leiminhek nutun.
“Siamruoi inkhat in ama ochapa neek ah lokmak; suok inkhat in amapupa neek ah lokmak.”
Khawajarra siamruoi inkhat in ama ochapa hong angjei, khat-um suok inkhat in ama mapupa ahong ang jei inchu hunjei. Innsuung khurra alu kha Beelzebul tia inkoi inchu, innsuungkhur mi ngai khachu angtuk ah kase ah inkoisik me!
“Ajarchu mi ngaikha chimaru. Ang e-innum tuunna inmakhu rakip la inkhununi, khat-um ruuk ah intho rakip inlajet wiaksik eii.”
Kei'n nangni diang aziingna ah angme kiril kha nangni'n suunwarra ningril kirsik eii, halli angme ruuk ah ningjet kha innchungnga ninglarilsuok sik eii.
Taksa chu kathat mator takkha ratha kathat matormak ngaikha chimaru; khaneek ah, taksa li ratha innireella meikhurra kaminmang mator Pathian kha khella chiru.
Dangkapum inkhat ah wacharek inni nangni'n ningracho mator, takkha wacharek inkhat-um neipilchungnga ning Pa lungdou eleiya juotamak.
Nangni sik achu, ningluwa kaom ningsam ramol katung ateelsuo jei.
Khawajarra chimaru; wacharek katamtak ngai neek ah nangni aman katam ning-eii!
“Tu-ennum mipui maikuungnga kei kanaralaang kha kei innum ama kha marwaanna kaom Kapa maikuungnga karalaangsik eii.”
Takkha mi ngai maikuungnga kei kanazootmak kha, Kei innum marwaanna kaom Kapa maikuungnga zootpinuning.
“Kei'n nuoipilchungnga kadai kapesik kijuo eii ti ngaidon maru. Emak, kei kadai heikachoi sik ah kijuo emak, takkha raalchem kape sik kijuo eii.”
Kei'n pa li asa ngai, nu li asanu ngai, halli tarpi li amoinu ngai kaminhal sik kijuo eii;
Nangni inhalpui kasekhet khachu na-innsuung mi ngaikha in esik eii.
“Tuka-ang kei neek ah apa emakli anu kaminriang ngaikha kei siamruoisik rahoi suokmu; khat-um tuka-ang kei neek ah insapa emakli insanu kaminriang ngaikha kei siamruoi sik rahoi suokmu.
Tuka-ang in inmani cross kadom leiya kei kanajui ngaikha kei siamruoi sik rahoi suokmu.
Tuka-ang inringkhuo kaminriang ngaikhan khawakha inminmang sik eii; takkha tuka-ang inringkhuo kei sik ah kaminmang ngaikhan khawakha inmu sik eii.
“Tu-ennum nangni kanadon ngaikhan kei innadon eii; khat-um tu-ennum kei nakadon khan kei najuokatirpa kha idon eii.
Ajarchu tuka-ang in Pathian chongkachoi inkhat kha ama Pathian chongkachoi eii tia akadon khan Pathian chongkachoipa tum kha aralaangsik eii; halli tuka-ang in mikadik inkhat kha ama hi mikadik inkhat eii tia akadon khan mikadikpa tum kha aralaangsik eii.
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiril eii, tu-ennum hiwa ngai karra akasiin khet kasiamruoi inkhat kha tuidai rabing inkhat kape khan suoileiya ama tum amusik eii.”
Jisu'n ama siamruoi soomleini ngai hiwa minchuna ngai apesuo pha, khawa munkha amasuo ah Galilee khuopui ngaikhan kaminchusik li chongkarilsik aleisijei.
John Baptist in mikhumna suungnga angme Christa itho ngai jarra ajet pha, Christa diang ama siamruoi ngai lekkhat ama'n aleitir.
Jisu diang inmani'n inrakel, “Keini diang narilpiro,” “John in alajuo sik eii itipa kha nang na-ebe, emakli tuka-ang khat kinlangaak sikbe?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Kirru halli angme ningmu khat-um ningjet ngaikha John diang rilpiru:
Mitkacho in amu, kekakiak in asithei, tuka-ang chikaom takbangri kana ngai aminthiang, kuorkaseet in ajet, akathi kha aminringnook, khat-um Chong Kahoi ngaikha sara ngaidiang aleirilpi.
Tuka-ang kei jarra inngamsamna kaneimak mi kha angtuk rawaan kathame!”
John siamruoi ngai'n insisuo phakhan, Jisu'n John jarra mipui ngaidiang aleiril: “Nangni'n neelramma ningsi pha, angme nangni'n enkinte tia ningsi? Leihardoon thikaraang in iseemkun kha be?
Emakli angme enkinte tia ningsi? Puondiar kathatak ah inliang mipa kha be? Khawa ka-ang inliang mi ngai khachu reng koolla in-om!
Kei diang rilru, nangni ang musik tia ningsuok me? Pathian chongkachoi kha be? Oh inthiangtak ah, kei'n nangni diang kati, John kha Pathian chongkachoi inkhat neek ah akalok kha eii.
John amatak jarra eii chong inthiang in ileiti kha: Pathian in ati, kei'n kei chongkachoipa nang namatiang nangsik ah lam kamalong kajuotirsik eii.
Inthiangnga kei'n nangni diang kanarilpi, numeisa ngai'n innei karra John Baptist neek ah kalok tuteii la-injir mak, takkha marwaan rengramma kasiinkhet kha ama neek ah kalok kha eii.
John Baptist in achong aril pha makheiya inphut tuun katung marwaan rengram hi poongraalna nuoiya alaom halli poongraalna kape mi ngai'n khawa kha surnasik inlatho.
Ajarchu John pha katung Pathian chongkachoi ngaile Moses Dan khan Rengram jarra inleiril;
John hi alakajuo sik Elijah kha eii tia inleiril inmani chong kha ningralaang zoot inchu,
Rangairu, ningkuor indou inchu!”
“Tuun, kei'n hiwa khang hi angleme kaminkhi sik? Inmani ngai khachu naipang phurjuorna munna in-ong ngai khale in-ang. Rupkhat ngaikhan aleiilak ngaidiang inkheek ah inti,
‘Keini'n moiruoi khuong li dar nangni sik ah kinsut, takkha nangni'n laam makchu! keini'n kathi laa kinsak, takkha nangni'n chapmakchu!’
Ajarchu John in bak inleiya aleijuo, halli inmani'n ‘Ama suungnga raikhuo om inti!’
han miring Sapa ajuo ah bu bak halli tui in, han inmani'n inti enro olkalok ju ka-inpa, rampar kakhoom ngaili ‘Manu karoon ngai sap!’ takkha Pathian singna hi ama chuon khan adik tia amalar.”
Jisu'n ama chuon-inlak katam athona khuopuiya kaom mi ngai'n inmanu ah inphut malungthuul nunu, khawa jarra ama'n khawa khuopui ngaikha aleiran.
“Hiwahi nangni sik ah angtuk poong kaom sikme, Chorazin! nang sik um angtuk poong kaom sikme, Bethsaida, nang sik um angtuk poong kaomme! chuon inlak nangni chungnga kitho ngaikha Tyre li Sidon chungnga kaleitho inchu, matiang khan khanna kaom mi ngaikhan inmani manu ah inphut malung thuulna kapoong puondiar tho inta khat-um inmani chungnga rahut inlei innootsik ejei!
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga karil khachu Chongtan Nikhuo khan Pathian in nangni neek ah Tyre li Sidon mi ngaidiang minriang kha amalarsik eii!
Khat-um Capernaum nang um marwaan katung natheinuo ah na-indom saang zootbe? Nang chu meikhurra innahiai sik eii! nangni diangnga intho chuon inlak ngaikha Sodom chungnga inleitho inchu, wini katung sodom laleiom sik eii!
Takkha kei'n nangni diang kati, khachu Chongtan Nikhuo khan Pathian in nangni diang neek ah Sodom ram sik ah kheella minriang amalarsik eii!”
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n ati, “Pa, marwaan li nuoipil Pumi! kei'n nang kanaminpaak ajarchu nang in angme kasing li kajet ngaidiang nathup kha kasiin naipang ngaidiang namalarjei.”
Oh, Pa, hiwahi nalungdou kha eii.
“Kapa'n angrakip kei diang anapesuojei. Pa khan eleiya tu inkhat innum Sapa kha jetmu, khat-um Sapa khan eleiya tu inkhat innum Pa kha jetmu halli Sapa in ikadang ngaikha ama diang amalar.”
“Phurrik karoonna kapoong nangni rakip kei diang hongru, halli kei'n nangni soong kanamachum sik eii.
Kanamkol lei-inlang roonru, kei diang inphut inchuru, ajarchu keichu kamalung adai khat-um kanunchan inchuol; halli nangni'n ning ratha sik ah soongmachumna muningte.
Ajarchu kanamkol roon abei khat-um kaphur zaang.”
Khawasuo sootlekleiya Jisu'n Sernikhuo inkhat ah gehubil asamma aleisi. Ama siamruoi ngaikha inwon aleichampi, khawa jarra inmani'n gehu wuui inchinna khat-um gehuru kha kabak inleiphut jei.
Hiwahi pharisee ngai'n inmupha, inmani'n Jisu diang inleiti, “Enru, Hiwa Sernikhuo ni nasiamruoi ngai'n thomak sik eini sina Dan izootmak kha intho!”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “David inruoipui ngaile ama awon achampha angme inleitho nangni lateel ngaimak chube?
Ama'n Pathian inna aluut ah, thiampu ngai bit bak kacha inmani bak sik chu Dan izootmak, Pathian diangnga inpe waipool kha, ama khat-um ama inruoipui ngai'n inleibak.
Kha emakli Jihudi ngai sernikhuo rakip thiampu ngai'n Biak-inn suungnga Jehudi ngai sernikhuo Dan inmakoi innum inmani masialna ommak ti Moses Dan kha nangni lateel ngaimak chube?
Biak-inn neek ah akalok angmekhat hin om tihi kei'n nangni diang kanarilpi eii.
Chong inthiang in ati, ‘Kei imanuom khachu riangwai kha eii, sa ah doiphur inpe kha emak.’ Nangni'n hiwahi inthiangnga angtiname ningleijet inchu, thosialna kaneimak mi ngaidiang nangni'n noonkuung ninglei pemak sik eii;
Ajarchu miring Sapa hi Sernikhuo Pumi kha eii.”
Khawa mun amathaanna Jisu Synagogue inkhat ah aleisi,
Khawa munkhan akut kathi miring inkhat aleiom. Halli Jisu ithosial noonkuung pesik kamanuom mi lekkhat kha khan inlei-om, “Sernikhuo ni mi mindam sik hi eini sina Dan izootbe?” tia inmani'n ama diang inleirakel.
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Nangni karra inkhat in keelngam inkhat anei halli khawa kha inthuuk khur inkhat ah Sernikhuo ni ata inle ama'n mahuum li keisuo makniya be?
Miring inkhat in keelngam inkhat neek ah aman atamwiai! khawa jarra, Sernikhuo ni chuon katha thosik hi Dan izoot kha eii.”
Halli ama'n kut kathi mipa diang ati, “Nakut heisoonro.” Ama'n akut aheisoon, halli kaangkhat tiangle in-angrip ah, akut kha adamjei.
Halli Pharisee ngai'n insuok ah khat-um Jisu thatnasik ah ininsiam jei.
Jisu'n ama chungnga thatnasik ininsiam kha ajetpha, khawa mun makheiya aleisijei; khat-um mi katamtak in ama inleijui. Ama'n akana rakip aleimindam
halli inmani diang ama jarra aleiilak ngai diang rilpi maknasik ah chong kanatak aleipeii.
Hiwa ama'n athona jarchu Pathian chongkachoipa Isaiah diangnga Pathian in angme ileiti kha huui tungnasik eii:
“Enru, kei'n kikadang jei, kasuok, kiminriangpa kha, achungnga kamalung atai, Kei'n ama chungnga karatha kajuotirsik eii, halli ama'n zaat rakip diang kachongtanna kha arilsuoksik eii.
Ama'n murruolsiak thonuni emakli kheeknuni, halli tu inkhat innum lampui ngaikhan arasa jetnunu.
Matorna chongtan katuun aminsi maklaiseng, ama'n tuoitung kakui inkhat minkiak nuni, thisikkatho meiser kha thatnuni.
halli ama chungnga mi rakip in ngamna indasik eii.”
Miring lekkhat in Jisu diang raikhuo kaluut mitkacho khat-um chongkaril theimak miring inkhat inhongruoi. Jisu'n mipa kha aleimindam, khawa jarra ama'n chong rilthei jei halli amujei.
Mipui rakip in Jisu ithohi angme tia inleingak, “Amahi David Sapa emak be?” tia inmani'n inleirakel.
Pharisee ngai'n hiwahi inleijet pha, inmani'n inleimasang, “Ama'n raikhuo ngai ipuut suok hi inmani lamkakei Beelzebul in ama diang ranak ape jarra eii.”
Jisu'n angme inmani ngaidon kha aleijet, halli inmani diang ama'n aleiril, “Rengram rakip in intheinuo ah rup inthenkhoiya inkhat li inkhat ininsuol inchu kasoot ah ngirmatornunu. Halli khuopui inkhattak emakli innsuungkhur inkhat li inkhat ininsuolla rup inthenkhoi inchu lekni ah chulsik eii.”
Ajarchu Seitan in Seitan kha apuutsuok inchu ama amatak chungnga inthenkhoi jei, kha ejei inle ama rengram kha langir matorniabe?
Kei'n Beelzebul ranak ah raikhuo ngai kapuut suok inle ningnuk kajui ngai'n tu ranak ah inmani inpuut suok me? khawa jarra inmani'n nangni chongkatan ngaikha in esik ejei!
Takkha kei'n Pathian ratha ah raikhuo ngai hi kapuut suok jei inchu Pathian Rengram kha nangni chungnga ajuokatung ejei.
“Emakli akaraat mipa kha ma-insa ah khit leiya tume mi karaatpa inn kha makoi li ama phurpai ngai kalei matorsik? Inkhit suoli bit ama inna kaom phurngai kha amaruup matorsik eii.”
Tu e-innum kei le inruoimak ama kha kei na-inhalpui eii; halli tu e-innum kei le inruoiya nakakhompui mak ama kha inthiangnga akakalekchen kha eii.
Hiwajarra kei'n nangni diang kiril eii, miring ngai manu rakip le inmani'n inril akathamak rakip kha inngaidam pisik eii, takkha tu e-innum Ratha Inthiang kha kase ah karil kha rangaidam nuni.
Halli Miring Sapa chungnga karilse tuka-ang ama kha arangaidam sik eii, takkha Ratha Inthiang chungnga akaril tuka-ang ama khachu tuun emakli apha rakip ah rangaidam omnuni jei.
“Thingkuung kha mintharu halli akara kha atha sik eii; emakli thingkuung kha minthamaru halli ama kara kha thanuni, ajarchu thingkuung khachu ama kara khanna nijet eii.”
E, maruul tusuon ngai, nangni'n kathachu emak chu ah angtho-thoa akatha chong ningril sikme? Ajarchu angme ningmalungnga kasip ngaikha murra ningrilsuok.
Mikatha mi'n akatha phur kha akarei makheiya akatha phur aheikeisuo, khat-um akathamak mi in akathamak phur kha akarei makheiya akathamak phur ngai aheikeisuo.
“Kei'n nangni diang karil, mi ngai'n inleiril chongriam rakip ngai Chongtan Nikhuo khan ajar kha inlape sik eii.
Ajarchu nang hi akadik emakli kadikmak eii ti malar nasik nachongril ngaikha neiman inta nang kha chong innatanna sik eii.”
Halli Dan ocha lekkhat li Pharisee lekkhat ngai'n inti, “Ocha,” “keini'n nang diangnga chuon-inlak inkhat nitho kinmuzoot.”
“Khawakhan Jisu'n aleimasang, kathamak li zool-inthai tuunna khang mi ngai'n chuon-inlak kha innarakel, takkha Pathian chongkachoi Jonah diangnga inpe chuon-inlak kha elekleiya chuon inlak inkhat-um khawa khan napenuni jei.
Jonah apumtak nga kalok suungnga suunthum le zaanthum alei-om khale in-angrip ah, Miring Sapa kha nuoipil suungnga suunthum zaanthum alaomsik eii.
Nineveh mi ngai'n Chongtan Nikhuoni hongngir inta halli nangni kha noonkuung innape sik eii, ajarchu Jonah chongril kha inmani'n injet pha inmanuwa inphut inmalung inleithuul; kei'n nangni diang kiti khachu enru Jonah neek ah kalok inkhat hin aom.
Chongtan Nikhuoni khan Sheba Rengnu in hongngirta halli nangni kha noonkuung innapesik eii, ajarchu aram makheiya Reng Solomon singna iminchu kha akarangai sik aleihong; takkha enro, kei'n nangni diang kati, Solomon neek ah kalok inkhat kha hin aom!
“Miring inkhat suungnga ratha kathamak inkhat aheisuok pha, ama'n tui ommakna ramma aleisiya soongmachum nasik mun inkhat aleiratok, takkha leimumak.
Ama'n atheinuo ah inti, ‘Kei ka inna kei kirtak te.’ Halli ama akirra inn karuok, inthiang khat-um katha ah inda kha ajuomu.
Khawa phakhan ama asuok ah amaneek ah akathamak ratha sari aheiruoi, halli khawa khan inmani inhongnga in-om jei. Khawa jarra miringpa ringkhuo kha matiangnga omchan neek ah ahekna kha kheella thamakjei. Hiwahi eii tuunna khang mi kathamak ngai diang alakasuok sik.”
Jisu'n mipui ngaidiang chongril laitak khan, enru, anu le anai ngai'n ama in-inbiakpui zoot ah inmani'n tuolla inleingir.
Khawa jarra mi inkhat in ama diang aleiti, “Enro, nanu li nanai ngai'n nang inna-inbiakpui zoot ah inmani'n tuolla inngirra inom.”
Jisu'n ama diang aleimasang, “Tume kei kanu? Tu ngaime kei kanai ngai?”
Halli akut akhiinna asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Enru! Hinna kaom ngai hi kanu le kanai ngaikha in eii!
Ajarchu marwaanna kaom Kapa lungdou katho ngaikha kanai, kasar khat-um kanu in eii.”
Khawa nikhuo takkhan Jisu'n inn kha amathaanna asuok ah tuidiil khamtiang aleisi, khawakhan ama'n kaminchu sik ah alei in-ong.
Mipui katamtak ama koolla inlei inchun khawa jarra ama'n rakuong inkhat suungnga aluut ah alei in-ong, halli mipui katamtak in tuikham khan inleingir.
Khawa khan Jisu'n chongminkhina aneiya chong angjet inmani diang aleirilpi. “Enru, leikaneipa kha amuchi kawor sik aheisuok jei.
Ama'n leiya muchiru aheiwor pha, lekkhat in lamsirra achul, halli wa ngai inheiwa ah inruut li inbak.
Aru lekkhat in lung chungnga neipil toomna mun ngaikhan achul, neipil inthuukmak jarra aru kha innottheiya ahongkek.
Takkha kani hongsa phakhan achiak teii ngaikha inwuoi jei; ajarchu arajung kha inthuuk ah leisimak, khale inruoiya achiak ngaikha innot ah acharjei.
Aru lekkhat in raling karra achul, ahongmoong takkha achiak kha raling in amakhujei.
Aru lekkhat in neipil hoina khan achul, halli lekkhat in rajakhat, lekkhat in soomruk, khat-um lekkhat in soomthum ahong inra.”
Halli Jisu'n ahekna ah ati, “Akuor indou ama khan rangai rase!”
Khawasuo khan siamruoi ngai'n Jisu diang inhongnga inleirakel. “Angsikme nang in mipui ngaidiang chongnaril pha chongminkhina nineiman?”
Halli Jisu'n aleimasang, “Marwaan Rengram jarra inthup ngai jetnasik nangni diang innapejei, takkha inmani diang chu emak.”
Ajarchu mi kaneipa diang khan kheella inpedel sik eii; takkha iteii akaneimak mipa ama diangnga inphut inei lekteii kha um inkhaidel sik eii.
Kei'n chongminkhina kaneimanna inmani diang karilna ajarchu inmani'n in-en, takkha mumu, inrangai, takkha jetmu emakli ngaidon matormu.
Halli Isaiah chongril kha inmani diang pui ahongtung jei: Hiwa mi ngai'n rangai chu rangai inte, takkha jetnunu; inmani'n enchu en inte, takkha mununu,
ajarchu inmani malungnga jetzootmu, inmani inkuor khan rangai zootmu halli inmit kha inkasiingdel. Kha emak inchu, inmani inmit in inmusik eii, inkuor khan inrangai sik eii, inmalung khan injetsik eii, Pathian in ati, inmani kei diang inhong inletsik eii, halli kei'n inmani kamindam sik eii.
“Nangni sik ah chu, angtuk ningrawaan kathame! Ning mit in amu halli ning kuor in ajet.
Nangni diang inthiangnga kei'n karil khachu Pathian chongkachoi ngai li mi katuun ngai'n angme nangni imu kha inleimu zoot, takkha leimu matormu, halli angme nangni ijet ngaikha leijet matormu.
“Hanchu, muchi kaworpa chongminkhi in angme iti kha rangairu halli inchuru.
Tu ennum Rengram jarra chong kha ajetli akangaidon tungmak ngai kha hiwa lamkoolla kachul muchiru khale in ang. Akathamak kha aheiwa ah inmani malung suungnga inwor muchi kha aleikhaipi.
Lungkarra kachul muchi khachu tuka-ang in chong kha injetli innot ah karok ah kakeiluut ngaikha tina eii.
Takkha inmani diang arajung kha inthuukmak jarra soot leidei matormu, Khawa chong jarra poongna emakli raalna aheiwa pha khan, inmani innot ah inmangjei.
Halli raling karra kachul muchiru ngaikhan tuka-ang chong kha kajet; takkha hiwa ringkhuo jarra poongna le neile nung manuomna ngaikhan chong kha adiip ah, inmani kakara mak ngaikha atina eii.
Halli neipil hoina munna inwor muchiru ngaikhan tuka-ang chong kha rangai li kajet: lekkhat in rajakhat, lekkhat in soomruk, halli lekkhat in soomthum kakara ngai tina eii.”
Jisu'n chongminkhi inkhat arilla aleiti: “Marwaan Rengram khachu miring inkhat in muchiru katha kha aleiya iwor khale in-ang.
Halli zaankhat, mi rakip inzaal pha, ama inhalpuipa kha aheiwa ah halli gehu karkhan leiharru aworra aleisijei.
Achiak ngaikha ahonglok halli abuo ahongsuok pha khanchu leihar ngai kha um indangjei.
Mipa suok ngaikhan ama diang inheiwa ah inti, ‘Ocha, nang in naleiya muchiru katha niwor emak abe? honname hiwa leihar ngai kaheiwa hi?’
‘Hichu naka enzootmak lekkhat itho eii,’ tia ama'n aleimasang. ‘Asuok ngaikhan amadiang inrakel, keini kinsili leihar ngai kinjuochuon sik hi namanuom be?’
Ama'n aleimasang, ‘Chuonmaru,’ ‘ajarchu nangni'n leihar ningchuon kaalkhan gehu lekkhat um inphoidel acha.
Gehu le leihar kha inniya inrakhool maklaiseng moongsuom tarasu. Kei'n leikarakhool ngai diangkhan tipitakte ma-insa ah leihar kha khoomchun inlang haal sik ah khitchunru, halli gehu kha khomchun inlang kei sapang khan juothunru.’ ”
Jisu'n inmani diang chongminkhina khat apenook ah ati: “Marwaan Rengram khachu miring inkhat in anchamru kha aleili ama leiya iwor hile in-ang.
Hiwahi muchiru rakip karra akasiin khet kha eii, takkha ahongmoong pha khanchu, thingchiak ngai karra akalok khet thingkuung ahong eii. Khawajarra lairalak ah wa ngai'n inheiwali abaak ngaikhan inrabu inhong phan.”
Jisu'n inmani diang chongminkhina inkhat arilnook ah ati: “Marwaan Rengram khachu, numeisa inkhat in chol lekkhat aleiya waipooldi saida inthum khan minchella chol hongthei maklaiseng ida khale in-ang.”
Jisu'n hiwa rakip ngaihi chongminkhina kha aneimanna mipui diang aleiril; ama'n chongminkhina neiman lekleiya iteii um inmani diang leirilmak.
Ama'n hiwa itho ngaihi Pathian chongkachoipa ileiril kha huui tungnasik eii, “Chongminkhina neimankata kei'n inmani diang chong karilsik eii; Nuoipilchung inbool makheiya inthup rakip ngaikha inmani diang kei'n karilsuok sik eii.”
Jisu'n mipui ngai ada ah inn suungtiang aluut pha, ama siamruoi ngai inheiwa ah ama diang injuoti, “Leihar ruwa chongminkhina hin angme tina keini diang narilpiro.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Muchiru katha kaworpa kha Miring Sapa kha eii;
lei khan nuoipilchung hi eii; muchiru katha ngaikhan Rengram mi ngaikha in eii; leihar ngaikhan Akathamakpa sangai kha in eii;
Halli inhalpui leiharru kaworpa ama khan Seitan kha eii. Saangrakhool pha khan nuoipilchung hekni kha eii, halli saangkarakhool ngaikhan marwaan tirton ngaikha in eii.
Leihar ngaikha inkhoomchunna meiya inhaalle in angrip ah, nuoipilchung hekni khannum hi angnga alasuoksik eii:
Miring Sapa in ama marwaan tirton ngaikha juotirta mi ngai manu ah kamachul ngaile thomaksik katho ngai rakip ama Rengram makheiya alaminchunsik eii,
halli inmani kha meisuungnga indeengluutsik eii, khawamun khan inmani chap le hakarialna inlanei sik eii.
Pa Rengram khan Pathian mi ngai'n kani angnga inlawar sik eii. akuor indou ama khan rangai rase!
“Marwaan Rengram hi, Miring inkhat in leiya inphuumma kaom amankatam neinaak inmu khale in-ang. Ama'n amakhudella karok ah asiya ineirakip ajuorra, halli akirra lei kha ajuo incho jei.
“Halli Marwaan Rengram hi, Mi inkhat in lungman katamkhet iratok khale in-ang,
ama'n lungmankatam amu pha, ama asiya, inei rakip kha ajuorra halli khawa lungman katam kha ajuo incho jei.
“Woikhat um, marwaan Rengram hi, ngaphung rakip kasur ngakasurmi lekkhat in tuidiil suungnga inmani leen inwor khale in-ang.
Leen kha asip pha, inmani'n tuikham tiang inkeisuo ah halli in-in ongnga nga katha seng kha paisuungnga inthun halli kathamak sengkha inkalekjuon jei.
Nuoipilchung hekni um hiwa laka ang sik eii: marwaan tirton ngaikhan lajuo inta mi katha ngai diangnga inphut mi kathamak ngai kha lathen inta
halli inmani ngaikha meisuungnga inlahiailuut sik eii, khawa munkhan inmani chap le hakarialna inneisik eii.
“Hiwa rakip hi nangni ningjet jeibo?” tia Jisu'n inmani diang aleirakel. “Kinjetjei” tia inleimasang.
Halli khan ama'n aleimasang, “Hiwa tinachu, marwaan Rengramma siamruoi ka eii Sinadan ocha rakip ngai'n ama neinaak bukna makheiya inphut phur kathar li maruo heikakeisuo inn-pupa khale in-ang.”
Jisu'n hiwa chongminkhina arilsuo pha, ama'n khawa munkha aleimathaan jei
halli ama'n akhuo tiang akirnook jei. Inmani Synagogue khan aleiminchu, halli ama minchuna kajet rakip in inleingak ah inti, “Huwa makheiya ama'n hinnakati singwar imume?” Inmani'n inleirakel. “Halli chuon inlak ngai hile imume?
Amahi thingchuon kathopa sapa emak abe? Anu Mary, James, Joseph, Simon khat-um Judas anai ngai emuwabe?
Asar ngai rakip um einile hin niomsuom emak abe? Hunname hiwa rakip ama'n imu hi?”
Khan intia inmani'n ama kha leizootmu jei. Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Pathian chongkachoi inkhat hi amun rakip ah khoya intho takkha akhuo li a innsuungkhur mi ngai inchu khoya thomu.”
Ajarchu inmani'n leingamnamu jarra, khawakhan ama'n chuon-inlak kha katamma leithomak.
Khawapha takkhan Galilee ramkaroonpa Herod in Jisu jarra aleijet.
“Ama hi inthiangnga John Baptist, athiya inphut akaringnook eii tia asuok ngaidiang aleirilpi. Khawa jarra ama'n hinna kati chuon-inlak thomatorna ranak inei eii.”
Ajarchu Herod in anaipa Philip numei Herodias jarra John hi asurra, halli akhit ah mikhumna khan aleida.
Ajarchu John in Herod diang aleiti, “Herodias naneisik hi nangsik ah dan katuun kha emak!”
John kha Herod in aleithat zoot, takkha ama'n Jihudi mipui ngai kha aleichi, ajarchu inmani'n John hi Pathian chongkachoi inkhat eii tia inleilei.
Herod inneina nikhuo khan Herodias sanu in mipui rakip maikuungnga aleilaam. khawa jarra Herod in amalung atai heiya
kei'n khomaak ka-insaam khachu, nang in napero nititak kha “Kei'n kanape sik eii tia, ama diang chong alei inkhit!”
Ama'n anu chongrilpi dungjuiya Herod diang aleini, “Hiwahin tuun kei diang John Baptist lukha bukheeng chungnga da-inlang napero!”
Reng Herod kha amalung aleipoong, takkha ama'n ama mi ngai maikuungnga achong-inkhitna dungjuiya ama imanuom kha thopinasik ah chong aleipeii.
Khawa jarra ama'n mikhumna ah kaom John lu kha ajomintan.
Khawa lu kha bukheeng chungnga inheichoiya nungaaknu diang inleipeii halli ama'n anu diang aleichoi jei.
John siamruoi ngai kha inheiwa ah, akaluong kha inleichoiya inleiphuum; halli inmani inkirra Jisu diang inleirilpi jei.
Jisu'n John jarra chong ngai ajet pha, ama'n rakuong achuongnga khawa munkha amathaanna halli atheinuo ah mirasa neimakna muntiang aleisi. Khawa kha mipui'n inleijet, halli inmani'n inkhuopui inmathaanna kelamma anuk inleijui.
Jisu'n rakuongnga inphut ajuochum, halli mipui katamtak ngaikha ajomu pha, ama malung suungnga minriang khan aleisip, khawa jarra kana ngaikha aleimindam.
Khawani kholeitiang ama siamruoi ngai'n inheiwa ah inti, “Tuunchu khuo aboijei, halli hiwa munhi um mi ommakna ram eii, mi ngai hi minsi suotaro halli inmani'n inkhuo ngaikhan sisu-inlang inmani sik bak-in jo-incho tarasu.”
Jisu'n aleimasang. “Inmani simarasu,” “Inmani diang nangni'n baksik lekkhat kha peru!”
Inmani'n inleimasang, “Keini'n waipool ranga li nga inni kinnei.”
Jisu'n ati, “Khawa kha e-inchu hin keidiang heichoiru.”
Ama'n mipui ngaikha leihar chungnga in-ong nasik chong aleipeii; halli ama'n waipool ranga le nga inni kha aleiya, marwaan tiang enna halli Pathian diang aleiminpaak, Ama'n waipool kha katherkhoiya asiamruoi ngaidiang aleipeii, halli asiamruoi ngai'n mipui ngaidiang inleisempi.
Akabak rakip ngaikha inleikhop, halli akaliam ngaikha siamruoi ngai'n inkhomchunna kokwar soomleini aleisip.
Khawa aleikabak mi ngaikha numeisa naipang teelleiya, pasal seng lising ranga inlei eii.
Khawasuo ama'n mipui ngaikha aminsi pha Jisu'n asiamruoi ngai kha um rakuong minchuongnga tuidiil raalkhat tiang ama matiang aleiminsi jei.
Mipui ngaikha atir suoli, ama'n nina sik atheinuo ah chingtiang aleikal. Kholei hongtung pha, khawa munkhan Jisu atheinuo ah aleiom;
tuikham makheiya rakuong khan tuidiil lai aheitung pha thipuile inintongnga, rakuong kha tuiphuuksan in aseemma leisi matormak jei.
Ziingtiang phadan inthum li kuruk pheiwei khan, Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang tuichungnga aheiwa.
Inmani'n tuichungnga ama iheiwa kha inleimuwa inmani'n inleichi. “Hiwa hi ratha kathamak eii!” intia chile inruoiya inmani'n inleikheek.
Jisu'n inmani diang khawalai takkhan aleiti, “Malung mindong maru!” “Chimaru Kei ka eii!”
Halli Peter in aleimasang, “Pumi, inthiangnga nang na-e inchu, nakoolla kei'n tuichungnga heiwa nasik chong napepiro.”
“Heiwaro” Jisu'n aleimasang. Khawa jarra Peter in rakuong makheiya achumma Jisu diang tuichungnga kasi aphut jei.
Takkha ama'n thipui kangar kha amu pha, ama'n aleichi halli tui suungtiang kaluut phutjei. “Pumi, Nasanro!” tia aleikheek.
Khawalai takkhan Jisu'n akut sonna ama mahuumma ati, “E inngamna kasiin! angsikme ni-inngamsam?”
Inmani inin-niya rakuong khan inluutli, thikaraang kha ajuodai jei.
Halli rakuong suungnga kaom siamruoi ngai'n Jisu kha chubei inleitho. “Inthiangnga nangchu Pathian Sapa na eii!” tia inmani'n inti.
Inmani'n tuidiil kha inrakanna Gennesaret ram khan inheiwa jei,
khawa munna kaom mipui ngai'n Jisu kha inleijet, khawa jarra inmani'n chong inpeya khawa ramkoolla kaom akana mi rakip Jisu diang inmani'n inhong ruoi.
Inmani'n Jisu diang apuon morbit katook nasik ah nina inleinei; halli akakatook rakip ngaikha inleidam jei.
Halli Jerusalem makheiya Pharisee lekkhat le sina Dan ocha ngai'n Jisu diang inhongnga inhongrakel,
“Angsikme nasiamruoi ngai'n upa ngai sinadan kha inmakoi? Inmani'n inbak maklai inkut kha rasumu!”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Hanchu angtiyame nangni'n Pathian chongpeii juimakchuwa nangni ngai sinadan kha ning ijui?
Ajarchu Pathian in aleiti, ‘Nanu li napa kha khoya thoro,’ halli ‘Nang in nanu li napa diang khomaak nasaam inchu, nang kha innathat sik eii.’
Takkha nangni'n ningti, khachu mi inkhat in anu emakli apa diang santhei lekkhat inei kha, ‘Hiwahi Pathianta ejei ti-inchu,’
ama'n anu emakli apa kaya sik hi arei suokmak. Nangni minchuna kha juinasik ah hiwa lam tiang nangni'n Pathian chongpe kha kaya makchu jei.
Nangni akatha omchan kathongai! Angtuk katuunme nangni jarra Pathian chongkachoipa Isaiah ileirilsuok kha!
‘Pathian in ati, hiwa mi ngai'n, kei hi inmur beiya khoya innatho, takkha inmalung chu kei diangnga inphut kalaak ah in-om.
Kei chubei innathohi inmani sik anemna ommak ajarchu inmani'n miring sinadan ngaikha Kei sinadan ngai angnga inminchu!’ ”
Halli Jisu'n mipui ngai kha akoiya inmani diang ati, “Rangairu halli jetru!
Ning bai suungnga kaluut khan nangni naminchok mak; khawa neek ah ahong kasuok khan nangni anaminchok.”
Halli siamruoi ngai'n ama diang inheiwa ah inti, “Nang in tuuntak angme niril khan Pharisee ngai malung namintookpi nang nijetmak be?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Marwaanna kaom kapa ilingmak thingkuung rakip inlaphuk sik eii.
Inmani sik ngaidon pimaru! Inmani chu mitkacho ngai lamkakei mitkacho kha in eii; mitkacho inkhat in mitkacho kha lam akei inchu inin nireella khurra inta sik eii.”
Peter in Jisu diang aleiti, “Hiwa chongminkhina hi keini diang narilcheen piro.”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni tuun katung aleiilak ngai neek ah lajetmak chu.
Nangni ningmurra kaluut phurrakip kha ningwon suungnga aluut halli ningpum makheiya asuok tihi nangni ninglajetmak be?
Takkha murra hongkasuok kha malungnga inphut eii, halli hiwa ngaihin nangni anaminchok.
Ajarchu ningmalungnga inphut ah akathamak ngaidonna, mithatna, zool-inthaina, halli aleiilak thamakna katho; inrupmaret, maleisei halli aleiilak karilse ngaihi hongkasuok eii.
Hiwa ngai rakip in nangni naminthiangmak. Takkha inmani iti angnga kut rasuleiya inbak in nangni naminchok mak.”
Khawa munkha Jisu'n aleimathaanna Tyre li Sidon ram koolla aleisi.
Khawa ramma kaom Canaan numeisa inkhat ama diang hongnga, halli akheek ah ati, “David Sapa!” “Kei naminriangro, ocha! Kei kasanu kha raikhuo aluut ah poongtheiya omjei.”
Takkha Jisu'n chongbai inkhat um ama diang leimasang mak. Asiamruoi ngai'n amakoolla inheiwa ah inti, “Ama minsitaro! Ama'n eini nuk anajuiya akheek ah om!”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Israel keelngam inmang ngai sikbit ah kei innajuo tir eii.”
Halli numeisa inkhat aheiwa ah akekuungnga inbok li, “Ocha, kei nasanro!” ati.
Jisu'n amasang, “Naipang ngai bu an kha leili ui ngai diang pesik hi akatuun emak.”
“Atuun khawa kha, ocha,” numeisanu khan aleimasang, “Takkha ui innum inmapupa bubakna makheiya juokata buramol ngai kha inbak.”
Khawajarra Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Nangchu ngamna kalok numeisa na-eii! angme nimanuom kha nang sik ah inthorase.” Halli khawa phatak khan asanu kha adamjei.
Jisu'n khawamun amathaanna Galilee tuidiil tiang aleisi halli chingtiang akalla alei in-ong.
Mipui katamtak amadiang inleihong, kekakiak, mitkacho, ka-inkhooi, chongkasuokmak halli akana mi lekkhat, Jisu kekuungnga inhongruoi; halli inmani ngai kha ama'n aleimindam.
Khawa khan chongkasuokmak ngai'n chong inril, akeii inkhooi ngai'n indam, kasi theimak ngai'n insi khat-um mitkacho ngai'n inmu hi mipui'n inmu pha; Israel Pathian kha inminpaak.
Jisu'n asiamruoi ngai akoolla akoiya aleiti, “Kei'n hiwa mipui ngaihi kaminriang, ajarchu inmani keile inruoiya nithum kinhong omjei tuunchu inmani bak sik inkhat-um neimujei. Kei'n inmani ngai hi bak-inleiya minsizoot mong, ajarchu inmani'n inntiang insipha phai-inwai inte.”
Siamruoi ngaikhan ama diang inheiti, “Hunmo hiwa neelram hin hiwa mipui ngai sik kahun bu le an joleimin?”
“Waipool angjet nangni ningnei me?” Jisu'n aleirakel. “Waipool sari,” “le nga kasiin lekkhat,” kinnei tia inmani'n inleimasang.
Khawa jarra Jisu'n mipui ngai neipilla in-ong nasik chong aleipeii.
Khawasuoli ama'n waipool sari le nga aleiya, Pathian aleiminpaak, halli kather khoiya asiamruoi ngaidiang aleipeii; woikhat um asiamruoi ngai'n mipui ngaidiang inleisempi.
Inraya ah inbak halli inleikhop. Khawasuo ah siamruoi ngai'n akaliam seng inkhoomma kokwar sari aleisip.
Numeisa khat-um naipang teelleiya khawa kabak pasal seng lisingmili daam inlei eii.
Khawasuo khanchu Jisu'n mipui ngaikha aleiminsi jei, halli rakuong suungkhan aluut ah Magadan ramtiang aleisijei.
Pharisee khat-um Sadducee lekkhat in Jisu diang inhongnga ama surnasik ah marwaanna chuon inlak inkhat nathopi inlang naminmuro inhongti.
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Kani joluut pha, ‘Khuo thasik eii, ajarchu marwaanna kool-eng asuok ningti.’
Halli ziingtiang makhan nangni'n ningti, ‘Wini chu ruo asursik eii, ajarchu marwaan asen khat um aziing,’ nangni'n nikhuo omchan ning en li angme kasuok sik ningril mator, takkha hiwa apha jarra akasuok chuon inlak ngaichu nangni'n angme suoksik tia rilmator makchu!
Hituk kathamak li Pathian kajetmak winiya mi ngai'n chuon inlak kha inratok! Takkha Jonah diangnga chuon inlak kha eleiya chuon inlak inkhat nangni diang napenunijei.” Halli ama'n inmani ada ah asijei.
Halli siamruoi ngai'n tuidiil kham inkhattiang inheirakaan pha, inmani'n waipool kha hongchoisik inleimanil jei.
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “In ensuiru; Pharisee ngaili Sadducee ngai cholla inphut khan.”
Inmani inkhat li inkhat karra ininbiak ah inti, “Ama'n hiwa atina ajarchu eini waipool heichoi makmi.”
Jisu'n angme inmani itikha aleijet, khawa jarra inmani diang aleirakel, E ngamna kasiin ngai “Nangni inkhat li inkha waipool ningnei makna jarra angsik ah ning inbiak me?
Tuun katung nangni lajet makchu be? Kei'n miring lising ranga waipool ranga ah kiwai halli akaliam kokwar angjetme ningminsip nangni ngaidon makchube?
Halli miring lising mili sik ah waipool sari ah kawaili kokwar angjetme nangni'n ningruut minsip?
Kei'n nangni diang waipool jarra rilmong angsik ame khawa ning ijetmak? Pharisee li Sadducee ngai cholla inphut nangni'n in-ensuiru!”
Khawasuo khanchu ama'n inmani diang in-ensuiru tia irilhi waipool khanna inneiman chol kha emak takkha Pharisee li Sadducee ngai minchuna ngai khanna inphut eii ti asiamruoi ngai'n inleijet.
Jisu'n Caesarea Philippi ram koolla kaom khuopui khan aheiwa pha, ama'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleirakel, “Miring Sapa hi mi ngai'n tu eii intime?”
Inmani'n inleimasang, “Mi lekkhat in John Baptist na-eii inti,” “Lekkhat in Elijah na-eii inti, halli lekkhat ngai'n Jeremiah emakli Pathian chongkachoi ngai karra inkhat na-eii inti.”
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleirakel, “Nangni inle Keihi tu ka-eii ningtime?”
Simon Peter in aleimasang, “Nangchu Messiah, akaring Pathian Sapa kha na-eii.”
“Bar-Jonah sapa Simon, narawaan atha!” tia Jisu'n aleimasang. “Ajarchu hiwa akatuun hi miring taksa ah inphut nangdiang akajuo emak, takkha marwaanna kaom Kapa diangnga inphut akajuo eii.
Tuun khawa jarra Kei'n nangdiang kati, nang Peter na-eii (tinachu ‘lung’), hiwa lungpui chunghin Kei'n kakoisuok kasaksik eii, halli khawakha meikhur luutna kot innum matornuni.
Kei'n nangdiang marwaan Rengram sou kha kanapesik eii; nang in nuoipil chungnga nikhit kha marwaan khannum inkhitsik eii, halli nuoipil chungnga nimasuo kha marwaan khannum insuosik eii.”
Khawa suoli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang ama hi Messiah eii ti tu inkhat diang um rilpimaru tia chong aleipeii.
Khawapha makheiya Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang, “Kei Jerusalemma kasisik eii halli uparup ngai, thiampu kalian ngai halli sina Dan ocha ngai diangnga inphut kalapoong sik eii. Halli kei innalathat sik eii, takkha nithumni kalahong ringsik eii.” tia inthiangnga karilpi aphut jei.
Peter in ama kha kaangkhat tiang aruoiya aheiran. “Pumi, khawa kha Pathian in kalaak ah nadapi rase!” ama'n aleiti. “Khawa kha angtikniteii nachungnga kasuok emarase!”
Jisu'n ahei-inlet ah Peter diang ati, “Kei diangnga inphut siro, Seitan! Nang hi kei diang insuina inkhat na-ejei, ajarchu hiwa ngaidonna ngai hi Pathian diangnga inphut akajuo emak takkha miring omchanna inphut eii.”
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Nangni karra tuka-ang inkhat in kanuk najuizoot inchu, ama apumtak ah inzootmak se-inlang, ama cross indom rase, halli kanuk najuirase.
Ajarchu naringkhuo sanringsik namanuom inchu, amangsik eii; halli keisik naringkhuo naminmang inchu, khawa kha nalamusik eii.
Nuoipil pumpui namatorli naringkhuo naminmang inchu angme nanemna sik? Emakli mi inkhat in angleme aringkhuo aminthuul sik?
Ajarchu Miring Sapa in Apa lurna lianna khan ama marwaan tirton ngaile inruoiya ajuosik eii, halli khawa phakhan ama'n mi rakip ama chuonleitho dungjuiya atum apesik eii.
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiril eii, hiwa hinna tuun kangirra kaom lekkhat chu Miring Sapa in Reng eya ijuo inmu makma thinunu.”
Halli niruk suoa Jisu'n Peter le anaipa James halli John, ama'n aruoiya inmani bit omnasik ching insaang inkhat khan aleisipui.
Inmani'n khan inhei enlai, Jisu inmani maikuungnga ameelsuo hong inthuul jei: ama meel kha kani angnga aleiwar, halli ama puondiar ngaikha war angnga aleichek.
Halli siamruoi inthum ngai'n Moses khat-um Elijah Jisu le inruoiya thurchi inril inleimu.
Khawa jarra Peter in Jisu diang ati, “Pumi, eini'n hinna ni-om hichu angtuk kahoi me! nang in nazoot inchu, kei'n riakbuk inthum sakkate, nang sik inkhat, Moses sik inkhat, halli Elijah sik inkhat.”
Ama'n aril laichei khan, enru, akawar sumphai'n inmani aleimakhu, halli sumphaiya inphut rasa inkhat in ajuoti, “Hiwa hi kiminriang tak kasapa kha eii, ama chungnga kamalung atai; nangni ama iti rangairu!”
Siamruoi ngaikhan rasa kha injetpha, inmani inleichithei, halli neipilchungnga inmani inmeel inkuunna inlei inbok.
Jisu'n inkoolla aheiwa ah akatook ah ati, “Intheiru, chimaru!”
Halli inmani'n inhong enpha Jisu eleiya tu inkhat bit um khawakhan leimumujei.
Inmani'n khan chingnga inphut injuo chumpha, Jisu'n inmani diang, “Miring Sapa in thiya inphut ahongring maklaiseng, tu inkhat diang um nangni'n ning imu ngaikha rilsuok maru tia inmani diang chong aleipeii.”
Halli siamruoi ngai'n Jisu diang inleirakel, “Angsikme sina Dan ocha ngai'n Elijah ajuo masasik eii inti?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Inthiangnga Elijah juomasata,” “halli angrakip hi alaminsuuk wiaksik eii.
Takkha kei'n nangni diang kati khachu Elijah kha ajuosuojei takkha mi ngai'n ama leijetmu, takkha inmani'n inmanuom kha ama chungnga inleitho. Khawale in-angrip ah Miring Sapa kha um inmani'n inminpoong nooksik eii.”
Khawa phakhan ama'n John Baptist jarra iril eii ti asiamruoi ngai'n inleijet.
Inmani'n mipui ngaidiang injuokir pha, miring inkhat Jisu diang aheiwa, halli amaikuungnga chubei ajuotho,
halli ati, “Ocha, kasapa hi naminriang piro! Ama hi rikeiri araweiya apoongthei jei ajarchu ama tuisuung meisuungnga aluut kachak jei.
Kei'n nasiamruoi ngaidiang kaleiruoi, takkha inmani'n namindampi matormu.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “E ngamna kasiin le mi kathamak ngai! Angtuk kasootme kei nangni le kalaom suomsik hi? Kei'n nangni le angtuk kasoot kanaladeipui sikme? Naipangpa kha hin kakoolla heiruoi ro!”
Jisu'n ratha kathamak diang khan chong aleipeii, halli ratha kathamak kha naipangpa diangnga inphut aleisuok, khawa phachei khan naipangpa kha adamjei.
Halli siamruoi ngai'n ruuk ah Jisu diang inheiwa ah inleirakel, “Angjarra keini'n ratha kathamak kha kinpuutsuok matormakme?”
“Ajarchu ning inngamna kha asiin thei,” tia Jisu'n aleimasang. “Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kati khachu anchamru tiatbit kalok inngamna ningnei inchu, nangni'n hiwa ching diang tiningte, ‘hiwa hinna inphut soson inthonro!’ halli khawa khan inthonsik eii. Halli nangni thomatormak sik iteii omnuni!”

Siamruoi rakip in Galilee khan injuo inchunwiak phakhan, Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Miring Sapa kha mi ngai kutchungnga inlapesuok sik eii
halli inmani'n ama kha inlathatsik eii; takkha nithum huuini ama ahongringsik eii.” Hiwa injetpha siamruoi ngaikha inleipoong theijei.
Jisu le asiamruoi ngai'n Capernaum inheitung pha, nina inna sialkakhompa in Peter diang aheiwa ah aleiti, “Nangni ning ochapa'n Biak-inna pesik kasuok sial kha pemak abe?”
“Oh apeii,” tia Peter in aleimasang. Peter khan innsuung aluutpha, Jisu'n ma-insa khet ah aril, “Simon, angme nangleii ningaidon? Hiwa nuoipilchung reng ngaidiang tu ngai inme rampar inpejol? Aram mi-ngai inbe emakli ramleiilak mi ngai inbe?”
“Mi leiilak ngai'n,” tia Peter in aleimasang. “Kha e-inchu athajei,” tia Jisu'n aleiti, “kha tina chu ami ngai inchu penunu.
