Takkha eini'n hiwa mi ngaihi minpoong zootmakmi, khawa jarra siro tuidiil khan ngakhuoi jokeiro, halli ma-insakhet ah nisur ngabai khan sial lei omte, Kha lei inlang kei sik le nang sik inmani diang pero” ati.
Khawa phakhan siamruoi ngai'n Jisu diang inheiwa ah injuorakel, “Tume marwaan Rengramma akalok khetsik?”
Khawa jarra Jisu'n naipang inkhat akoiya halli inmani maikuungnga aleiminngir,
Halli ama'n ati, “Kei'n inthiangnga karil khachu nangni'n ningmanuwa inphut ninghei inlet ah naipang ngaihi ninghong angmak inchu, nangni angtikniteii marwaan Rengram kha luut theinutun.”
Khawa jarra hiwa naipanghi angnga atheinuo ah anunchan inchuol ama khan marwaan Rengramma kalokkhet sikkha eii.
Hi angnga kei karamingnga hiwa ka-ang naipang inkhat akeiluut inchu, kei um anakeiluut jei.
“Tuka-ang inkhat in kei kanangamna hiwa naipang ngai inkhat ama inngamna aminmangpi inchu, ama riingnga akalok lungchakari inkhit ah tuipui inthuuk suungnga indeengluut khan ama sik ah kheella atha.”
Mi ngai inngamna kaminmang in-om jarra manmasituolhi angtuk poong kaom sik me! hiwa rakip ngaihi alahongsuok sik eii, takkha hiwarakip kamasuok ama kha angtuk poongkaom sik me!
“Ajarchu nakut emakli nakeii in manuwa namachulsik e-inchu, tan inlang hiaijuonro! nakut inni le nakeii inni inchella hektik kaboi meisuungnga in nadeengluut siknek achu kutkhat kekhat inchelleiya ringna kamukhan athadoom.”
Halli namit in nang kha manuwa namachul sik e-inchu, kelsuok inlang hiaijuonro! namit innile inruoiya hektik kaboi meikhurra kaluut sik nek achu mit khat kaboiya ringnamun kaluut in kheella nangsik ah atha.
“Enru, nangni'n hiwa naipang ngai chungnga enseel-musit thomaru. Ajarchu kei'n nangnidiang kati, inmani marwaan tirton ngai'n marwaanna kaom kapa maikuungnga in-omchak.”
Ajarchu akamang ngai kasan sik ah miring Sapa ajuojei.
“Nangni'n angme ning ngaidon? miring inkhat in keelngam rajakhat aneili khawa ngai karra inkhat amang inchu, ama'n soomkuo leikuo ngaikha chingnga data halli akamang kha karatok asisik eii.”
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kati, khachu ama'n keelngam kha amupha, inmangmak soomkuo leikuo ngai neek ah kheella arokpui.
Hile in-angrip ah marwaanna kaom Kapa in hiwa naipang ngai karra inkhat kha um minmang zootmak.
“Nachungnga na-u nanai inkhat in manu atho inchu, akoolla si inlang halli ama masialna kha amadiang ruuk ah jominmuro. Ama'n nang iril kha arangai inchu, nang in na-u nanai kha woikhat naboolthar jei.
Takkha ama'n nachong kha arangai mak inchu, miring inkhat emakli inni ruoiro, ajarchu Pathian chong inthiang in iril angnga, Chongkasuok rakip sakhi inni emakli inthum baisuo ah chong intansik eii ati.
Khawa katung ama'n inmani kha arangai mak inchu, koisuok ngaidiang mindikro. Ahekna ah koisuok ngai itikha arangai mak inchu, ama kha Pathian kajetmak emakli rampar kakhoompa kha eii tia leitaro.”
“Inthiangnga nangnidiang kei'n karil: nangni'n nuoipil chungnga ningkhit kha marwaanna inkhitsik eii, halli nangni'n nuoipil chungnga ningmasuo kha marwaanna inmasuosik eii.”
“Woikhat um, kei'n nangnidiang karil: Nuoipilchungnga nangni inni'n angmekhat jarra ning inzootna inchu, marwaanna kaom Kapa in khawakha nangni sik ah inthiangnga anathopisik eii.
Ajarchu kei karamingnga inni emakli inthum ning inchunna munkhan, kei inmani le khawakhan kaom.”
Khawa phakhan Peter in Jisu diang aheiwa ah aleirakel, “Pumi, ka-u kanai inkhat in kei chungnga manu athopha, woi angjetme kei'n ama kangaidam sik? woisari katung bitbe?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Emak, woisari bit emak,” “takkha woisomsari hi sari chak, kei'n nangdiang kitikeeng,
ajarchu marwaan Rengram chu, Reng inkhat in asuok ngai sial-sum ensuisik ingaidon khale in-ang.
Ama'n ka-ensui aphut pha, talent lisingsoom ka-intuol miring inkhat kha akoolla aheiruoi.
Suokpa in asialpuuk thuulnasik kahun sial leineimak, Khawa jarra Rengpa in amadiang anumei, asa halli inei rakipkha intuol thuulnasik ah juojuorro tia chong aleipeii.
Khawa jarra suokpa khan Rengpa maikuungnga kemurkhup thep ah, kei nangaak diro, kei'n ki-intuol rakip nathuul kate ama'n ati!
Rengpa khan ama kha ahong minriangjei, halli intuol rakipkha arangaidam piya halli ama kha aleiminsijei.”
“Halli suokpa khan ahongsuok pha, asuok changpui inkhat ama sial talent lekkhat intuol alei-intongpui. Halli ama'n asurra ariing ma-ouwa, ‘ni-intuol kha nathuulro!’ ama'n aleiti.
Ama asuok changpuipa in inbok ah amadiang aleiti, ‘Kei nangaak diro, kei'n nathuul kate!’
Takkha ama'n leizootmak; khawa rathuulla, ama'n intuol athuulsuo maklaiseng mikhumna khan aleida.
Asuok changpui lekkhat in angme akasuok ngaikha inmupha, inmani inmalung leihoi pimak jei halli inkirra inrengpa diang angme kasuok rakip injuomindik jei.
Khawa jarra amapupa in suokpa kha akoiluut ah, ati. ‘Suok kathamak nang!’ Nang in kei diang nanani jarra, ‘nasialpuuk rakip kei'n kana ngaidampi jei.’
Kei'n nang kinaminriang angnga, nang innum nasuok changpuipa diang naminriang sik suokmakbe?
Rengpa kha araang theiya, asuokpa kha asialpuuk rakip athuulsuo maklaiseng mikhumna khan aleitirjei.”
Ahekna ah Jisu'n ati, “Nangni rakip in ning-u ningnai ngaikha ningmalungnga ning ngaidam mak inchu, marwaanna kaom kei Kapa innum kha angnga ningchungnga athosik eii.”
Jisu'n hiwa rakip ngaihi arilsuo pha, Galilee mathaanna halli Jordan tuidung raalkhat tiangnga kaom Judea ramtiang aleisi.
Mipui katamtak in ama inheijui, halli khawakhan inmani aleimindam.
Pharisee lekkhat in chong rakelli ama surnasik akoolla inheiwa, “Angmekhat jarra miring inkhat in anumei kha ama lungdouwa inthenpuisik hi eini sina Dan in azootbe?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Inphutna makheiya Kanaboolpa in pasal khat-um numeisa abool tihi nangni'n Pathian chong inthiang khan lateel makchube?
Pathian in ati, ‘Hiwajarra pasal inkhat in anu li apa mathaanta halli anumeile inchunsik eii, halli inmani innikha pumkhat inhong esik eii,’
Khawa jarra inmani inni ekhaimujei, takkha inkhat bitkha in ejei. Pathian in iminchun jeikha, mi inkhat in khoithen marase.”
Pharisee ngai'n amadiang inleirakel, “Angtiyame, hanle, Moses in inthenpuina chongmajia kha pasalpa in anumei diang pe-inlang inthenpuiro tia chongpeii ileipe?”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni ningmalung ningminngar jarra Moses in nangnidiang ningnumei ngai inthenpui acha tia inazootpi kha eii, Takkha inphutna achu kha lei-emak.
Kei'n nangnidiang kati, tuka-ang inkhat in anumei kha zool-inthai jarra eleiya inthenpuiya, halli numeisa khat aneirit inchu amakha zool-inthai athojei.”
Asiamruoi ngai'n amadiang inleiti, “Hiwa omchanhi aruothar li anumei karra asuok inchu, inn kaneimak khan athadoom.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Hiwa minchuna hi mirakip sik emak, takkha Pathian in ipe inmani ngaisik bit eii.
Ajarchu Mi ngai'n inn inneimakna jarra inteina om, lekkhat in anu wonsungnga atak inboolsa ah innei; lekkhat in miring ngai'n atak inbool; halli lekkhat in Marwaan Rengramsik ah inn kaneimak inom. Tuka-ang hiwa minchuna kazoot ngai'n hiwahi juirasu.”
Mi lekkhat in naipang ngai chungnga akut aduongnga anipi nasik Jisu diang inhongruoi, takkha siamruoi ngai'n inmani kha inleiran.
Halli Jisu'n ati, “Naipang ngaikha kakoolla hongrasu nangni'n khapmaru, ajarchu marwaan Rengram hi hiwa ka-ang ngaita eii.”
Ama'n inmani chungnga akut aduongpi halli khawa munna inphut asijei.
Enru, mi inkhat in Jisu diang ahongnga ati, “Ocha,” “Kei'n hektik kaneimak ringna kamunasik angkachang chuon katha khame kathosik?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Angsikme nang in akatha chuon jarra ninarakel?” “Akatha mi inkhat bit aom, khachu hektik kaneimak ringna kha naluutzoot inchu chongpeii ngaikha juiro.”
Jisu diang ama'n aleirakel, “Ang chongpeii ngai khame?” Jisu'n aleimasang, “Mi thatmaro; zool-inthaimaro; inruup thomaro; kadikmak sakhi pemaro;
nanu li napa kaya ro; halli ni-indiang ni-inwaipui ngaikha nang in napumtak ni-inriang angnga minriang ro.”
“Kei'n hiwa chongpeii rakip ngaihi kajuijei,” “Angme kei'n katho delsik?” tia ruotharpa in aleimasang.
Jisu'n amadiang aleiti, “Nang in puikatung na-ezoot inchu, si inlang nineirakip jojuorro halli sial kha sara ngaidiang juopero, halli marwaanna karei naneisik eii; hallikhan heiwaro, kei najuiro.”
Ruotharpa in hiwa itihi ajetpha, ama'n malung poongtheiya asijei, ajarchu ama inchongthei alei eii.
Khawa suoli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang ati, “Kei'n inthiangnga kiril eii: inchong mi in marwaan Rengram kaluutsik hi intak.
Woikhat kei'n nangnidiang kati: mi inchong inkhat in Pathian Rengram kaluutsik neek achu salaileem inkhat in simphuoi kuorra iluut in abeidet.”
Siamruoi ngai'n hiwa injetpha, inmani'n inthiangnga inleingak. halli, “Tume, ringna akamusik?” tia inmani'n inleirakel.
Jisu'n inmani diang enna aleimasang, “Hiwa hi miring ngaisik achu thomator emak, takkha Pathian inchu hiwarakip hi amator.”
Khawa phakhan Peter in aleimasang. “Enro,” “Keini'n hiwarakip kinda ah nanuk kinnajui. Keinisik ang omme?”
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kiti eii khachu Miring Sapa in ama apoinale inruoiya Manmasituol Kathar khan ama reng in-ongna khan in-ong pha, nangni anakajui soomleini ngai um reng in-ongna khan ningla in-ong sik eii, halli Israel zaat soomleini ngaikha chong katansik ni-eii.”
Kei sik jarra, a-inn alei, a-u anai, anu apa emakli asa ngai kada mi rakip in tum rajakhat kheella amusik eii halli hektik kaboi ringkhuo kha inmusik eii.
Takkha makasa katamkhat in nuk inlatongsik eii, halli nukkatong ngai khan ma-inlasasik eii.
“Marwaan Rengram hi, miring inkhat in ziingtiang ma-ah intheiya ama theibombilla chuonkathosik loom lekkhat karatok kasi khale in-ang.”
Ama'n nisuokhat chuontho manhi, dangkapum inkhat ah inzootpuiya, halli inmani ngaikha ama theibombilla chuonkathosik aleitir.
Halli ama'n phurjuorna munna asinook ah, i-kathomak kangirra kaom mi lekkhat kha phadan kuo khan aleimu,
halli ama'n inmanidiang ati, Kei'n pesik kasuok nisuokhat chuonthoman kha napekate, nangni um si inlang theibombilla chuon juothoru.
Halli inmani insijei. Ama'n inlet ah asuoknook ah phadan soomleini khat-um phadan inthum chulphakhan khawale in-angrip ah aleitho.
Kholei phadan ranga juochul pha ama'n phurjuorna munna asi ah, halli miring lekkhat kangirra kaom ajuo munook, halli inmanidiang ati, Nangni'n suunsoot iteii tholeiya ningngirra ning-omhi angsik ame?
Inmani'n inleimasang, tu inkhat innum loom naruoimu. Thajei, kha e-inchu, nangni si inlang theibombilla chuon juothoru, inmanidiang ama'n aleiti.
“Kholei aheitung pha, theibombil mapupa in ama chuon ka-ensui ngaidiang ati, ‘Chuon katho ngaikha koi inlang halli inchuon thoman kha nuk intong khet ah inruoi makheiya phut inlang ma-insa khet ah inruoi katung kha joperu.’
Phadan ranga pheiweiya chuonkaphut ngai rakip diang dangkapum inkhat inkhat inleipeii.
Khawa jarra loom ma-insa ngai'n inheiwapha, inmani'n katamdet mukinte tia inlei ngaidon; takkha inmani rakip um dangkapum inkhat inkhat inleipeii.
Inmani'n insial kha inleiya halli leimapupa chungnga num kati inleiphut.
‘Nuk intongnga loom niruoi ngai'n phadan inkhatbit chuon intho,’ inmani'n inti, ‘Keini'n suunsoot kanisa kindeiya chuon kintho, takkha keini diangnga ninapele in-angrip ah inmani diang um napeii!’
Khawa khan ama'n inmani diang aleimasang, ‘Rangairu, kasap ngai,’ tia leimapupa in inmani karra inkhatpa diang ati, ‘Kei'n nangnidiang maleisei thomong, nangnile suunkhat ah chuonthoman dangkapum inkhat ah ni-inzoot suo emak abe?
Tuun naleisik kha lei inlang na-inna siro. Nang diangnga kinape angnga nuk intong khet ah kiruoipa diang um kei'n kapezoot.
Kei kasial kha kalungdouwa thonasik ranak neimongnga be? Emakli kei kamalung inthiang hi ninara-ot be?’ ”
Ahekna ah Jisu'n ati, “Khawa jarra tuka-ang nuk intong ngaikhan ma-insasik eii, halli tuka-ang ma-insa ngaikhan nuk intongsik eii.”
Jisu'n Jerusalem tiang asilai, siamruoi soomleini ngai lamleii inkhattiang aleiruoi halli inmani'n khan insipha, ruuk ah inmani diang aleiril.
“Rangairu,” “Eini'n Jerusalem tiang nikalla nisi, khawamun khan Miring Sapa kha thiampu kalian ngai khat-um Dan ocha ngai kutchungnga inlapesik eii. Halli inmani'n amakha thatnasik ah akatuunmak eii tia inrilsesik eii, tia inmanidiang aleirilpi
halli khawa suo ah Zaatlop ngaidiang, ama innuipui nasik, wuoknasik halli Cross ah makaiya thatnasik inlapesik eii; takkha nithum nikhan ama alahongring nooksik eii.”
Khawasuoli Zebedee numei khan asangai innile inruoiya Jisu diang inhongnga, ama maikuungnga chubei inthoa, imanuom inkhat nathopiro tia amadiang aleini.
“Angme nimanuom?” Jisu'n amadiang aheirakel. Ama'n aheimasang, “Keidiang chong inkhitro, khawa khachu hiwa kasa inni ngaihi nang in Reng na-epha inkhat in nachangtiang halli inkhat in naweitiang in-ongrasu.”
Jisu'n hin tia aleimasang, “Nangni'n ningni kha angme ti jetmakchu,” “Kei'n ka-insik poongna rabing hi nangni'n inmator tunnabe?” “Keini kinmator,” tia inmani'n inleimasang.
“Nangni'n inthiangnga kei karabing kha in ningte,” tia Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Takkha keichu tume kei kachang kawei tiangnga in-ongsik kadang nasik ranak neimong. Takkha kapa in inmanisik eii tia iboolpingai sik kha eii.”
Siamruoi soom ngai'n hiwa jar injet pha, unai inni ngai chungnga inmani inleiraang.
Khawa jarra Jisu'n inmani raja ah akoichunna ati, “Pathian kajetmak zaatlop lamkakei ngai'n inmani chungnga wairoonna ranak innei, halli inmani lamkakei ngai'n puikatungnga thomatorna innei ti nangni'n ningjet.
Nangni karra chu khawakha emak. Tuka-ang inkhat in akalok ezoot inchu, ama'n nangni rakip suok kha e-sik eii;
halli nangni karra inkhat in ma-insa ezoot inchu, amakha nangni rakip ngai suok kha e-sik eii,
hile in-angrip ah Miring Sapa kha sepa inthosik ah akajuo kha emak, takkha sepa kathosik halli mi rakip ngai kasanring sik ah aringkhuo kape ijuo eii.”
Jisu li asiamruoi ngai'n Jericho inheimathaan pha, mipui katam tak in Jisu nuk inhongjui.
Lam sirra in-ong mitkacho miring inni'n Jisu aheiwa ti injet pha, inringnga inhongkheek, “David Sapa! Pumi, Keini naminriangro!”
Mipui in omchianru tia inmanikha inleiran. Takkha inmani'n kheella inringnga inhongkheek, “David Sapa! Pumi, Keini naminriangro!”
Jisu'n angirra inmanikha aleikoi. “Angme kei nangnisik ningnamintho zoot?” tia ama'n inmani diang aleirakel.
Inmani'n inti “Pumi,” “Keini kinmit kinmuzoot!”
Jisu'n inmani aleiminriangnga inmit ngai kha aleikatook pi; khawa phatak khan inmani inmujei halli inmani'n ama kha injuijei.
Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngai'n Jerusalem inheinaiya Olives Chingnga kaom Bethphage kha inheitung, halli Jisu'n asiamruoi inni ngaikha inmatiang aleitirjei.
“Ningma tiangnga kaom khuokhan siru, halli nangni'n salungdai apui koolla inkhit ateii inkhat jomuningte. Inmani kha suut inlang keidiang hongruoiru.
Halli tuka-ang inkhat in anarakel inchu, ‘Pumi khan inmani hi inliingnasik aom’; ama diang tipiru, halli ama'n inmani kha khawapha takkhan aheimasuosik eii.”
Hiwa kasuok rakip hi Pathian chongkachoipa ileiril kha huui ahongtung nasik eii:
“Zion sanu ngaidiang rilpiru, Enru, nangni rengpa kha nangnidiang ajuo jei! Amachu anunchan inchuol halli salungdai achuong halli salungdai khachu ateii eii.”
Khawa jarra siamruoi ngai'n insi ah Jisu'n angme inmani diang thoru itikha injuothojei:
inmani'n salungdai apui li ateii inhongruoi, inchungnga inpuon indaaplikhan Jisu inleimin-ong.
Mipui katam khat in inpuondiar lamchungnga intha, lekkhat in thingbuo intukthaak ah lamchungnga inleitha.
Halli Jisu matiangnga kasili anuk tiangnga kasi mipui ngai'n inhongkheek, “Hosanna David Sapa! Pumi ramingnga akajuo amakha arawaan atha! insaang khet ah Hosanna.”
Jisu'n Jerusalem aluut phakhan, khuopui pumpui kha rasa in aleisip. “Ama hi tume?” tia mipui'n inleirakel.
“Ama hi Galileeya kaom Nazareth ah inphut Pathian chongkachoi Jisu kha eii,” tia mipui ngai'n inleimasang.
Jisu'n Biak-inn aluutli khanna karacho li kajuor mi rakip ngaikha aleipuutsuok. Ama'n sialchuoi kamakoi ngai khamtuol halli pharbali kajuor ngai in-ongna lukham ngaikha aleimalet aleimakhup pijei,
halli inmani diang ati, “Kei ka-inn hi Pathian nina inn intia inkoisik eii.” Takkha nangni'n inruup katho ngai omna ningmin ejei!
Khawa suoli mitkacho li kekakiak ngai'n Biak-inna ama koolla inleihong, halli ama'n aleimindam.
Thiampu kalian li Dan ocha ngai'n Jisu itho chuon inlak ngai halli naipang ngai'n Biak-inna “Hosanna David Sapa!” intia inkheek kha inmupha inraangnga Jisu diang inheiti,
“Angme inmani'n inti nang najetbo?” “Inthiangnga kei'n kajet,” tia Jisu'n aleimasang. “Hiwa chong inthiang hi nangni'n lateel ngaimak chube? ‘Nangni'n akadoong naipang khat-um ranu laka-in ngai murra Pathian inminpaaksik eii tia ningminchu kha.’ ”
Jisu'n inmani amathaanna halli Bethany khuopui tiang asiya, khawa munkhan zaankhat ajuoriakjei.
Ziingkhuo ahongwar pha, khuopuitiang aheikirna lamma, ama awon aleichaampi.
Ama'n lamkoolla kamoong theichang kuungkhat aleimu halli aleisi, takkha abuo elekleiya akara khat-um khawakhan leimumak. Khawa jarra ama'n theichang kuung diang khan ati, “Nang angtikniteii inra khaimaro!” Khawapha takkhan theichang kuungkha ajuochar jei.
Hiwahi asiamruoi ngai'n inleimu halli inleingak. “Angtho thoa hituk innoot ah theichang kuung hi icharme?” tia inmani'n inleirakel.
Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kanati, khachu nangni'n inngamna ningneiya halli ning inngamsammak jei inchu, kei'n theichang kuungnga kitho angnga nangni innum kheella thomator ningte. Hiwa bit eleiya, nangni'n hiwa ching diang um, ‘Inphuk inlang natheinuo ah tuipui son juota-taro nati innum,’ khawakha inthosik eii.
Nangni'n ning inngamna inchu, Pathian diang angme ningnikha ningmusik eii.”
Jisu'n Biak-inn tiang ahongkirra; halli ama'n aleiminchu, thiampu kalian khat-um uparup ngai'n amadiang inhongnga inhongti, “Hiwa ngaihi ang thomatorna naneiya nithome? Tu-in hika-ang thomatorna anapeme?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Kei'n chongkhat narakel kate, halli nangni'n ningna masang inchu, Kei innum hiwa rakip ngaihi ang thomatorna kaneiya kithome ti narilpi kate.
John in baptize ileitho kha hu makheiyame: Pathian makheiyabe emakli miring makheiyabe?” Inmani inkhat li inkhat inlei inbiak, “Angme eini'n nitisik? ‘Marwaanna inphut eii,’ niti inchu, ama'n einidiang atisik eii, ‘Angsik ah me hanle nangni'n ama ningngamnamak?’
Halli ‘Miringnga inphut eii niti inchu,’ eini'n mipui ngaikha nichi, ajarchu inmani rakip in John hi Pathian chongkachoi inkhat eii tia inleilei.”
Khawa jarra inmani'n Jisu diang inleimasang, “Keini'n jetmungjei.” Halli ama'n inmani diang ati, “Kha e-inchu, Kei innum nangni diang, angranak kaneiya hiwa ngaihi kithome ti narilpi nuning.”
“Tuun, nangni'n angme ningngaidon? Mi inkhat in sapa inni aleinei. Ama'n asapa upa padiang asiya ati, ‘Sapa, awini theibombilla si inlang chuon juothoro.’
Halli ama'n aleimasang, kei sinuning, takkha ama'n amalung thuulla aleisi.
Khawa suoli apa in asapa naipangpa diang asiya khale in-angrip ah aleiti, ama'n aleimasang, Oh pa, takkha ama leisimak.
Hiwa inni ngai karra tu-inme apa lungdou leikatho?” “Upapa eii,” tia inmani'n inleimasang. Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiti hi eii: rampar kakhoom ngaili zool-inthai ngai'n Pathian Rengram tiang ningma insa ah insisik eii.
John Baptist in akatuun lamkha kanaminmusik aheiwa, halli nangni'n ama kha ngamna makchu; takkha rampar kakhoom ngai li zool-inthai ngai'n amakha inleingamna, Hiwahi nangni'n ningmu innum, ningmalung thuul inlang ama ngamna makchu.
“Hiwa chongminkhi inkhat hi rangaingru,” Jisu'n ati. “Leimapupa inkhat in theibombil inkhat athoa aleiling, halli aleirakulla, theibomtui sumnasik khur inkhat aleichei, hiwa ngaaknasik ah berteii khat aleisak. Khawa suoli chuonkatho ngaidiang aminhuumma ramkalaak inkhattiang aleisijei.
Theibom kara rakhoolpha ahongtung phakhan, ama changsik tum kha kaleisik asuok ngaikha chuonkatho ngaidiang aleitir.
Chuonkatho ngaikhan asuok ngaikha insurra, inkhat kha inleiwuok, inkhat kha inleithat halli inkhat kha lungnga inleideeng.
Woikhat inlet ah asuok katamdet aleitir, takkha chuonmi ngaikhan matiangnga intho khale in-angrip ah inmani diang inleithonook.
Ahekna khet-ah, inmani'n kasapa chu khoya nathopi inte, tia asapa kha inmani diang aleitirjei.
Takkha chuonmi ngaikhan asapa inmu pha, inmani inkhatli inkhat-in inlei inti, Hiwahi leimapupa sapa kha eii, heiwaru, eini'n ama thatrui, halli ama changsik kasuok kha eini'n leirui!
Halli inmani'n amakha inthat-ah, theibombil raalkhattiang, inlei kalekjuonjei.”
Khawa jarra, “Theibombil mapupa in aheikirpha, khawa chuonkatho ngaidiang ama'n angme athosik?” tia Jisu'n aleirakel.
Inmani'n inleimasang, “Ama'n mi kathamak ngaikha suoileiya athatsik eii.” “halli aphakacha ah amadiang atum theibomkara kapesik aleiilak chuonmi ngaidiang khan ama'n arahuon kha aminhuumsik eii.”
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Chong inthiang in angme itikha nangni'n lateel ngai makchube? ‘Inn kasak ngai'n inhiai lungkha akil kasur lungkha ahong-inchang. Hiwahi Pumi itho eii; eini mit-en nachu inlakchuon eii!’ ”
“Khawa jarra kei'n nangni diang kati,” “Pathian Rengram hi nangni diangnga inphut inlakeisuosik eii halli khawa kara kaminra mi ngaidiang inpesik eii.”
Hiwa lungchungnga kajuota tuka-ang ngaikhan alek-alek ah inkoisik eii, halli hiwa lung-in ijuodel tuka-ang mikhan rahut angnga innooisik eii.
Thiampu kalian ngaili Pharisee ngai'n Jisu chongminkhi kha injetpha, inmani jarra iril eii ti inleijet.
Khawa jarra inmani'n ama surnasik inleitho. Takkha mipui ngaikha inleichi, ajarchu mipui ngai'n Jisu hi Pathian chongkachoi inkhat eii tia inleilei.
Hiwasuo Jisu'n woikhat inlet ah chongminkhina kha aneimanna mi ngaidiang aleiril.
“Marwaan Rengramchu, tuka-ang reng inkhat in asapa moiruoina ah bubaknasik insuuk khale in-ang.
Bukabak hongnasik ah koina cheii ipe ngaikha jokoiru tia ama suok ngai aleitir, takkha inmani leihong zootmu.
Khawa jarra woikhat asuok lekkhat ngaidiang hiwa chonghi apeya koina cheii inpe ngaidiang khan: Enru, Kei'n bubaknasik kha tuun kaminsuuk suojei; kei kasaraat ngai halli akanool kasechal ngai kathat ah chuon rakip ngaihi kaminsuuk suojei. Moiruoi bubakna hin hongtaru! tia aleitir
Takkha koina cheii kamu ngai'n sisik leingaidonmu halli inmani'n inchuon-inchuon tiangkhan: inkhat in aleiya, lekkhat in insiallou natiang inleisi,
khawa khanna kaom aleiilak ngai'n asuok ngaikha insurra, inleiwuok, halli inleithat.
Rengpa kha araang theiya; raalmi ngai atirra mikathat ngaikha aminthat jei halli inkhuopui kha um mei aminhaaljei.
Khawa phakhan ama'n asuok ngai akoiya inmani diang ati, Kei moiruoi bubakna sik hi kaminhekjei, takkha kikoi ngaihi kahong sik rahoi suok mujei.
Khawa jarra tuun nangni'n lampui ngaikhan si-inlang ning imu miring rakip ngaikha moiruoi bubakna sik ah juokoi ru.
Khawa jarra suok ngaikhan lamma insuok ah, katha khat-um kathamak rakip ngaikha inhong minchun; halli moiruoina munkha mipui akahong ngaikhan insipjei.”
“Rengpa khan ahong inchun ngai ka-en aheiluut pha, moiruoi puondiar kathomak miring inkhat aleimu.
Rengpa in amadiang ati, ‘Suopui, angtho-thoa moiruoi puondiar tholeiya hiwahin nihongluut me?’ takkha ama'n iteii um leirilmakjei.
Halli rengpa in suok ngaidiang aleiti, ‘Akeii akut khit inlang aziingna tuolkhan amakha kalekjuonru. Khawa munkhan ama'n aha karial ta achapsik eii.’ ”
Ajarchu “Katamtak inkoi, takkha lekteiibit inkadang.”
Khawa phakhan Pharisee ngai'n insuok ah Jisu chongrilla inphut surnasik chuon inleiminsuuk.
Halli Herod mi ngaile inmani siamruoi ngai intirra injuo minti, “Ocha,” “Nang in akatuun naril, mi ngaidiang Pathian jarra akatuun lamkha naminchu, halli tu-inkhat um chimakche, ajarchu mimeel mimai enna chuonkatho emakche tihi keini'n kinjet.
Khawa jarra keini diang narilpiro, angme ningaidon? Rome Rengpa Caesar diang rampar kapehi eini sina Dan akoibe emakli koimakbe?”
Jisu'n inmani thamakna kha ajet ah aheiti, “Akatha omchan katho ngai! Angsik ame kei nasursik ningtho?
Rampar pesik sialkha keidiang naminmuru!” Halli inmani'n amadiang dangkapum kha inheichoi,
Halli ama'n inmani diang aleirakel, “Tu ramil li ramingme hiwa ngaihi?”
Inmani'n inleimasang, “Reng Caesar ta eii.” Khawa phakhan Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Athajei, kha e-inchu Reng Caesar ta kha Caesar diang peru, halli Pathian ta kha Pathian diang peru.”
Khawa injet pha inmani'n inleingak; halli amakha inmathaanna insijei.
Ahongkaringnook tihi ommak kati Sadducee lekkhat khawani khan Jisu diang inhongnga inhongrakel.
Inmani'n inti, “Ocha,” “Moses in, mi inkhat in saneileiya athi inchu, ama unai inkhat in chulmeinu kha neita sa aneisik eii, khawa sangai kha akathipa sangai eii tia inleisik eii aleiti.
Keini karra unai sari kinleiom; upakhetpa khan numei aleinei halli saneileiya athijei, anumei kha anai ngaidiang aleidajei.
Khale in-angrip ah inni huuina, inthum huuina, insuona khet ah sari huuina anaipa diang um aleisuokjei.
Ajuohekna khetkhan numeisanu kha um athijei.
Khawa jarra tuunchu hongring nookna nikhuo nikhan, amahi tu numei esikme? ajarchu inmani rakip in amakha inleinei.”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, Chong inthiang emakli Pathian ranak kha nangni'n jetmakchu jarra, “nangni lamleii tiang ningsijei!
Ajarchu kathi ngaikhan inhongring pha, inmani khachu marwaan tirton ngai ang-inta marwaanna in-omsik eii, inmanidiang inkanei moikaruoi ti omnuni.
Kathi ngai'n inhongringnook sik jarra: Pathian in nangni diangnga itikha lateel ngaimak chube? ati,
‘Kei Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian khat-um Jacob Pathian ka-eii,’ Amachu kathi ngai Pathian emak takkha akaring ngai Pathian eii.”
Mipui in hiwa injetpha, inmani'n ama minchuna khan inleingak.
Jisu'n Sadducee ngaikha min-om chianjei tikha Pharisee ngai'n injet phakhan, inmani rakip in inchunna inleinei,
Halli inmani ngai karra, sina Dan ocha inkhat in, chongrakel nale inruoiya ama surnasik lei-ensui.
“Ocha,” “Sina Dan suungnga huwa chongpeii hume kalokkhet?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “ ‘Pumi na Pathian kha namalung, naratha, halli na-ngaidonna pumpuiya minriangro.’
Hiwahi akalokkhet khat-um ma-insakhet chongpeii kha eii.
Halli hi angnga inni huuina kha um: ‘Nang in na-indiang na-inwaipui ngai kha napumtak angnga minriangro.’
Moses sina Dan khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngai minchuna kha hiwa chongpeii inni hin araya ah ahuui wiakjei.”
Pharisee lekkhat in inlei intup pha, Jisu'n inmani diang aheirakel,
“Messiah jarra angme ningngaidon? Ama hi tu sapa me?” Inmani'n inleimasang, “Ama hi David sapa eii.”
“Jisu'n inmani diang ati, kha e-inle, David in Ratha ah amadiang angtho-thoa ‘Pumi’ tia ikoime? David in ati,
‘Pumi in Kapumi diang ati: Kei kachangtiang in-ongro Kei'n ni-inhalpui ngaikha nakeii nuoiya kada maklaiseng.’
David in amakha ‘Pumi’ tia akoi inchu, angtho-thoa Messiah hi David sapa esikme?”
Tu inkhat in num Jisu diang chong inkhat um leimasang mator mujei, khawani makheiya inphut tu-inkhat innum amadiang chong inkhat um rakelmujei.
Halli Jisu'n mipui ngai khat-um ama siamruoi ngaidiang aleiti.
“Sinadan ocha ngaili Pharisee ngai'n Moses in-ongna khan in in-ong.
Khawa jarra inmani'n angme thoru inti rakip nangni'n thoru halli juiru; takkha inmani omchan khachu juimaru, ajarchu inmani'n angme inril kha inmani'n thomu.
Inmani'n phurrik kha inkhit ah, mi ngai darkhoi chungnga inminpuut, takkha inmani inchu inkutramol inkhat innum kadompuimu.
Takkha inmani chuontho rakipchu mi ngai munasik ah intho, enru inmani'n Chong inthiang ramol ngaikha inmachal khat-um inbaanna inmakhai, halli inmani puondiar inchuol inkahak mor ngaikhan inmakhai!
Inmani'n bubakna mun kahoikhet li synagogue ah in-ongna kahoikhet kha inkadang;
inmani'n mipui inchunna munkhan mi ngai'n khoya intho halli Ocha tia inmani inkoikha inleimanuom.
Takkha nangnichu Ocha intimaru; ajarchu nangni Ocha chu inkhat bit eii, halli nangni rakipchu unai ning-eii.
Halli nuoipilchungnga tu inkhat diang-um Pa ti inlang koimaru, ajarchu nangni marwaanna Pa inkhat bitkha ningnei.
Emakli nangni chu Lamkakei intimaru, ajarchu nangni ngai lamkakei khachu Messiah bit kha eii.
Nangni karra kalokkhet ama khan nangni suok ala esik eii.
Ajarchu tuka-ang atheinuo ah indomsaang amakha alaminniamsik eii, halli tuka-ang atheinuo ah nunchan inchuol amakha lakadomsaang sik eii.”
“Nangni nunchan katha inleem, dan ocha khat-um Pharisee ngai! Nangni diang poongna omrase, ajarchu nangni'n marwaan Rengram kha mi ngai chungnga ningkharjei, takkha nangni-um luutmakchu, halli luutsik katho inmani kha um zootpimakchu!”
Nangni nunchan katha inleemngai, Dan ocha khat-um Pharisee ngai! Nangni diang poongna omrase, ajarchu nangni'n Pathian diang kani omchan ningthoa kasoot ah ningni, halli chuulmei ngai innle-lei um ningkasut, khawa jarra nangni'n kheella kalok poongna ngaikha ningmusik eii.
“Nangni nunchan katha inleemngai, Dan karu khat-um Pharisee ngai! Nangni diang poongna omrase, ajarchu nangni'n tuipui khat-um ram rakip ah ningloonna mi inkhat omchan ninminthuul, halli nangni'n amakha nangni neek-ah chan inni chungtiang poongnakamu meikhur sapa kha ninmin eii!”
“Nangni mitkacho lamkakei ngai, Ningchungnga poongna omrase, nangni'n ningti, ‘Tuka-ang inkhat in Biak-inn palla chong inkhit inchu ama chong-inkhitna khan inkhitmak; takkha ama'n Biak-inna kaom soonna rakook ah chong inkhit khachu, amakha chong inkhit eii.’
Aka-am khat-um mitkacho ngai! Soonna emakli soonna kha kaminthiang biak-inn hi hume kheella kalok?
Halli nangni'n ningminchu, Tuka-ang inkhat in Pathian maichaam rakook ah chong inkhit khachu ama chong inkhitna khan inkhit mak; takkha ama'n Pathian maichaam chungnga inda kutchoi kha rakook ah chong inkhit khachu amakha chong inkhit eii.
Nangni mitkacho ngai, kutchoi emakli kutchoi kaminthiang Pathian maichaam kha hume kheella kalok?
Khawa jarra Pathian maichaam rakook ah chong inkhit ama'n maichaam khat-um khawa chungnga kaom phur rakipkha rakook ah chong inkhit eii.
Halli Biak-inn rakook ah chong inkhit ama'n biak-inn khat-um khawa suungnga kaom Pathian rakook ah chong inkhit eii.
Halli tuka-ang inkhat in marwaan rakook ah chong inkhitpha, ama'n Pathian reng in-ongna khat-um khawa chungnga in-ong Pathian kha rakook ah chong inkhit eii.”
“Nangni nunchan katha inleem! Dan ocha khat-um Pharisee ngai, nangni chungnga poongna omrase! ajarchu thikaraanglei, reihiing khat-um wonpuorlei ngaihi soom suungnga inkhat Pathian diang ningpeli, chongpe khaneek ah arei ka-eii minchuna ngai, akatuun, minriang khat-um ngamna hichu ningmathaan, takkha hiwarakip hi nangni'n ningthosik asuok halli aleiilak ngaihi um manilmaru.”
Juchukchu kha radiikna ah ningradiikli, salaileem chu kamaduol nangni mitkacho lamkakei ngai!
“Nangni nunchan katha inleem! Dan ocha khat-um Pharisee ngai! Ningchungnga poongna omrase, ajarchu nangni rabing li bukheeng kha apangtiang bit ningrasu, takkha asuungtiang chu maruupnasik khat-um atheinuo sik ah ngaidonna bitkhan pumsip asip.”
Mitkacho Pharisee! rabing suungnga kaom kachok kha ma-insa ah minthiang masaro halli apangnga kaom kachok kha-um ahong inthiangsik eii.
“Nangni nunchan katha inleem! Dan ocha khat-um Pharisee ngai! ningchungnga angtuk poong kaomme, ajarchu nangni tuollachu akatha angnga nimuli asuungnga chu akathi saru ngaili akachok-in kasip akabang inkanoot thaan ka-ang ning eii.”
Khawa angnga nangni-um tuollachu mi ngaidiang akatha angnga ning inmu, takkha asuung ngachu nunchan katha inleemna li manu in asip.
“Nangni nunchan katha inleem! Dan ocha khat-um Pharisee ngai angtuk poong kaomme! nangni'n Pathian chongkachoi ngai thaan kha katha ah ningbool, halli tuka-ang ringkhuo katha ah karing ngai thaanlung kha ningminliang;
halli nangni'n ningti, keini'n kinpi-kinpu ngai phakhan kinleiom inchu, Pathian chongkachoi ngai inthat nakhan inmani ngaile inruoiya chan kinleinei maksik eii.”
Khawa jarra nangni'n inthiangnga Pathian chongkachoi ngai kathat inmani sa-ngai kin-eii ti nangni ningtheinuo ah sakhi ning-inpejei.
Kha e-inchu angme ningpi-ningpu ngai ileiphut kha nangni'n minsuoru!
Nangni maruulngai khat-um maruul sangai! angtho-thoa khawa meikhur sik ah chongtanna ah inphut suoksik tia ningngaidon me?
Khawa jarra enru, kei'n nangnidiang karil khachu Pathian chongkachoi, mi kasing, halli ocha ngaikha kajuotirsik eii; inmani lekkhat kha nangni'n ningthatsik eii, lekkhat in cross ah, halli inmani lekkhat ngaikhan nangni Synagogue ngaikhan enmeel kase ah ningwuoksik eii, halli khuopui ngaikhan thatnasik inmani ningpuutsik eii.
Hiwahi nangni'n Biak-inn li Pathian maichaam kongkarra ning-ithat mi kadik Abel la inphut Barachiah sapa Zechariah katung nuoipilla thi ningmasuokna rakip ngai poongna kha nangni chungnga achulsik eii.
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga karil, hiwarakip ngai ningthatna rachaakna kha tuunna khang chungnga achulsik eii.
“Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Pathian in ijuotir chongkachoi ngai lungnga kadeeng khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngai kathat nang! Arpui in ateii ngai amurtha nuoiya ida angnga, kei'n nami ngaihi angtuk kiompui zootme, takkha nangni'n zootmak chu!
Halli enru, nangni Biak-inn kha karuok ah kanadapi ejei.
Ajarchu kei'n nangni diang kati, ‘Pumi ramingnga akajuo ama kha rawaan katha kha eii ningtimak laiseng, tuunna inphut nangni'n keihi supmu namu khainutun jei.’ ”
Jisu'n Biak-inn mathaanna asi phakhan, asiamruoi ngai'n insak innjarra amadiang minmunasik ah akoolla inheiwa.
“Oh,”Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni'n hiwa rakip ngaihi mumak chube? Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiti eii, lung khatbit um lung inkhat chungnga omnuni; inraja ah la-inlet wiaksik eii.”
Jisu'n Olives Chingnga in-ongnga omlai, siamruoi ngai'n ruuk ah amadiang inheiwa ah inleiti. “Hiwa rakip ngaihi angtik asuoksik me,” “halli nang najuonasik li manmasituol hekna jetnasik, keinidiang natipiro.”
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Insingtheiru, tu-inkhat innum nangni innaminweet maknasik.
Ajarchu mi katam khat in karamingnga, Kei Messiah ka-eii! ti-inta inheiwasik eii; halli mi katam khat kha aminweet sik eii.
Nangni'n raal khat-um raalchong rasa akanai khat-um akalaak ah ninglajetsik eii, takkha chimaru; ajarchu hiwa rakip hi alasuoksik eii, takkha ahekna kha tuunkatung lahongmak.
Ajarchu ramkhat li ramkhat inla-insuolsik eii, halli rengram khat li rengram khat inla-inthatsik eii; halli amun rakip ah bukawaang li rinook alasuoksik eii.
Hiwa rakip hi naiha kahong ma-insa kha ka-ang eii.”
“Halli nangni nasur inta minpoong nasik innalapesik eii, halli nangni innalathatsik eii, halli zaat rakip in kei jarra nangni innamatir sik eii.
Halli khawa phakhan akatamkhat in la-inngamna nunu, halli inmani inkhat li inkhat inla-inpesuoksik eii, halli inkhat li khat inla-intirsik eii.
Halli akatuunmak Pathian chongkachoi angjet lahongsuok inta mi akatamkhat alaminweetsik eii.
Hiwa ka-ang akathamak ahongkheel jarra, minriang hi mi katamtak ngai chungnga ajuotoom sik eii.
Takkha ahekna katungnga kadei ama kha aringsik eii.
Halli hiwa Rengram jarra Chong Kahoi hi phungle zaat rakip ah sakhi enasik ah manmasituol pumpuiya inlarilsik eii; halli ahekna kha ajotungsik eii.
“Khawa jarra Pathian chongkachoi Daniel diangnga ileiminril, kaminmang mator ‘Chikaompa’ khan inthiang munna ingir nangni'n ningmusik eii.” (Akateel ama khan jetrase!)
“Khawa phakhan tuka-ang Judea ah kaom rakip in chingtiang taanrasu.”
Tuka-ang innchungnga kaom ama khan innsuungnga kaom phur ngaikha kakeisuosik juochum khaimarase;
halli tuka-ang leiya kaom ama khan apuonsil kaleisik heikir khaimarase.
Halli nai kalawon numeisa ngaisik khat-um nainu ngai sik achu khawa phakha angtuk poongkaom sikme!
Phanbi emakli Jihudi ngai sernikhuoni ningtaan maknasik Pathian diang niru!
Ajarchu khawa phakha manmasituol inphut makheiya awini katung lakasuokmak, halli angtikniteii um kasuok khaimaksik poongna kalok khetkha esik eii.
Takkha Pathian'n nikhuo ngaikha amintoomjei; kha emak inchu manmasi tu inkhat um ringthei nunu; takkha ama ikadang mi-ngai sikbit ah khawa nikhuo ngaikha Pathian in aminbongsik eii.
“Khawa pha takkhan, ‘Enru, hiwahin emakli khawakhan Messiah kha aom!’ tuka-ang inkhat in nangni diang ati inchu ngamnamaru.”
Ajarchu Christa inleem khat-um Pathian Chongkahoi inleem ngai inlahong suoksik eii, halli ethei-inchu, ikadang mi ngai katung matheemna machulnasik ah, chuon inlak li ngaksik kaom angjet ngaikha inlathosik eii.
Rangairu! kei'n nangni diang apha matiang kinatipi ejei.
“Emakli, mi ngai'n nangni diang, ‘Enru, ama neelramma aom inti inchu!’ khawakhan juosi maru, halli ‘Enro, ama hin inthup ah om inti innum!’ ngamnamaru.”
Ajarchu Miring Sapa kha nisuotiangnga kool-inlek kha niluutna tiang katung inmu kha angnga alajuosik eii.
“Kathi kaluong omna munkhan laangkia ngai ininchunsik eii.”
“Poongraalna nikhuo ngai hekli hekmak innot ah kani'n ahongziing sik eii, tha in ama ra-ang penunijei, arsi ngai'n marwaanna inphut injuotasik eii, halli marwaanna ranak rakip um intuulsik eii;
halli khawa phakhan lairalak ah Miring Sapa madanna kha inlarsik eii; halli manmasituolla zaat rakip in inlachapsik eii, khat-um ranak le alur-alianna khale inruoiya Miring Sapa khan suumphai chungnga ijuo kha inmani'n inmusik eii.”
Tampalooi rasa inringkha inlatumsik eii, halli ama'n ama marwaan tirton ngaikha neipilchung raki miliya atirsik eii, khat-um ama ikadang neipilchung pumpuiya kaom mingaikha inmani ngai'n inheikhoom chunsik eii.
“Tuun nangni'n theichang kuungnga inphut chongminkhi inkhat hi inchuru; aziik kadoongkha ahongcherra abuo hongsuokjei inchu, nangni'n kholumpha ahongnaijei tia ningjet.”
Kha angnga nangni'n hiwarakip hi ningmu phakhan, apha anaijei, ama kotkuung juotungjei, ti nangni'n ningjetsik eii.
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiti eii, hiwarakip hi asuok maklaiseng hiwa khang hi laheknuni.
Marwaan li nuoipil chu lamangsik eii, takkha kei kachong ngaichu angtikniteii mangnuni.
“Khawa nikhuo li aphakha kapa eleiya, marwaan tirton ngai innum, Sapa innum, tu inkhat innum jetmu.”
Ajarchu Noah pha khanna angme kasuok angnga, Miring Sapa kajuo kha um khale in-angsik eii.
Ajarchu khawa tuikalian matiang khan, Noah in rakuong aluut maklaiseng, mi ngaikhan inbak inin, moi inleiruoi khat-um moiruoi nasik inleitho;
tuikalian kha ajuo ah inmani rakip achoi maklaiseng angme kasuok inmani injetmak kha angnga, Miring Sapa kha ajuo pha khannum kha angnga asuoksik eii.
Khawa phakhan leiya miring inni chuon inthosik eii; inkhat kha aruoisik eii, halli inkhat kha adasik eii.
Numeisa inni chakari intak ah in-omsik eii; inkhat in aruoisik eii, halli inkhat kha adasik eii.
Khawa jarra insingtheiru, ajarchu nangni Pumi kha angtikni ajuosikme nangni'n jetmakchu.
Halli hiwahi jetru, angtikni innruppa'n aheiwa sikme ti innmapupa'n ajet inchu, ama'n inringchakta, halli a-inn kha innruuppa khan leimakoi matornuni.
Hiwajarra nangni um inringchakru, ajarchu ningngaidon makna phatak khan Miring Sapa kha ajuosik eii.
“Kha e-inchu, tume aphakacha ah innmapupa in inmani diang baksik kapesik ithun ngamna kaom khat-um akasing suok kha?”
Amapupa'n inna aheikir pha hiwa ngai kathoa kaom jo-intongpui suok ama kha rawaan katha eii!
Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kati, ama'n ineirakip kha asuokpa diang aminhuumsik eii.
Takkha ama akathamak suok kha e-inchu, ama atheinuo ah intisik eii, kamapupa chu lahongwak nuni,
halli ama'n asuok changpui ngaikha kawuok khat-um ju inrui ngaile kabak khat-um ka-in aphutsik ejei.
Halli suok mapupa kha suokpa khan angaidon makna phakhan ahongkirsik eii, halli ama'n aphakha jetnuni.
Amapupa in ama kha abong bongnga atansik eii, halli nunchan katha inleem ngai rasi-enna tumkha ama'n amusik eii; khawakhan chapli hakarialna esik eii.
“Khawa pha marwaan Rengram khachu inmani meiser inchoiya moipa kadonsik ah heikasuok nungaak soom ka-angsik eii.”
Halli inmani ranga khatchu akamo in eii, khat-um ranga khat ngaichu akasing inlei-eii.
Akamo ngaikhan inmeiser kha inheichoi, takkha inmani'n sariaktui inliakchu heichoimu;
takkha akasing ngai khanchu inmani meiser le inruoiya sariaktui thunna inminteiya inheichoi.
Moipa heikasuok insuum jarra, inmani rakip imu inlei-inchu halli inleizaaljei.
“Halli zaanchim khan rasa inkhat aheikheek ah, ‘Enro moipa kha aheiwajei, ama kadonsik heisuoktaru!’
Khawa phakhan nungaak soom ngai'n in-intheiya, inmeiser inhongminkai.
Halli akamo ngai khan akasing ngaidiang inti, nangni sariaktui lekkhat naperu, ajarchu keini meiser ajothijei.
Takkha akasing ngai'n inheimasang, keinisik um nangnisik um hunmak acha, nangni'n si-inlang akajuor ngaidiang, nangnisik lekkhat jorachoru.
Halli inmani'n karachosik insipha, moipa kha ajuojei, halli insuukchak ah leikaom ranga ngai kha'n amale inruoiya moiruoi bubak natiang khan inluutjei; halli kotkha inkharjei.”
“Khawasuo aleiilak nungaak ngai um inhongtungjei. ‘Pumi, Pumi! keinisik kot namalongpiro!’ inhongti.
‘Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kiril eii, kei'n nangni najetmong,’ tia ama'n aleimasang.”
Khawa jarra, “Nangni insingtheiru, ajarchu nangni'n nikhuo li phadan kha jetmakchu.”
“Marwaan rengram hi miring inkhat in khuol-injil asi siktiang asuok ngai akoili ineirakip inmani diang iminhuum khale in-angsik eii.”
Halli inkhat diang talent ranga, inkhat diang talent inni, halli inkhatpa diang talent inkhat, ama itho matorna dungkajuiya inmani rakip diang apeli, ama khuol-injil asijei.
Talent ranga inhuum mipa khan innoot ah asiya sialthuoi aminsiya talent ranga khat atuongjei.
Khanthoa talent inni inhuumpa kha innum talent inni khat leiminliakjei.
Takkha talent inkhat inhuum suokpa khan asiya neipil acheiya amapupa sial kha athupjei.
“Apha kasoottak suo ah suok ngai mapupa kha ahongnga inmani le inruoiya sial lei-inpapui jei.
Halli talent ranga inhuumpa khan aheiwa ah, talent ranga khat ahongchoiya ati, ‘Ocha, nang in keidiang talent ranga nanaleipe,’ ‘Na-enpiro! kei'n talent ranga khat kaminliakjei.’
Amapupa khan amadiang ati, ‘Athajei, akatha khat-um ngamna kaom suok!’ ‘Nangchu phur lekteii chungnga ngamna nathajarra, kei'n phur rakip kanaminhuum sik eii; heiwaro namapupa rokna khan chan neiro!’
Talent inni ipe mipa khannum aheiwa ah, ati, ‘Ocha, nang in keidiang talent inni nanaleipeii; na-enpiro! kei'n talent inni kaminliakjei.’
Ama mapupa khan amadiang ati, ‘Athajei, akatha khat-um ngamna kaom suok!’ ‘Nang chu phur lekkhat chungnga ngamna na-om jarra, kei'n nanghi phur rakip kanaminhuum sik eii; heiwaro namapupa rokna khan chan neiro!’
Halli talent inkhat kamahuum suokpa innum aheiwa ah ajoti, ‘Ocha, nangchu malung kangar na-eii; lingleiya narakhool, halli muchi worleiya nakhoom ti kei'n kaleijet;
khawa jarra kanachiya kei'n kasiya, talent kha neipil suungnga kaleithup jei. Enro! nata kha hi eii.’
Amapupa khan amasangnga amadiang aheiti, ‘Kathamak khat-um huoikajoumak suok!’ kei'n kiwormak kha karakhool, halli muchi worleiya kakhoom ti ‘Nang in nijet emak abe?
Khawakha alei e-inchu nang in kei kasial kha sialdana innkhan naleidali, kei'n kaheikir pha sialthuoi khale inruoiya kei'n kaleimusik eii.
Khawa jarra ama diangnga talent kha lei-inlang talent soom kaneipa ama diangkhan peru.
Ajarchu akanei mi rakipdiang inpedelsik eii, halli ama'n kheella aneisik eii; takkha akaneimak mipa inei lekteii kha um ama diangnga inphut inleidelsik eii.
Neiman kathamak suok kha tuolla kaom kaziing khan ama juokalekjuonru; khawamun khan ama chap li aha karialla kaom erase.’
“Miring Sapa in Reng eya apoina khan marwaan tirton ngaile inruoiya ajuopha khan, ama reng in-ongna khan in-ongsik eii,
halli zaat rakip ah mi-ngai kha um ama maikuungnga aminchunsik eii; keelngam kakhaalpa khan keelli keelngam ikhoithen angnga, inmani inkhatli inkhat akhoithensik eii.
Halli ama'n keelngam ngaikha achangtiang, khat-um keel ngaikha aweitiang adasik eii.
Halli Reng khan achangtiangnga kaomngai diang atisik eii, ‘Heiwaru, Kapa rawaan kamu nangni ngai! Heiwa inlang neipilchung inboolla inphut nangnisik ah innaboolpi rengramkha joluotaru.
Ajarchu kei kawonchaam pha nangni'n baksik ningnape, kei'n katuiraal pha khannum tui ningnapeii, kei'n khomal inkhat ka-e pha khannum ningna-leiralaang;
puon choisik kaneimakpha puon ningnape, kei'n kana pha nangni'n ningna en, kei'n mikhumna ah kaom pha nangni'n ningnajuopha.
Khawa phakhan mikatha ngai'n ama diang inheimasangsik eii, Pumi, nang nawonkachaam kinmuwa angtik kinaminbak ame, emakli natuiraal pha kinamin-in nabe?
Angtik nang in khomal na-e pha kinnamuwa kin inna kinnaruoiluut ame, emakli puon ommak pha puon kinape ame?
Emakli nang in nana ah khat-um mikhumna ah niom angtik kinnamuwa nakoolla kinhongnga me?’
Rengpa khan inmani diang heimasangta, ‘Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kanatipi, kei ka-u kanai kasiinkhet chungnga nangni'n angrakip ningtho kha, keisik ah ningtho eii!’ ”
“Halli ama'n aweitiangnga kaom ngaidiang khan aheitisik eii, ‘E Pathian khomaak saamna kamungai! kei diangnga inphut si-inlang Seitan khat-um ama tirton ngaisik bit ah inbool hektik kaboi meikhur khan siru!
Ajarchu kei'n kawonchaam pha nangni'n baksik napemak chu, halli kei'n katuiraal pha nangni'n kei namin-in mak chu,
kei'n khomal inkhat ka-e pha, nangni'n kei naleiralaang makchu, puon ommak pha keidiang puon napemakchu, kana ah khat-um mikhumna ah kaom pha nangni'n naphamakchu.’
Halli inmani innum inhongmasang sik eii, ‘Pumi, nang nawonkachaam, natuikaraal, khomal inkhat ah nisi, puon nineimak, nina emakli mikhumna ah niom keini'n kinnamuwa, kinnasan makna ommabe?’
Khawapha Rengpa khan inmani diang heimasangta, ‘Kei'n inthiangnga nangni diang kitihi eii, nangni'n angme akasiinkhet ngai karra inkhat chungnga ningsan zootmak hi, kei ningnasan zootmak kha eii.’
Halli inmani kha hektik kaboi rachaakna munkhan atirsik eii, takkha mikatha ngaikhan hektik kaboi ringna khan insisik eii.”
Jisu'n hiwarakip ngai aminchusuo pha, ama'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti,
“Nini thengnga Rakaanna Kahoi omsik eii, halli miring sapa kha cross ah thatnasik a inpesuoksik eii ti nangni'n ningjet.”
Halli araming Caiaphas inti Thiampu kaliankhet inntuol khan thiampu kalianngai khat-um upa ngai inlei intuup,
halli Jisu ruuk ah surra ama thatnasik chuonkha inleiminsuuk.
“Mipui ngai'n inphu maknasik,” “kahoi suungngachu thomui,” inmani'n inti.
Bethany ah kaom apumkaphar Simon inna Jisu kha aleiom.
Numeisa inkhat in aman katam sariak rimkahoi inthun alabaster lungbeel kasip inkhat aheichoiya Jisu koolla aheiwa, halli Jisu'n bu abak laitak khan aluchungnga aleibunpi.
Hiwahi siamruoi ngai'n inmu halli hoimaktheiya inheiti, “Angsik hiwarakip hi niminmangme?”
“Ajarchu hiwa sariak hi aman katamma juorlia, sara ngaidiang sial kha pekacha eii!”
Jisu'n angme inmani inti ajet ah, inmani diang ati, “Angsikme numeisanu ningminpoong? ama'n keisik ah chuon kathatak athojei.
Ajarchu sara ngaichu nangnile inchatlekleiya ning omsuom, takkha keichu nangnile inchatlekleiya omsuom numin.
Ajarchu ama'n hiwa sariak rimkahoi hi kei kapum chungnga ibunthuon hin kei phuumnasik ama insuuksuo kha ejei.
Tuun kei'n inthiangnga nangni diang kitihi eii, manmasituol pumpui hiwa chongkahoi hi rilsuokna rakip khan, ama'n angme ileitho kha ama ngaidonna sikbit ah inrilsik eii.”
Khawapha Judas Iscariot inti, siamruoi soomleini ngai karra inkhat in thiampu kalian ngaidiang asiya ati,
“Kei'n ama kha nangnidiang kanapeii inchu, nangni'n keidiang angme ningnapesik?” Halli inmani'n amadiang dangkapum soomthum inleipeii.
Halli khawapha makheiya Judas in Jisu pesuok nasik aphakacha kha alei-entok.
Chol inchelmak waipool bakna nikhuo ma-insakhetni siamruoi ngai'n Jisu diang inheiwa ah inti, “Rakaanna kahoi bubak nasik kha nangsik hunme keini'n kinminsuuksik nimanuom?”
Ama'n ati, “Khuopui khan luut inlang tuka-ang mi inkhat diang,” “Kei kapha juotungjei ‘Ochapa in ati, na-inna kei kasiamruoi ngaile kei Rakaanna kahoi kha thokinte juotiru.’ ”
Jisu'n inmani diang itipi angnga, siamruoi ngai'n Rakaanna kahoi bu kha inleiminsuuk.
Kholei hei-epha khan, siamruoi soomleini le Jisu bubak nasik ah inlei in-ong.
Jisu'n bu inbaklai khan ati, “Adik nangni karra inkhat in kei anajuorsik eii.”
Siamruoi ngaikha inmalung inleipoong theijei halli inmani rakip in amadiang inti, “Kei'n be Pumi?”
Halli Jisu'n aleimasang, “Kheengnga keile inruoiya kut kanoom amatak in kei anapesuoksik eii.
Miring Sapa kha Chong inthiang in ileiril angnga alathisik eii, takkha Miring Sapa kha akapesuoksik miringpa sik achu angtuk ah poong kaom sikme! khawa mipa kha inleineimak in kheella amasik ah aleikatha sik eii!”
Kapesuok sik Judas khan hongmasang, “Kei'n be, Ocha?” Jisu'n ama diang ati, oh, “Nang in narilsuokjei.”
Inmani'n inbaklaitak khan, Jisu'n waipool kha aleiya rawaan apeli, akatherkhoijei, halli asiamruoi ngaidiang peli ati, “Lei-inlang bakru,” “hiwahi kei kataksa eii.”
Halli ama'n rabing aleiya, Pathian diang rawaan apeli, inmani diang apeya, “Nangni rakip hiwahi inru” ati;
“Ajarchu khawa chong-inkhitna, manu rakip ngaidamnasik ah akasar kei kathisen kha eii.
Kei'n nangni diang kitihi eii, kapa Rengramma nangnile inruoiya woikhat hiwa theibomju hi ni-insuom nasik nikhuo atungmak laiseng, kei'n tuunna inphut hiwa theibomju innuningjei.”
Halli inmani'n laa insak ah Olives Chingtiang inleisi.
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Nangni rakip in awini zaantak hin keidiang insuina ningneisik eii, ajarchu hiwahi chong-inthiangnga injia kha ejei, ‘Pathian in keelngam kakhaalpa kha alathatsik eii, halli keelngam rahooi ngaikha inlachaangdar sik eii.’
Takkha woikhat kei'n kahongringli, kei'n nangni matiang Galileeya kasisik eii.”
Peter in Jisu diang aleimasang, “Mi rakip in nangdiang insuina innei-innum, Kei'n chu angtikniteii insuina neinuning!”
Jisu'n Peter diang heiti, “Kei'n nang diang inthiangnga kitihi eii, awini zaantak hin Arkhong khan akhuong makma, nang in keihi woithum nazoot nutin.”
Peter'n leimasang, “Kei'n pumile thisuomsik asuok innum, kei'n chu nangkha zootmak suptho nathonuning!” Khawakhale in-angrip ah siamruoi rakip innum inleiti.
Khawa phakhan Gethsemane intiya inkoi amun khan Jisu'n inmanile inruoiya inheiwapha, siamruoi ngaidiang ati, “Kei'n soson kasiya Pathian kani phakhan, nangni hiwahin lei-inongru.”
Pumi'n amale inruoiya Peter khat-um Zebedee sangai inni aleiruoi, halli pumi kha malung poongnale malung dongna khan aleisip.
Khawa phakhan pumi'n inmani diang ati, “Kei karathahi thisik katungnga apoongjei; nangni hin om-inlang, keile inruoiya inringchak kha erui.”
Ama'n matiang lekkhat asidetli, ameel nuoitiang enna inbok ah aleini, “E kapa, hiwahi acha-inchu kei diangnga inphut poongna rabinghi nakhaipiro! kha e-innum kei kalungdou emarase, takkha nang nalungdou kha erase.”
Halli ama'n siamruoi inthum ngaidiang heikirpha, inmani inleizaal kha ajuomu, halli Peter diang ati, nangni'n “Kei le angtiame phadan inkhat um ningna-inringchak puimatormak?
Nangni'n matheemna khan ningchulmak nasik, inringchak inlang niru; ratha inchu athozoot, takkha taksa inchu asuol.”
Woikhat um Jisu'n inlet ah akirra nina ajuonei, “E kapa, hiwa rabinghi Kei'n ka-inmak innum khaikathamak sik ejei inchu, nalungdou kha inthorase,”
Ama'n woikhat heikirpha siamruoi ngai inleizaal kha ajuomunook; ajarchu inmani inmit leimakek matormu.
Jisu'n inmani woikhat amathaanna akirli, woithum huuina nina kha chongramol in-angrip ah aleini.
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n siamruoi ngaidiang aheikirra ati, “Nangni tuunkatug ninglazaalla poong ninglamachum be? Enru! phadan kha ajuonaijei; Miring Sapa kha manu karoon ngai kutchungnga inpenasik.
Intheitaru, eini situi; enru, kei kanapesuok sik mi kha hin omjei!”
Jisu'n chong arilla omlaitak khan, enro, Judas, siamruoi soomleini ngai karra inkhat kha ahongjei, halli thiampu kalian ngaili katar ngai ihongtir, chemli ramol kachoi mipui katamtak amale inhong inruoi.
Halli pumi kapesuokpa khan jetna inkhat apeya aleiti, “Kei'n kimazoop mi kha eii; amakha surru!”
Khawa phatak khan Judas Jisu koolla ahongnga, “Ocha, chubei” tia, amakha hongmazoop.
Jisu'n amadiang ati, “Suopui, nang in thosik ah nihong kha angme innot ah thoro!” Halli inmani inhongnga, Jisu kha insurli inkhitjei.
Khat-um enru, Jisu le leikaom inmani ngai karra inkhat in achem keisuoa thiampu kaliankhet suokpa kuorkha aleitukthakpi.
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n amadiang ati, “Nachem kha akok ah thunkirro,” “Ajarchu chem kachoi rakip chemma inthisik eii.
Marwaan tirton legion soomleini kakhel tuuntak kakoolla juomasuo nasik kei'n kapadiang nimatornutin tia nang na-ngaidonbe?
Kha katho inchu, angtho thoa Chong inthiang kha hintia asuoksik eii itikha huui tungniame?”
Khawa phadantak khan Jisu'n mipui ngaidiang ati, “Dan kamakoi inkhat kasur sik angnga nangni'n chem khat-um ramol ningchoiya kei kanasur ninghongbe? Nisuorakip ah kei'n Biak-inn khan ka-in-ongnga kaminchu, halli nangni'n kei nasurmak chu.
Takkha hiwarakip ngaihi Pathian chongkachoi ngai imajia chong kha tungnasik ah kasuok eii.” Khawa phakhan siamruoi ngai'n ama inmathaanna intaanjei.
Halli Jisu kasur ngai'n Dan ocha ngaili katarngai inlei-inchunna, Thiampu Kaliankhet Caiaphas inna Jisu kha inleiruoi.
Takkha Thiampu Kaliankhet inntuol katung Peter in inlaakjenna anuk leijui, halli aluut ah angme hongkasuok sik ennasik raalpa ngai khale inlei in-ong.
Thiampu kalian ngaile katarrup rakip in Jisu chungnga akatuunmak sakhi thatnasik ah inleiratok;
takkha ama jarra maleisei sakhi kape mi katamma inhong innum, inmani'n iteii um leimumu. Ahekna ah miring inni inhongnga inhongti,
“Hiwa mipa'n, ‘Kei'n hiwa Pathian Biak-inn hi kathiatli nithum suungnga kasak mator aleiti.’ ”
Thiampu Kaliankhet khan intheiya Jisu diang ati, “Nang iteii um masang nutinbe? nachungnga mi ngai'n inpe sakhi hi angme?”
Takkha Jisu lei-omchianjei. Halli Thiampu Kaliankhet khan amadiang ati, “Pathian Sapa Messiah kha nang na-e inchu, akaring Pathian raming rakook inlang keinidiang rilro”
Jisu'n amadiang ati, “Nang in natijei. Takkha kei'n nangni rakip diang kati, hiwa suoa Miring Sapa khan Akaraat khetpa changtiang in-ongnga marwaan suumphai chungnga ijuo kha nangni'n ningmusik eii!”
Khawa pha Thiampu Kaliankhet khan apuondiar katherra ati, “Pathian kha kase ah aril jei! hiwakheella eini'n sakhi leisik arei ommakjei? enru, Pathian kha kase ah irilkha nangni'n ningjetjei!
Nangni'n angme ninglangaidon?” Inmani'n inheimasang, “Ama kathisik rahoi asuok.”
Khawa phakhan inmani'n amaiya inmachilthuon halli kuttumma inleisuk; lekkhat ngai'n angemtaang inkabenna inti,
“E Messiah, tume nang kanawuok? keini diang heirilro!”
Peter in tuolla in-ongnga omlai, Thiampu Kaliankhetpa suok numeisa inkhat aheiwa ah amadiang ati, “Nang um Galilee Jisu le ninglei-inruoi.”
Takkha ama'n inmani rakip maikuungnga zootmak ah aheiti, “Nang itikha kei jetmong,”
halli ama'n tuolkot khan asuok pha, leiilak suok numeisa inkhat in amakha aleimuwa khanna kaom mi ngaidiang ati, “Ama Nazareth Jisu le inlei-inlop eii.”
“Kei'n mipa kha jettakmong tia khomaak lei-insaamma,” woikhat zootnook makjei.
Phabongkhat suo khawa koolla kangirra kaom ngai'n inheiwa ah Peter diang injuoti, “Inthiangnga nang um inmani ngai karra inkhat na-eii,” “Ajarchu nachongril khan kinnajet!”
Khawa phakhan, “Tume ma kha kei jetmong katakchungnga Pathian in poongna naperase tia khomaak insaam aphut jei!” Khawa phatak khan innot ah arkhong kha akhuongjei,
“Arkhong khan akhuongma, nang in kei kha woithum nazootnutin tia Jisu'n iti chongkha Peter in ahongngaidonjei.” Halli ama'n tuol asuok ah malung intook ah ajuochapjei.
Ziingtiang matak khan, thiampu kalian rakiple katar rakip in Jisu thatnasik chuon inlei-insuuk.
Halli inmani'n ama kha inkhit ah Rome ramwaikaroon Pilate diang inruoiya injopejei.
Khawa phakhan Jisu kajuorpa Judas khan Jisu diang noonkuung inpekha ahongjet phakhan, amalung athuulla, dangka sialpum soomthum kha thiampu kalian ngaili katar upa ngaidiang woikhat hongchoiya ahongti,
“Kei'n manu karoon mak mikha thatsik kipesuok khan kei manu karoonjei!” ama'n ahongti. Inmani'n inleimasang, “Keini ang kinthosik ommame?” “Khawakha nang nachuon eii!”
Judas in Biak-inn khan dangkapum kha adeengjuonna suokjei; halli asiya ruiya kaiya atheinuo ah ajuothijei.
Halli thiampu kalian ngaikhan dangkapum kha inleiya inti, “Hiwahi sialdana ah dasik hi eini Dan khan zootmak, ajarchu hiwahi thisenman kha eii.”
Halli inmani'n in-inbiak ah, khomal ngai phuumnasik ah Beelkaboolpa Lei kha khawa sialla inrachojei.
Khawa jarra khawa lei kha “Thisen Lei” intia winikatung inlakoi.
Halli Pathian chongkachoipa Jeremiah ileiril kha huui tungjei: “Israel mi ngai'n inzootna aman dangkapum soomthum kha inmani'n inleijei.
Halli Pumi'n keidiang chongpeii inape angnga, inmani'n beelkaboolpa lei kha khawa sial kha inneimanna inleirachojei.”
Jisu Rome ramwaikaroonpa maikuungnga aleingir, halli ramwaikaroonpa'n amadiang aheirakel, “Nang Jihudi ngai rengpa na-ebe?” Jisu'n amadiang leimasang, “Nang in niti kha ejei.”
thiampu kalian ngaili katar ngai'n inrilsepha ama'n iteii khat-um leimasangmak.
Pilate in amadiang ati, “Inmani'n nachungnga innarilse ngaihi nang nijet makbe?”
Jisu'n amadiang chongramol inkhat bit um masangmak pha, ramwaikaroonpa kha aleingak theijei.
Rakaanna Kahoi rakip ah Rome ramwaikaroonpa'n mipui ikadang mikhumna ah inda miring inkhat inmani sik bit ah ileithojol angnga aleimasuopi kachak.
Khawa phakhan mi rakip in injet mikhumna ah kaom araming Jisu Barabbas inti inkhat aleiom.
Khawa jarra mipui inintup pha, Pilate in inmani diang aleirakel, kei'n nangni sik ah “Tume ningnaminsuo zoot? Jisu Barabbas be, emakli Messiah inti Jisu khabe?”
Ajarchu Jihudi chuonkaroon ngai'n Jisu hi enzootmu ah amadiang inpe eii ti ama'n aleijet.
Pilate in chongtanna munna in-onglai, anumei'n hiwa chong hongtirra ati, “Mikadikpa diang nang iteii khat um thomaro, ajarchu ama jarra kei'n wini zaan karamang khan kaleipoong thei.”
Takkha thiampu kalian ngai khat-um katar ngai inchu Barabbas kha masuoro halli Jisu kha thatro tiru tia mipui ngaikha inleimasok.
Ramwaikaroon Pilate in amasangnga halli inmani diang ati, hiwa inni ngai karra tume nangnisik ah ningnaminsuo zoot inmani'n inti, “Barabbas!”
Pilate in inmani diang ati “Kha e-inchu Messiah inti Jisu hi kei'n angme kathosik?” Inmani rakip in inti, “Ama kha Cross ah thatro!”
Takkha pilate in ati, angsime, “Ama akathamak ang thomejei?” Takkha ama kha “Cross ah thatru” tia inmani'n kheella inringnga kakheek inhongphut.
Khanthoa Pilate in iteii anemna ommak ti amuwa, khawa rathuulla mipui senasik eii ti amu pha, ama'n tui leiya mipui maikuungnga akut rasuwa aheiti, “Hiwa mikadikpa thisen jarra kei chu iteii jetmong! nangni lungdou erase!”
Mipui rakip in inhongmasang, “Ama thisen kha keini khat-um kinsa ngai chungnga chulrase!”
Khawasuo khan ama'n Barabbas kha inmani sikbit ah amasuopi jei, halli Jisu kha ama'n minwuok ah, ama'n Cross ah thatnasik ama kha apejei.
Khawa phakhan ramwaikaroonpa raalmi ngai khan Jisu kha mipui inchunna waikaroonpa innsuungnga inkeiluut ah raalmi rup rakip in ama koolla in-inchunjei.
Inmani'n ama puondiar kha inkhaipiya, puonsen kha amadiang inminsiljei.
Halli inmani'n ralinglukhu inkhat inboolli ama luchungnga inminkhu, achangtiang ramol inkhat inminhumma; halli inmani'n amaikuungnga in-inbok ah amakha in-innuipui, “E Jihudi ngai Reng, kasoot ah ringro!” inmani'n inti.
Halli inmani'n inmachin thuonna, tuoitung kha inleiya alukhan inleiwuok.
Halli inmani'n ama kha in-innuipui suopha, puonsen kha inkhaiya, ama puondiar kha inmintho kirra Cross ah thatnasik inruoijei.
Halli inmani'n inheisuok pha, Simon tia inkoi Cyrene pasal inkhat inlei-intongpui, halli raalmi ngai'n ama kha Jisu cross kha azootmak pumma inleimindom.
Inmani'n Golgotha inti mun tinachu “Lukiar mun” khan inheiwa pha,
Inmani'n Jisu diang mathinnamit le inminchel akathur theibomtui insik inleipeii, takkha ama'n amintem pha lei-inpimak.
Halli ama kha cross ah inmakhai suopha, inmani'n rawaan katha in-enli ama puondiarkha inlei-insem.
Khawasuo inmani'n khawa munkhan inin-ongnga amakha inleingaak
Ama luchungkhan ama inrilsena inmajia kha inleitar, tichu, “Hiwa Jisu, Jihudi ngai Reng kha eii.”
Khawa phakhan Jisu le inruoiya inruup inni um, inkhat in changtiang, inkhat in weitiang, cross ah inleimakhai.
Khawa koolla kasi-kahong mipui ngai'n inlu inkalek ah, kase ah amakha jakna inpeya inti,
“Biak-inn thiatli nithum suungnga kasak nang, natheinuo ah insanro; nang Pathian Sapa na-e-inchu, cross ah inphut jochumro!”
Khawale in-angrip ah thiampu kalian, Dan ocha khat-um katar ngai inchella in-innuipuiya inti,
“Mileiilak ngaichu ama'n asan; atheinuo achu insanring matormak! ama Israel ngai reng e-inchu; tuun ama'n cross ah inphut juochumrase, halli keini'n ama kha ngamnakinte!
Ama'n Pathian kha angamna ah; Pathian Sa ka-eii inti inchu, tuun Pathian in sanrase; ajarchu ama'n ati, keichu Pathian Sapa ka-eii!”
Jisu le cross ah inmakhaisuom inruup ngai innum khawa ka-ang jakna chongkhan inleirakook.
Suunchim makheiya phadan inthum katung nuoipilchung pumpui aleiziingjei.
Halli phadan inthum juochultiang Jisu'n inringtak rasa khan ahongkheek ah, “Eli, Eli, lema sabachthani?” tinachu, “Ka Pathian, Ka Pathian, angsikme nang in keidiangnga inphut khattiang nina inletdel?”
Khanna kangirra kaom mi lekkhat khawakha injetpha inheiti, “Ama'n Elijah kha akoi!”
Khawa phatak khan inmani karra inkhat ataanna tuipompuon aleiya, khawakha akathur theibom juchoong khan anoomli, ramol khan kathilla, amadiang insik ah aleipeii.
Halli lekkhat in inti, ngaakdirui, “Elijah in ama kasansik ajuobe eini enrui!”
Khawa suonuk Jisu'n woikhat rasa inringnga akheekli, arang chatjei.
Enru, Biak-inn suungnga induong puonkha achung makheiya anuoi katung lekniya intherjei, nuoipil um innikjei, lungpui um akoijei,
Thaan ngai um alei-inlongjei, halli Pathian kangamna katamtak aleikathi mi ngai um inhongringjei.
Halli Jisu'n ahongringsuo nuk thaanna inphut inmani'n inhongsuokli Inthiang Khuopui tiang inluut ah mipui katamtak ngaidiang inlei-inlar.
Raalmi rajakhat lamkakeipa le inruoiya, Jisu kangaak ngai'n rinook khat-um kasuok ngaikha inmu ah, inchitheiya inheiti, “Inthiangnga amahi Pathian Sapa kha eii!”
Khawa munkhan numeisa katamkhat in kalaak ah inhei enna inleiom, inmani ngaikha ama sepa inthoa Galileeya inphut Jisu nuk heikajui ngaikha in-eii.
Inmani ngai karra Mary Magdalene, James li Joseph nu Mary, halli Zebedee numei inlei-inchel.
Kholei aheitung pha, Arimathea makheiya Jisu siamruoi inkhat, araming Joseph intia inkoi, inchong inkhat ahongtung.
Ama'n Pilate koolla asiya Jisu kaluongkha aleini. Halli Pilate in khawakha Joseph diang penasik ah chong aleipejei.
Khawa jarra Joseph in Jisu kaluong kha aleiya, akathar puonkanemma katuomma,
halli ama'n lungpuikha kawit ah amasik bit ah ibool thaan kathar khan aleiphuum; halli ama'n thaan kotkha lungkalok khat ah akharra aleisijei.
Mary magdalene khat-um Mary inti khat in thaankha in-enna khawakhan inin-ongnga inleiom.
Ziingnga, tichu Jihudi ngai serni, thiampu kalian halli Pharisee ngai'n Pilate koolla inhong inchunna,
inti, “Ocha, maleisei karilpa khan aringlai ‘Kei nithumni kahongringsik eii tia ileiril kha keini'n kinngaidon.’
Khawa jarra nithum katungbit thaanhi katha ah ngaaknasik ah chong napepiro, kha emak inchu ama siamruoi ngai'n inhongli akaluong kha hongmaruup inta, amakha thiya inphut ahongringjei, tia mi ngaidiang hongrilcha; halli ma-insa maleisei khaneek ah nuk-intong maleisei khadoom kheella hongthamak acha.”
“Raalpa ruoiru,”Pilate in inmani diang ati, “Siru halli nangni imatortak khan thaankha ngaakru.”
Khawa jarra inmani'n insiya raalpa ngai khale inruoiya lungkha madanna indeengnga, thaankha katha ah inminngaakjei.
Jihudi ngai sernikhuo ahekli, hakta ma-insa khoserni ziingtiang khuowarli, Mary Magdalene khat-um Mary khat khawakhan thaan ka-en inleisi.
Jetlei theileiya rinook kangartak aleihong; halli Pumi tirton kha marwaanna inphut ajuochumma, lungkha amalet ah, achung khan alei in-ong.
Ama meelsuo kha kool-inlek alei-ang, halli ama puondiar ngaikha kawur angnga aleichek;
akangaak raalpa ngaikha inleichi theiya inlei-intuul, halli akathi mi kha in-ang jei.
Marwaan tirton khan numeisa ngai diang aleiti. “Nangni chimaru,” “Ajarchu cross ah inthat Jisu kha nangni'n ning-entok ti Kei'n kajet.
Ama hin ommakjei; ajarchu ama ileiril angnga ama aringjei. Hongru halli hong-enru, ama leizaalna munkha.
Innoot ah si-inlang, halli ama siamruoi ngaidiang juomindikru, ‘Amachu thiya inphut aringjei; khat-um enru, nangni matiang ama Galileeya asijei, khawakhan nangni'n ama jomuningte!’ ngaidonru angme kei-inarilpi hi.”
Halli inmani'n kachi khat-um karokle inruoiya thaan kha inmathaanna innot ah, asiamruoi ngaidiang kamindiksik intaanjei.
Enru, jetleitheileiya Jisu'n inmani intongpuiya ati, “Rawaan katha eru.” Halli inmani'n inheinaiya akeii khan inma-ouwa amakha chubei inthojei.
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Chimaru,” “Siru, kei ka-u kanai ngaikha Galileeya sinasik rilpiru, halli inmani'n khawakhan kei namu inte.”
Numeisa ngaikhan inlamma insi lai, enru, thaan kangaak raalmi lekkhat in khuopui khan inkirra, akasuok rakip kha thiampu kalian ngaidiang inleirilpi jei.
Halli katar ngai'n thiampu kalian ngaile inmuwa halli inmani chong inlei-insiamma, raalmi ngaidiang inmani'n sial katamma inleipe ah
manidiang inti, “Nangni'n tiru, keini'n zaanna kinzaal rathil ‘Ama siamruoi ngai'n inhongnga, akaluongkha inmaruupjei.
Halli hiwahi ramkaroonpa kuor tung-inchu, keini'n ama matheem kinta, halli nangni iteii naminpoong nunung.”
Khan inthoa akangaak raalmi ngai'n sial kha inlei li inmani diang inminchu angnga inthojei; halli hiwa thurchi hi winikatung Jihudi ngai karra inlaril.
Siamruoi soomleikhat ngaikhan Galileeya Jisu'n ileirilpi chingkatung inleisijei.
Halli inmani'n ama kha inmupha chubei inhongtho; takkha lekkhat inchu inlei-inngamsamna.
Halli Jisu'n aheinaiya inmani diang ati, “Marwaan khat-um nuoipil chungnga kaom ranak rakip kei diang anapejei.
Khawa jarra nangni'n si-inlang, zaat rakip ngaikha siamruoi juoboolru; inmani kha Apa, Asa khat-um Ratha Inthiang ramingnga baptize thoru,
halli kei'n kinape chongpeii rakip juinasik ah inmani kha minchuru; halli, enru, manmasituol ahekkatung kei'n nangni kana-inruoipui chaksik eii.”
Hiwahi Pathian Sapa Jisu Christa jarra chongkahoi ngaikha eii.
Pathian chongkachoipa Isaiah larik-ah imajia angnga: “Pathian aleiti ‘Kei'n nang ma-ah kachongkachoi inkhat kajuotirsik eii ama'n nang sik-ah lam aboolsik eii.’
Neelramma kheek rasa inkhat khachu, ‘Pumi sik-ah lamkha booltaru; Ama lamkha mintuunru.’ ”
Khawa jarra John in neelramma aheisuok-ah, baptize ithole inruoiya Pathian chong aleiril. “Ningmanu-ah inphut heikir inlang baptize thoru” halli “Ningmanu rakip Pathian in anara-ngaidam pisik eii,” Ama'n mipuidiang aleiti.
John chongril kara-ngai sik-ah Jerusalem khuopui khat-um Judea ramsuungnga kaom mipui katamtak inheisuok. Inmani'n inmanu ngai inrilsuok halli ama'n Jordan tuidung suungnga inmani ngaikha baptize aleimintho.
John in salaileem mulla inbool puondiar aleitho, akhoongnga sawun koongkhit aleikhit, ama bak-inchu khai khat-um ramkhuoining alei eii.
Ama'n mipuidiang aleirilla ati, “Kei kanuk-ah akajuosik miringpa khachu kei neek-ah akaloksik eii. Keichu ama kekokrui kuunli kasuutsik kha-um rahoi suokmong
Kei'n tuiya baptize kanatho, takkha ama inchu Ratha Inthiangnga baptize anathosik eii.”
Khawasuoli sootlekleiya Jisu'n Galilee ramsuungnga kaom Nazareth khuopui makheiya inphut aheiwa halli John in Jordan tuidung suungnga baptize aleitho.
Jisu'n tuiya inphut hongsuokli, Ama'n marwaan suongkot inlong khat-um Ratha in achungnga Wathu angnga ijuochum kha aleimu.
Khat-um marwaanna inphut rasa inkhat ajuoa, “Nanghi kinaminriang tak kasapa kha na-eii. Nachungnga kamalung atai.”
Khawasuoli Ratha'n ama kha neelramma aleiruoi.
Khawa munkhan nisoommili, Seitan in aleimatheem. Ramsa ngaile khawa khan inleiom, takkha marwaan tirton ngai'n ama sanna inleinei.
John mikhumna suungnga indasuonuk, Jisu'n Galileeya asiya halli Pathian diangnga kajuo chongkahoi ngaikha aleiril.
“Apha kha ajuotungjei,” “Khat-um Pathian Rengram kha anaijei! Ningmanu-ah inphut malung thuul inlang chongkahoihi ngamnaru,” ama'n aleiti.
Jisu'n Galilee tuidiilpang ajuiya aheisuokli, ama'n ngakasur miring inni, Simon khat-um anai Andrew, leenna nga insur aleimu.
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Heiwaru kanuk najuiru, mi kasur namin-ekate.”
Khawapha takkhan inleen inda-ah inmani ngaikha amale inruoiya inleisi.
Ama'n asidetli unai inni, Zebedee sangai, James li John aleimu. Inmani'n rakuongnga inleen ngaikha worthanasik inleibool.
Jisu'n inmani amuli amumak, inmani aleikoi; khawa khan inmani'n inloom ruoingai khat-um inpa Zebedee kha rakuong suungnga inda-ah Jisu nukkha inleijui.
Jisu le asiamruoi ngai'n Capernaum khuopuiya inheiwa, halli Jisu'n akahong Jihudi ngai sernikhuo khan Synagogue-ah asiya aleiminchu.
Ama minchuna kha akajet mipui rakip in inleingak, ajarchu ama kha Dan Karu ngaile lei-in-angmak, khawa rathuulla, Ama'n thomatornale inruoiya aleiminchu.
Khawapha takkhan ratha kathamak kaluut miringkhat Synagogue-ah aheiluut halli rasa inringnga aleikheek.
“Angme keini diangnga nimanuom, Nazareth Jisu? Keini kanaminmangsik hin nijuobe? Kei'n nang kanajet, nangchu inthiang Pathian tirton kha na-eii!”
Jisu'n ratha diang chong aleipeii, “Omchianro, halli mipa diangnga inphut heisuokro!”
Ratha kathamak khan mipa kha kanatak-ah aleikanik, halli inringnga akheek-ah mipa diangnga inphut aheisuokjei.
Mipui ngaikhan inleingak, khawakhan inmani inkhatli inkhat in inleiti, “Hiwahi angmejei? Chongminchu kathar khabe? Hiwa mipa'n ranak kanei tak-ah ratha kathamak diang chong apeii, halli inmani'n achong injui!”
Hinthoa, Jisu chongngaihi innot tak-ah Galilee rampumpuiya alei-inthang.
Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngai'n James khat-um John le inruoiya, Synagogue inmathaanna Simon li Andrew ngai inntiang inleisi.
Simon tarpi kha ritun in athoa zaalmunna aleizaal, Jisu aheitungli, akananu jarra ama diang inleirilpi.
Ama'n akananu diang asiya, akut-ah numeisanu kha aleikatook-ah aleikeithei. Ritun in ama kha amathaanjei, halli numeisanu khan inmani sepa aleitho.
Kani tasuo kholei phakhan, mipui ngai'n akana khat-um raikhuo kaluut rakip ngaikha Jisu diang inheiruoi.
Khawa khuopuiya kaom mipui ngaikha khawa inn makhan inlei-inchun.
Jisu'n rirai rakip-ah kana katamtak ngaikha aleimindam khat-um raikhuo katamtak aleipuutsuok. Raikhuo ngai'n ama kha tume ti inleijet, khawa jarra Ama'n inmani ngaikha iteii leiminrilmak.
Ziingtiang kani suokma-ah, Jisu'n intheiya inn kha amathaanjei. Khuopui kha amathaanna mirasa neimakna munkhattiang aleisi, khawa munkhan ama'n Pathian aleini.
Takkha Simon khat-um asappui ngai'n insuok-ah ama kha inleiratok,
halli inmani'n ama injuomu phakhan, inti, “Mirakip in nangkha innaratok.”
Takkha Jisu'n aleimasang, “Hiwa hinna inphut eini'n khuo inkhattiang nisisik eii. Inmani diang-um kei chong kalarilsik eii, ajarchu khawa sik-ah kei kijuo eii.”
Khawa jarra ama'n Galilee rampumpui suungnga aleisi, Synagogue-ah chong aleiril halli raikhuo ngai aleipuutsuok.
Akaphar miring inkhat in Jisu diang ahongnga, kemurkhup thep-ah, halli nasanro tia nina aleinei. “Nang in nazoot inchu,” “Kei namindamro,” ama'n aleiti.
Jisu diang minriang kha aleisip, halli “Kei'n kanamindam zoot,” tia aleimasang, “Kadam kha etaro” tia akut aduongnga aleikatook!
Khawapha takkhan akaphar kha ama diangnga inphut asuok-ah halli ama kanakha adamjei.
Khawa makheiya Jisu'n chong ka-ngar kha ama diang arilla ama kha aleiminsi.
“Rangairo, hiwa jarhi tu inkhat diang-um rilpimaro, takkha si-inlang Thiampu diang nang juo-inmuro; khawa khan mirakip in nangkha nadamjei ti innajet nasik-ah, Moses chongpeii dungjuiya inmani diang pesik kasuok phurpeii kha juo inpero,” tia ama kha aleiminsi.
Takkha ama'n asuok-ah amun rakip-ah akasuok chongngai kha aleirilsuok. Inthiangnga, Jisu jarra ama'n chongkatamtak aleiril jarra Jisu'n mipui omna khuopui khan leisuok matormakjei. Khawa rathuulla ama'n mirasa neimakna mun ngaikhan aleiom, khat-um amun rakip-ah kaom mipui ngai'n ama koolla inheiwa.
Nikhuo lekkhat suoa Jisu'n Capernaum tiang aleikirnook, khat-um innkhan ama omjei iti chong alei-inthang.
Khawa jarra mipui katamtak ngaikha inheiwa-ah khawakhan tungnasik mun karuok leiommak, suongkotkuung kha-um leiruokmak, halli Jisu'n inmani diang Pathian chongkha aleirilpi.
Miring mili khat-in Jisu diang apang kathi mi inkhat inhongruoi pha,
mipui ngaikhan ajar-eya, miring pakha ama koolla heiluutpui matormu, khawa jarra inmani'n Jisu omnachei chungkhum inphongnga, mipakha azaalna pherle inruoiya injuomachum.
Inmani ngamna amupha, Jisu'n apang kathi mipa diang aleiti, “Kasapa, namanu ngaikha kanarangaidam suojei.”
Dan Karu lekkhat in khawa khan inlei in-ongnga inmalungnga inleingaidon,
“Ama'n angsik-ah hinna itime? Hiwa hichu Pathian chungnga irilse eii! Pathian amabit eii manu rakip kangaidam matorchu!”
Jisu'n inmani malung ngaidon ajet-ah, inmani diang aleiti, “Angsikme khawa ka-angngai ningngaidon?
Apang kathi mipa diang, ‘namanu ngai kanarangaidam pijei,’ ti emakli, inthei inlang, napher ruut inlang siro tihi hume kabei?
Kei'n nangni diang narilcheenpi kate, khachu, Miring Sapa'n nuoipil chungnga manu rakip ka-ngaidam sik ranak anei.” Khawa jarra apang kathipa diang ati,
“Kei'n nangdiang kati, intheiro, napher ruut inlang, na-inna sitro!”
Inmani'n in-enna inomlaitak, mipakha intheiya, apher kha aruut-ah innot-ah aleisuok, halli inmani rakip in inleingak-ah Pathian inminpaak-ah, “Hiwa ka-ang ngaihi suplamu lamumakmi inleiti!”
Jisu'n woikhat Galilee tuidiil pangtiang ahongkir nookpha, mipui katamtak amadiang inheiwa, halli ama'n inmani kha aleiminchu.
Ama'n asina lamma, rampar kakhoom, Alphaeus sapa Levi, ama rampar teelna munna in-ongkha aleimu. Jisu'n amadiang, “Kanuk najuiro,” aleiti. Halli Levi'n intheiya anuk aleijui.
Khawasuoa Jisu'n Levi inna bu aleibak. Rampar kakhoom katamtak ngaile, manukaroon ngai'n Jisu nuk inleijui, hanna inmani katam khatchu Jisu li asiamruoi ngai bubakna khan inlei-inchel.
Pharisee um ka-eii Dan Karu lekkhat in, manukaroon khat-um rampar kakhoom ngaile Jisu'n ibak suomkha inleimu, khawa jarra ama siamruoi ngaidiang inmani'n inleirakel, “Angsikme ama'n hiwa mi ngaile ibak suomhi?”
Jisu'n hiwa ajet-ah inmani diang aleimasang, “Tu ka-ang akadam ngaisikchu kathiam rangaimak, takkha akana mi sikchu arangai. Kei'n kijuo hichu akadik mi ngai kakoi kijuo emong, takkha manukaroon ngai kakoi kijuo eii.”
John Baptist nukkajui ngaili pharisee ngai'n bu-ngei nikhuo khan bu inleingei. Mi lekkhat in Jisu diang inhongnga inhongrakel, “Angtia John Baptist siamruoi ngaili Pharisee siamruoi ngai'n bu inngeili, nasiamruoi ngaichu inngeimak?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Moiruoina munna Moipa omlaiseng asap ngaikha bak-in inngeiya inomsik eii tia ningngaidonbe? khawakha emak! moipa inmanile omlaiseng chu, bak-in leiya omnunu.
Takkha moipa kha inmani diangnga inphut inlaruoi nasik nikhuo alajuosik eii, khawa phakhan inmani bu inla-ngeisik eii.”
“Tu inkhatbit innum puon katharkha neiman inlang puonmaruo chungnga phoudelmu, ajarchu akathar inphoukhan amaruokha kheella keiriinta achetna ahonglokpui detsik eii.
Tu innum theibomju kathar kha sawuntuong maruo ngaikhan thunngaimu, ajarchu amaruo sawuntuong khan theibomju kha aminmang, khat-um sawuntuongli theibomju inniya inmangsuomsik eii. Khawa rathuulla, theibomju kathar kha akathar sawuntuongnga inthunsik eii.”
Jihudi ngai Sernikhuo khan Jisu'n gehu billa aleisi. Asiamruoi ngai'n amale inheiwa phakhan, gehu wuuikha inleichin.
Khawa jarra Pharisee ngai'n Jisu diang inleiti, “Enro, Sernikhuoni nasiamruoi ngai ithohi eini Sinadan izootmak ngaikha eii.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “David khat-um ama mi ngai'n inwon champha, ama'n baksik ommakpha angme ileitho nangni lateel makchube?
Ama'n Pathian inna aluut-ah halli Pathian diangnga inpe waipool kha aleibak. Hiwahi Abiathar in Thiampu Kaliankhet achanglai khan aleisuok. Eini Sinadan dungjuiya chu Thiampu ngai bit-in ibakngaikha David in aleibak, halli ama mi ngaidiang-um aleipeii.”
Halli Jisu'n ahekna-ah ati, “Sernikhuo hichu miringngai thanasik-ah inbool eii; Sernikhuo sik-ah miring ngaihi inbool emak.
Khawa jarra miring sapa hi Sernikhuo Pumi kha-um eii.”
Khawasuo Jisu'n Synagogue-ah aleikirnook, khawakhan akut kathi miring inkhat aleiom.
Jisu diang noonnasik ithosial ombe tia athang suonasik kamanuom mi lekkhat khawakhan in-enna inleiom; khawa jarra inmani'n Sernikhuo khan ama'n miring pakha amindambe tia katha-ah inlei-ensui.
Jisu'n kanapa diang aleiti, “Matianghin hongkalro.”
Halli Ama'n inmani diang aleirakel, “Sernikhuo khan eini Sinadan in ang thocha atime? sansik emakli minmang sikbe? Tu ka-ang khat ringkhuo sansik emakli minmangsik hibe?” Takkha inmani'n iteii leirilmu.
Jisu'n amit kalek-ah inmani diang alei-enna aleiraang, inmani malung kangar khat-um inthamak jarra aleipoongpui. Khawasuoli ama'n mipa diangkhan aleiti, “Nakut keisuoro.” Ama'n akut aheikeisuo, halli akutkha aleidam.
Khawasuo Pharisee ngai'n Synagogue inmathaanna inleisi; halli Herod mi ngaile innot-ah in-inmuwa, inmani'n Jisu thatnasik chuon inleiminsuuk.
Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaile Galilee tuidiiltiang inleisi, Galileeya inphut mipui katamtak in anuk inleijui,
Judea ramma, Jerusalemma, Idumea ramma, Jordan raaltiangnga kaom ram, khat-um Tyre le Sidon rampumpuiya mi katamtak in Jisu itho ngaikha injet-ah amadiang inheiwa.
Mipui intamhei jarra ama in-uum maknasik Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang rakuong inkhat amasik minteiru aleitipi. Jisu sik asiamruoi ngai'n rakuong inleimintei.
Ama'n mi katamtak aleimindam, khat-um akana rakip in ama katooknasik ama omnatiang inlei-inneng.
Ratha kathamak kanei mirakip in ama inmu phakhan, inmani'n amaikuungnga inleipur khat-um inringnga inleikheek, “Nangchu Pathian Sapa kha na-eii!”
Jisu'n ratha kathamak ipuutpi inmani ngaidiang ama tutakme tihi tu inkhatdiang tipimaru tia chong kanatak aleipeii.
Jisu'n ching inkhat akalla halli ama'n imanuom mi ngaikha aleikoi. Inmani'n amadiang inheiwa,
han ama'n soomleini ngaikha amale inruoisik khat-um chongkaril sik-ah aleikadangnga “Tirton tia aleikoi,
khat-um raikhuo ngai puutsuok nasik ranak aleipeii.”
Hiwa senghi ikadang soomleini ngaikha in-eii: Simon (Peter tia Jisu'n araming aphuo);
James li anai John, Zebedee sangai (Jisu'n Boanerges tia araming aleiphuo, hiwa tinachu “Ruokinri sapa ngai” tina eii);
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus sapa James, Thaddaeus, Simon Patriot,
Halli Judas Iscariot, Jisu kajuorpa, hiwa ngaihi in-eii.
Khawa suoli Jisu'n inntiang aleikir. Woikhat-um khawa ka-ang akatam mipui inchun nook-ah Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngaikha bubaknasik pha leimumu.
Ama insuung mi ngai'n hiwachong injetpha, inmani'n amakha ruoinasik inleitho, ajarchu inmani'n inleiti, “Amahi inweetjei!”
Jerusalem tiangnga kahong Dan Karu lekkhat ngai'n, “Ama suungnga Beelzebul om! raikhuo ngai lamkakeipa khan amadiang ranak apeya halli inmani iminpuutsuok eii,” inleiti.
Khawa jarra Jisu'n inmani ngaikha akoolla koiya, inmani diang chongminkhi ngaikha aleirilpi: “Angtho thoa Seitan in Seitan apuutsuok sikme?
Rengram inkhat in inthenkhoiya rupni insuok inchu inkhatli inkhat insuol inta, khawa rengram kha akoisik eii.
Insuungkhur inkhat inthenkhoiya rupni insuok inchu inkhatli inkhat insuol inta, khawa insuungkhur kha akoisik eii.
Khawa jarra Seitan rengram hi rupni suok ah inthenkhoi inchu, khawa kha sootnuni, takkha alek alek-ah koita amang wiaksik eii.
Tu inkhat innum aka-ngar mipa kha akhitmasa-ah adamak inchu, a-inn luut-ah aneinaak rakip kha leimator nuni.
Inthiangnga kei'n nangni diang kitihi eii, khachu mi ngai manu rakip khat-um inrilse angjet leiom innum angaidam pisik eii.
Takkha tu e-innum Ratha Inthiang chungnga karilse ngaikha angtikniteii ngaidam pinuni, ajarchu ama'n hektik kaboi manu kha athojei.”
“Ama suungnga ratha kathamak kha aom” mi lekkhat in inti jarra, Jisu'n hiwahi aleiti.
Khawa suoli Jisu anu le anai ngai inhongtung jei. Inmani'n inntuolla inngirra amadiang chong inminsiya ama inleikoi.
Jisu koolla mipui katamtak inlei in-ong, halli inmani'n ama diang inleiti, “Enro, nanu le na-u nanai, nasar ngai'n tuolla nang inna inmupuizoot-ah inom.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Tume kei kanu? Tume kei ka-u kanai ngai?”
Ama koolla in-ong mipui ngaikha ahei-enna aleiti, “Enru! Hinna kaom ngaihi kei kanu khat-um kei ka-u kanai ngaikha in eii!
Tu e-innum Pathian lungdou katho ngaikha ka-u kanai, kanu khat-um kasar ngaikha in eii.”
