“Awinichu Pumi'n kei kadiang anasanjei,” “Halli ama'n aleiti, kei kadiang mipui'n rilse nakha ama'n nakhaipijei!”
Elizabeth naiwonna tharuk ahongtung phakhan Pathian in tirton Gabriel kha Galilee khopui suungnga kaom Nazareth khuo khan ajuotir.
David phungnga Joseph diang inbiakjei inthiang numeisa chungnga Pathian tirton aleijuo, halli inthiang numeisanu kha Mary inti,
Halli marwaan tirton kha ajuoa ati, “Nang nadiang kadai omrase! Pumi kha nang nachungnga aom, Numeisa ngai karra nanghi rawaan kathakhet na eii!”
Takkha ama'n marwaan tirton chongkha ajet phakhan amalung upleiminchaak, angkachang chongme tia amalungnga lei-inngaidon.
Marwaan tirton in amadiang ati, Mary, “China neimaro, Pathian minriang nakha nangnadiang omjei.
Enro, nang in napum inrikta pasal inkhat naneisik eii, halli ama raming Jisu tinata nakoisik eii.
Ama kha kalian e-sik eii, halli insaangkhet Pathian sapa tia inkoisik eii, khat um Pumi Pathian in amadiang apa David reng in-ong nakha apesik eii.
Ama'n Jacob phungruiya hektik kaboiya reng achangsik eii, halli Ama Rengram kha haktik omnuni!”
Mary in Pathian tirton diang aleiti, “Kei inthiang numeisa ka eii, angtho thoa hiwahi etheiniyame?”
Marwaan tirton in khawa neinudiang amasang, “Ratha inthiang in nang nadiang ajuosik eii, halli Pathian ranakkha nang nadiang namakhusik eii, hiwajarra nang in nai neinata inthiang naiteii ramingkha Pathian sapa intisik eii.
Enro, nang naphung Elizabeth kha, upa e-innum pasal inkhat awonjei, halli wonkachoimak intinukha atuunchu tharuk ejei.
Tichu, Pathian diang angrakip ka e-matormak ommak.”
Mary in ati; “Kei Pumi suoknu ka-eii,” “Nang iti chongkha kei kadiang isuok erase.” Halli Pathian tirton in aleimathaanjei.
Mary in innottheiya intheiya khawa chingram Judea khuopui khan aleisi.
Ama'n Zechariah inn kha leiluut ah Elizabeth diang inpaakna chong aleipei.
Halli Elizabeth in Mary inpaakna chong aleijet phakhan, awonsuung makheiya naiteikha siing hong-insa halli Elizabeth kha Ratha Inthiang in aleisip.
Ama'n inringnga ahongkheek, “Numeisa ngai karra nanghi rawaan katha na eii, khat um nawonsik naiteii kha-um rawaan katha esik eii!
Tichu Pumi nu'n keidiang i-najuophahi angjarra hiwa ka-ang kalok chuonhi keikadiang isuokme?
Enro, nang minpaakna rasa kajet phakhan, kawon suungnga kaom naiteii khan arok-ah lei-inchoom.
Pumi'n angrakip kasuoksik amadiang chong irilpi ngaikha kangamnajei ama kha, rawaan katha eii!”
Mary in aleiti, “Kamalungnga Pumi kha kaminpaak;
Karatha'n kanakatanpa Pathian diang karokpui,
Ajarchu keihi ama suok kasiinkhet ka e-innum ama'n ana-ngaidon! ­­­­­­­­­ Atuun makheichu, mi rakip in keihi rawaan kathanu innatisikjei.
Ajarchu Karaat khet Pathian in kei kadiang kalian choun athojarra eii. Araming kha inthiang eii.
Ama minriang nakha Ama khoya katho midiang khang rakip ah aminmu.
Ama ngarna abaankha aduong halli in-or miringngai i-ngaidon kha aminmangpi.
Pathian in rengkalian ngaikha in-ongna mun makheiya aminpur, halli inniam mikha kadomsaang.
Ama'n won kachaam karaal ngaikha katha ah leiwaisip, halli inchong rakipkha kutkaruok ah leiminsi,
Ama minriang nakha inngaidonna sik ah Asuok Israel ngaikha aleisan,
Ama'n nipi nipu ngaidiang ileiril angnga, Abraham khat-um ama tu-lesa rakip diang um hektik kaommak minriang nakha minmurase!”
Mary in thathum Elizabeth le inleiom halli ama'n inntiang aleikirnook.
Elizabeth nainei nasik pha alei-eya, ama'n sapasal inkhat aleinei.
Ama indiang inwaipui ngaili a-u-ngai'n Pumi minriangna loknakha amadiang om tihi inleijet ah amale roksuomna inleinei.
Niriat huuini naiteii kha wuntannasik-ah inleisi, halli inmani'n apa raming kajuisik ah ama ramingkha Zechariah tia inleikoizoot.
Takkha anu'n aleiti, “Chamak! ama raming John nitisik eii.”
Inmani'n anudiang inleiti, “Atuteii nangni insuungkurra hiwa raming karoon ommu!”
Khale inruoiya inmani'n apa diang angkachang raming natisikme tia jettheinasik-ah inleirakeel.
Zechariah in majianasik lungpeek kha aleiniya aleimajia, “Ama ramingchu John.” Halli inmani rakip in ngakna inleinei!
Khawapha takkhan Zechariah in chong hong riltheinook-ah Pathian minpaakna chong ahongriljei.
Ama sirpangnga kaom ngaikhan kachi'n aleisip, halli hiwa jarra Judea chingram suungnga kaom khuo rakipdiang inleirilthang.
Hiwajarra kajet mirakip in inmalungnga inlei-inkel, “Angme hiwa naipangpa'n hong e-sik?” Pumi chuontho kha amadiang om.
John pa Zachariah kha Ratha Inthiang in asip ah Pathain chong aleiril:
“Israel Pumi Pathian kha minpaakru, Ama'n ami ngai kasansik aleijuo halli ami ngaikha akatanjei,”
Asuok David phungrui makheiya, ama'n einisik ah akalian Nakatanpa Pumi anapejei.
Ama chongkhit nakha inthiang Pathian chongkachoi ngaidiang tialleiya inphut inleiril,
Tichu, ni inhalpui mi makheiya anasansik, ranak kanei ni-inhalpui rakip kutchungnga anasansik eii.
Ama riangwai chongkhit nakha nipi nipu ngaidiang minmunasik. Halli ama inthiang inzootnakha ngaidonnasik.
Nipa Abraham diang chongkhit nale inruoiya,
Ama'n eini ni-inhalpui mi ngai makheiya nasannasik eii tia chong inkhetna naleipei, halli ama kha kachi omlekleiya sepa thothei nasik anazootpi.
Eini ringkho omlaiseng ama maikuungnga inthiangnga niomsik eii.
“Nang, kei kasa, Insaangkhet Pathian chong kachoipa innatisik eii. Nang in Pumi neek ah ma-sanata ama lamkha naboolsik eii.
inmani manu ngaikha ngaidampita ama mi ngaikha kalakatansik eii tia tipinasik eii.
Ajarchu Pathian chu minriang kasip eii, Ama'n sanminring nakha ziingtiang khowar angnga einidiang aminwar
Kaziingnga kaom ngaili thina raliya kaom ngaidiang war inchangnasik, ama'n kadai lamtiang lam nakeiruoisik eii.”
Naiteikha insoonna taksali Ratha ah ahong raatjei, halli ama'n Israel mirakip maikuungnga inlar maklaiseng ramruok khan aleiom.
Augustus rengpa'n Rome ramsuungseng milu teelnasik-ah chong aleipeii phakhan,
Quirinius in Syria wairoon suungnga hiwahi ma-insakhet milukateel kha a-eii.
Mirakip in inmani inmani khuopui suungnga inraming kapeluut inleisi.
Joseph um Galilee inti Nazareth khopui makheiya Bethlehem tia inkoi David khopui Judea ramsuungnga aleisi, ajarchu ama kha David phungrui e-jarra eii.
Ama numei ka-esik naikawon Mary khale raming kapeluut inleisi,
halli inmani'n Bethlehemma inleiom phakhan, nainei nasik pha alei ejei.
Mary in sapasal ma-insakhet aleinei, khale inruoiya puonna leikasuunna, sarakuong suungkhan aleiminzaal, ajarchu inmani'n omnasik innkha leiommak.
Khawa phakhan keelngam kakhaalngai kha, keelngam khaalna munna keelngam kha zaalsoot inngaak ah inleiom.
Pumi marwaan tirton kha inmani diang aleiinlar, han Pumi poinakha inmani diang aleiminmu, halli inmani kha kachi'n aleisip.
Marwaan tirton in inmani diang aleiti, “Chimaru! Kei'n mirakip roknasik chong kahoikha nangnidiang kajuochoi.
Awini nikhuohin Kanasanpa Christa Pumi kha David khopuiya inneijei.
Hiwahi nangnisik-ah jetna eii; nangni'n naiteii kha puonna kasuun inta sarakuongnga inleiminzaal kha ningjuomusik eii.”
Jetlei theileiya tirton khale marwaan raalmi tirton katamtak in Pathian minpaakna laa injuosak;
“Marwaan insaangnakhet khan Pathian lurlian nakha omrase, halli ama kaminriang mi rakipdiang manmasituolla kadaikha omrase!”
Tirton ngai'n marwaan tiang inleikir phakhan, keelngam kakhaal ngai'n khatli khatdiang inlei inti, “Pumi'n einidiang ileiti ngaihi, Bethlehemma juosi inlang angrakip kasuok ngaikha juoenrui.”
Khale inruoiya inmani'n innottheiya insiya mary li Joseph kha injuomu halli naiteii kha-um sarakuongnga inminzaalla inleidakha injuomu.
Inmani'n neiteii kha injuomu phakhan, Tirton kha'n naiteii jarra ileiril rakipkha inmani diang inleirilpi.
Keelngam kakhaal ngai'n inril chong kajet mi rakip in ngakna inleinei.
Mary in inmani'n inleiril chong rakip ngaikha kathatak ah amalung suungnga aleingaidonrep.
Keelngam kakhaal ngai'n inleikirra inmani diang Pathian tirton in ileirilpijek kha injuomu injuojet jarra Pathian kha inminlur inminlianna inleiminpaak.
Wuntan nasik niriat honghuui phakhan, marwaan tirton in ama kha inwonma ah araming inleiphuopi angnga, aramingkha Jisu inleitijei.
Moses Dan chongpei dungjuiya Joseph li Mary in naiteii kha minthiang nasikpha ahongtungjei. Khawale inruoiya naiteii kha Pumi diang peluutnasik-ah Jerusalemma inleichoi,
Pumi Dan khan hinthoa leiinjia angnga, “Pasan ma-insakhet ah innei rakipchu Pumi diang minthiangnasik-ah inpeluutsik eii.”
Halli Pumi Dan khan areiom iti dungjuiya, “Wathu inni, emakli pharbaliteii inni kha penasik-ah inleichoi.”
Jerusalem ma miring inkhat araming Simeon inti aleiom, ama kha kadik khat um Pathian kachi mi alei eii, halli Israel ngai sanminringna kamusik-ah kangaak chak ah kaom mi kha-um aleieii. Ratha Inthiang khan amadiang alei-inruoipui
halli Pumi chong inkhitna ah ipei Messiah kha namumaklaiseng thinutin tia amadiang inngamna-um aleipeii.
Simeon kha Ratha in inruoipuiya biak-inna aleiluut. Dan dungjuiya anuli apa'n naiteii Jisu kha biak-inna inleiruoi phakhan,
Simeon in naiteii kha akut-ah pomma Pathian leiminpaak ah ati:
“Pumi atuun chu, nang chong inkhitnakha namintungjei, nasuok keihi kadaiya naminsitaro.
Nang Sanminringna kha kamit tak-ah kamujei.
Nang in mipui maikuungnga nileimisuukpikha.
Hiwa war in zaatlop ngaidiang nalungdou minmunasik, halli nang lurlian nakha nang nami Israel ngaidiang minmusik eii.”
Simeon in naiteii jarra irilpi chong rakip kha anu li apa'n aleijet phakhan inleingak.
Halli Simeon in inmani diang rawaan aleipeiya Mary diang aleiti, “ Hiwa naiteii hi Israel ngaidiang insuina khat um sanminringna angjet kapesik-ah Pathian in ikadang ejei. Ama'n Pathian injettheina eta miring angjet in enhal-inta inrilsesik eii,
halli inthup ah kaom inmani ngaidonna ngaikha malarsik eii. Halli malung kasekha chemlujumma innasun angnga namalungkha asunkhoisik eii.”
Pathian chong kachoi numeisa araming Anna inti Phanuel sanu Asher zaat makheiya inkhat aleiom, ama kha upa lei ejei halli inn aneiya aruotharle kumsari bit aleiom,
halli ama'n kumsoomriat leimili katung chuulmei inkhat eya aleiom, halli ama'n biak-inn kha leimathaan lekleiya suunli zaan Pathian chubei thoa bu ngeiya Pathian niya aleiom.
Khawapha takkhan numeisanu kha-um heitungnga Pathian leiminpaak ah Jerusalem katannasik-ah Pathian kangak mi ngaidiang naiteii jarra aleirilpi.
Josheph li Mary in Pumi Dan dungjuiya angrakip thodan kasuok ngaikha inminhek ah Galilee ramsuungnga kaom inmani khopui Nazareth ah inleikirjei.
Naiteii kha ahong in-soonna ahongngarjei; singnatheina'n leisip ah Pathian rawaan kha amadiang aleiom.
Kumsuoa Jisu nuli apa kha Jerusalemma rakaanna kahoi inchelsik-ah inleisi.
Jisu kha kum soomleini ahong ephakhan a-ngai angnga inmani'n Jerusalemma rakaanna kahoi inchel inleisi.
Kahoi kha hakli inmani'n inntiang inleikir phakhan, Jisu'n Jerusalemma aleiom, anuli apa inchu leijetmu.
Inmani karra inchel tia suunsoot lamkhan inleisi, halli inmani'n Jisu kha insuungkhur ngaili insappui ngai karra kaentok inleiphut,
Inmani'n Jisu kha leimumu, khale inruoiya inmani'n Jerusalem tiang inkirra ama ka-entok inleisi.
Nithum suoa ama kha biak-inna Jihudi karu ngaile in-ongnga inmani chongkha rangaiya halli inmani diang chong rakella ileiomkha injuomu.
Ama'n kasing kathei tak ah imasangli irakelngai kajet rakip in inleingak.
Anuli apa'n injuomu phakhan ngakna inleinei halli anu'n amadiang ati, “Sapa, angsik ah nang in keinidiang hin ninathome? Napa li kei'n malung kapoong tak ah nangkha kinnaentok eii.”
Halli Ama'n inmani diang heimasang, “Angsik-ah nangni'n kei ningna entokme? kei'n Kapa inna kaomsik tihi nangni'n jetmak chuwabe?”
Halli ama irilpi kha inmani'n leijet matormu.
Khale inruoiya Jisu'n chongjuina aleineiya inmanile Nazareth tiang inleikir, halli anu'n akasuok choun rakip kha amalung suungnga aleida.
Jisu'n singna theinali taksa ah hong insoonna, Pathian khat-um mipui ngai minriang nakha alei inkheel.
Tiberius in kum soomleira-nga reng hongroonna kum khan, Pontius Pilate kha-um Judea waikaroon alei eii, halli Herod kha um Galilee ramkaroon alei eii, halli ama naipa Philip kha Iturea khat-um Trachonitis ramsuung karoon alei eii, Lysaniah kha Abilene ramkaroon alei eii.
Annas li Caiaphas hi thiampu kalian inlei eii, halli Pathian chongkha Zechariah sapa John diang neelramma aleijuo.
Khale inruoiya John in Jordan tuidung ikakuol ramsuung rakip ah aleisiya, “Ningmalung thuul inlang baptized thoro, halli Pathian in ningmanu ngaikha nangaidam pisik ei iti chong kha aleiril.”
Pathian chongkachoi Isaiah larik ah lei-injia angnga, “Mi inkhat in neelramma aleikheek: ‘Pumi lamkha minsuuk ru; halli ama sinasik lamkha mintuunru!
Akuok rakip kha aminsipsik eii, chingmuol khat-um chingbung insaang rakip alaminzoolsik, Lam kakem rakip alamintuunsik, kathamak lam rakip aminthasik eii.
Miring rakip in Pathian Sanminringna kha inlamusik eii!’ ”
John diang baptized kathosik kaheiwa Mipui rakipdiang ama'n inmani diang aleitipi, “E maruul sangai!” “Pathian rachaakna akajuosik makheiya ning inthup matornasik eii tihi atu'n natipiyame?
Ningmanu makheiya malung kinthuuljei tina chuon kha malarru, halli ningni karra Abraham kha kinpukaru eii tikhaimaru. Kei'n nangnidiang kanati, Pathian in hiwa lungpui ngaihi Abraham tuli sangai amin-eii mator.
Han thingkuung kha arajungnga tukkhiak nasik-ah rei insuuk ah aomjei, Thingkuung rakip akara katha kakara makseng reiya tukkhiak inta meiya inhaalsik eii.”
Mipui'n amadiang inrakel, “Halle angme keini'n kinthosik?”
Ama'n inmani diang amasang, “Atu ka-ang in songkol inni anei inchu, kaneimak padiang inkhat perase, halli atu ka-ang baksik kanei ngai innum hiwa angnga thorusu.”
Rampar kakhoom mi lekkhat baptize kathosik-ah inheiwa halli inmani'n amadiang inleirakel, “Karu, angme keini'n kithosik?”
Ama'n inmani diang aleitipi. Ningni'n ningleisik kasuok kheella leimaru,
Raalmi lekkhat innum amadiang inleirakel, “Keini leii angme kinthosik?” Ama'n inmani diang ati, “Mi ngaikha kadikmak lamma sial leimaru emakli kadikmak noonkuung pemaru. Nangni'n ningthoman nape khan hunru.”
John Jarra Mipui'n inmalungnga inleingaidonle inruoiya inlei inkel, amahi Christa be e-makbe.
John'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Kei'n nangni kha tuiya baptized kanatho, takkha kei neek ah kalok mi inkhat kha ajuosik eii, Kei'n ama kekokrui kha kashuut sik a-um rahoi emong, Ama'n nangni kha Ratha inthiang li meiya baptized nathosik eii.
Ama'n saangzaap nakha akut ah achoiya, saangseng zaapthiangta sapangnga adasik eii, halli sarasi sengkha hektik kaboi meikhan ahaalsik eii.”
Khale inruoiya John in omchan intei angjet ah mipui diang chong kahoi kha aleiril halli inmani omchan ngaikha thuulnasik aleirilpi.
Takkha John in waikaroon Herod kha leiran, ajarchu Herodias anaipa Philip numei aneipiya halli ama'n kathamak choun angjet um aleitho.
Khale inruoiya Herod in kheella kathamakthei chuon aleitho-ah John kha mikhumna ah aleida.
Mi rakipkha Baptized inleithosuo phakhan, Jisu kha-um baptized aleitho. Ama'n Pathian aleini phakhan marwaan alei inlong,
Halli Ratha Inthiang kha taksa omchanna wathu angnga amadiang aleijuo. Halli marwaan makheiya rasa'n ajuoti, “Nanghi kei iminriang khet kasapa na eii, nangdiang kei kamalung atai.”
Jisu'n achoun aleiphut phakhan, Ama kha kum soomthum alei eii. Halli amahi mipui'n Heli sapa Joseph sa eii tia inleingaidon,
Heli hi Matthat sapa eii, Matthat hi Levi sapa eii, Levi hi Melchi sapa eii, Melchi hi Jannai sapa eii, Jannai hi Joseph sapa eii,
Joseph hi Mattathias sapa eii, Mattathias hi Amos sapa eii, Amos hi Nahum sapa eii, Nahum hi Esli sapa eii, Esli hi Naggai sapa eii,
Naggai hi Maath sapa eii, Maath hi Mattathias sapa eii, Mattathias hi Semein sapa eii, Semein hi Josech sapa eii, Josech hi Joda sapa eii,
Joda hi Joanan sapa eii, Joanan hi Rhesa sapa eii, Rhesa hi Zerubbabel sapa eii, Zerubbabel hi Shealtiel sapa eii, Shealtiel hi Neri sapa eii,
Melchi hi Addi sapa eii, Addi hi Cosam sapa eii, Cosam hi Elmadam sapa eii, Elmadam hi Er sapa eii,
Er hi Joshua sapa eii, Joshua hi Eliezer sapa eii, Eliezer hi Jorim sapa eii, Jorim hi Matthat sapa eii, Matthat hi Levi sapa eii,
Levi hi Simeon sapa eii, Simeon hi Judah sapa eii, Judah hi Joseph sapa eii, Joseph hi Jonam sapa eii, Jonam hi Eliakim sapa eii,
Eliakim hi Melea sapa eii, Melea hi Menna sapa eii, Menna hi Mattatha sapa eii, Mattatha hi Nathan sapa eii, Nathan hi David sapa eii,
David hi Jesse sapa eii, Jesse hi Obed sapa eii, Obed hi Boaz sapa eii, Boaz hi Salmon sapa eii, Salmon hi Nahshon sapa eii,
Nahshon hi Amminadab sapa eii, Amminadab hi Admin sapa eii, Admin hi Arni sapa eii, Arni hi Hezron sapa eii, Hezron hi Perez sapa eii, Perez hi Judah sapa eii,
Judah hi Jacob sapa eii, Jacob hi Isaac sapa eii, Isaac hi Abraham sapa eii, Abraham hi Tera sapa eii, Tera hi Nahor sapa eii,
Nahor hi Serug sapa eii, Serug hi Reu sapa eii, Reu hi Peleg sapa eii, Peleg hi Eber sapa eii, Eber hi Shilah sapa eii,
Shilah hi Cainan sapa eii, Cainan hi Arphaxad sapa eii, Arphaxad hi Shem sapa eii, Shem hi Noah sapa eii, Noah hi Lamech sapa eii,
Lamech hi Methuselah sapa eii, Methuselah hi Enoch sapa eii, Enoch hi Jared sapa eii, Jared hi Mahalaleel sapa eii, Mahalaleel hi Kenan sapa eii,
Kenan hi Enosh sapa eii, Enosh hi Seth sapa eii, Seth hi Adam sapa eii, Adam hi Pathian sapa eii.
Jisu kha Ratha Inthiang in asip-ah Jordan makheiya ahongkirra ama kha Ratha'n neelramtiang aleiruoi,
Nisoommili seitan in aleimatheemma iteii leibakmak, khawa hekli awon aleichaampi.
Seitan'n amadiang aleiti, “Nang in Pathian sapa na-e-inchu, hiwa lunghi waipool uolro tipiro.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Chong inthiang in ati, ‘Miring ngai'n waipool abit ringnunu.’ ”
Khale inruoiya seitan in ching insaangtiang aruoiya inoottheiya manmasituol rengram rakip aleiminmu.
“Kei'n hiwangai rakip ranak khat-um neinaak ngaihi kanapesik eii,” Seitan'n aleti, “Hiwa ngai rakiphi kei kadiang inape kha ejei, halli kei'n kipezoot miring diang kapesik eii.
Nang in chubei nanatho inchu hiwa-ngai rakip hi nang nata esik eii.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Chong Inthiang in ati, ‘Nang na Pumi Pathian khabit chubei nathosik khat-um ama sepabit nathosik eii!’ ”
Khale inruoiya seitan in Jerusalem tiang aruoiya biak-inn chung insaangnakhet munna aminngirra amadiang aleiti, “Nanghi Pathian sapa na-e inchu hiwa makheiya inchoomro.
Chong inthiang khan hin ati, nang kanasansik-ah ‘Pathian in ama tirton kha chong peta juotirsik eii.’
Halli inmani'n nang nakeii kha lungngai khan nasukmaknasik ah inmani'n inkut ngaikhan innaleipomsik eii.”
Takkha Jisu'n aleimasang, “Chong inthiang in ati, ‘Nang in na Pumi Pathian kha madan in enmaro.’ ”
Seitan in Jisu kha angrakip lamma matheemsuoli ama'n aphakhat sik-ah Jisu kha aleimathaan.
Jisu kha Ratha ranak in sip-ah Galilee tiang aleikir, halli ama jarra khawa ramsuung rakip ah araming kha lei-inthang.
Ama'n Synagogues ah aleiminchu, halli mi rakip in inleiminpaak.
Khale iruoiya Jisu'n ama honglok namun Nazareth ah aleisi, halli Sabbath nikhoni Synagogue ah a-ngai angnga aleisiya ama'n Pathian chong kateelsik ahongngir,
halli amadiang Pathian chongkachoipa Isaiah larik kha inleipeii. Ama'n larik kha aphongnga hinthoa inleimajia ajuomu,
“Pumi Ratha kha kei kachungnga aom, ajarchu ama'n keihi sara ngaidiang chongkahoi karil sik-ah anakadangjei, halli ama'n mikhumna-ah kaom ngaidiang katanna chong karilsik, khat um Mit kamumak ngaikha minmunasik, halli inkanengjuon mi ngaikha kakatansik,
halli Pumi in ami ngaikha sannasik ah aphakha juotung sikjei tia minjetnasik ah inajuotir eii.”
Jisu'n larik kha akhumma, sepa kathopa diang aleipekirnook ah alei in-ong, Synagogue ah kaom mirakip in amadiang katha ah inlei-en.
Halli ama'n inmani diang aleiti, “Awini nangni'n ningrangai jarra hiwa Pathian chonghi huui tungjei.”
Halli mi rakip in ama jarra kathatak ah inleiril, ama murra inphut juokasuok rawaan chongngaikhan inleingak ah inmani'n inleiti, “Hiwa miring pahi Joseph sapa emak abe?”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni'n suoilekleiya hiwa chongngil hi kei kadiang ningnatisik eii, ‘Kathiam, napumtak damna inpero.’ Keini'n kin ijet Capernaumma nang in chuon nitho rakip kha hiwa nang nakhopui hinnum thonookro.
Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangkha natipi kate,” “Pathian chong kachoi ngaihi angtikseng inkhuosuung achu kayanunu.
Takkha Kei'n inthiangnga natipikate, Elijah phakhan Israel la chuulmei katamtak inleiom, halli kumthum le tharuk hi ruo leisurmak jarra khawa ramsuung rakip ah bukawaang aleisuok,
Elijah kha tu diang um leiminsimak, takkha Zerephath inti Sidon ramsuungnga kaom chuulmei numeisanu diang aleiminsi.
Khale inruoiya Pathian chong kachoi Elisha phakhan, Israel karra mi angjet takbang ri karoon inleiom; tuteii kha kadam leiommu takkha Syrian makheiya Naaman khabit aleidam.”
Synagogue ah kaom mipui'n inleijet phakhan, inmani'n inleiraang.
Inmani'n inhong intheiya Jisu kha inmani khopui makheiya inheiruoiya inkhuo luona chingbungnga inleirruoi. Halli ama kha karoolla matanasik ah inleingaidon,
takkha ama'n mipui karra aleiluut ah suokdeljei.
Jisu'n Galilee khuopui Capernaum tiang aleisi, Sabbath nikhoni ama'n aleiminchu.
Halli ama minchu nakhan inmani'n inleingak, ajarchu ama'n ranak kaom tak-ah chong aleiril.
Synagogue khan ratha kathamak kaluut miring inkhat aleiom; halli ama'n inringnga ahongkheek,
“E! Nazareth Jisu, Angme keinidiang makheiya nimanuom? keini rakip kanamingmang sik-ah nijuobe? kei'n tu na-eme tihi kanajet, Pathian diang makheiya inthiangkha na eii!”
Jisu'n ratha kathamak diang aleiran, “Omchian inlang amadiang makheiya heisuokro!” Raikhuo khan ama kha mipui maikuungnga juoworjuolla ama kha iteii minpop lekleiya asuokjei.
Mipui'n ngakna inleineiya khatli khatdiang inlei-inti, “Angkachang chongme hiwahi? ranak li thomatorna kanei hiwa mipa'n kathamak ratha ngaidiang chong apeili inmani'n inheisuok!”
Halli Jisu jarra khawa ramsuungnga kaom mun rakip ah inleirilthangjei.
Jisu'n intheiya Synagogue alei mathaanna Simon innkhan aleiluut, Simon tarpi kha ritun kangar in aleina-ah aleiom, halli inmani'n kananu jarra Jisu diang inleirilpi,
Jisu'n kananu koolla ngirra ritundiang aleirakook, halli ritun khan alei mathaanjei, khawa suoa numeisanu khan intheiya inmani sepa aleitho.
Kani ajuota phakhan rirai karoon angjet inmani'n Jisu diang inheiruoi; ama'n inmani rakip takchungnga akut duongnga mindamna aleinei.
“Nanghi Pathian sapa na eii tia raikhuo angjet in inkheek ah inleisuok.” Takkha Jisu'n raikhuo diang ranna aleinei, halli chongkha leiminrilmak, ajarchu inmani'n injet amahi Christa eii.
Khuo ahongwar phakhan Jisu'n mi ommakna muna aleisi, Takkha mipui'n ama kha inhei entok, halli inmani'n injuomu phakhan Jisu kha inmanile inthenpuimak nasik inleitho.
Takkha inmani diang aleiti, “Kei'n Pathian Rengram chong kahoihi aleiilaak khuopui diang um kajuorilsik eii, ajarchu hiwa sikbeiya keihi inajuotir eii.”
Khale inruoiya khawa ramsuungnga kaom Synagogue ngaikhan Pathian chong aleirilpi.
Jisu'n Gennesaret tuidiil pangnga aleingirra aleiom phakhan mipui'n Pathian chong karangaisik ama kooltiang innengtirra inheiwa.
Halli ama'n tuipangnga rakuong inni aleimu, takkha ngakasur ngaichu rakuong makheiya insuok ah leen inrasuwa inleiom.
Jisu'n rakuong inkhat ah aleiluut, khawakha Simon ta alei eii, halli ama'n aleitipi tuilaitiang lektei heinamru. Halli Jisu'n rakuongnga in-ongnga mipuidiang kaminchu aleiphut.
Ama'n arilsuoa, Simon diang aleiti, “Rakuong kha tui inthuup natiang namluutro, halli naleen kha nga surnasik worro.”
Simon'n aleimasang “Karu,” “Keini'n Zaansoot leen kinworra iteii kinsurmak ejei. Takkha nang iti dungjungya kei'n leenhi wortakte.”
Inmani'n leen ngaikha inwor phakhan nga katamtak lei-inkhit ah leen ngaikha leichetsik leithojei.
Halli inmani'n rakuong khat ah kaom insap ngaikha inkut inzaap ah nasannasik inleikoi. Inmani'n inheiwa ah rakuong innikha nga inleiminsip wiak ah inmani rakuong kha tuiya luutsik aleitho.
Simon Peter in kasuok rakip amu phakhan, Jisu kekuungnga inbok ah aleiti, “Ka Pumi” kei kadiang makheiya sitaro, ajarchu keihi manu karoon mi ka eii.
Simon khat-um amale kaleiom mi rakip in inmani'n nga katamtak inleisur jarra ngakna inleinei,
Khawa khanna kaleiom kha Simon le inlop Zebedee sapa Jame li John in eii, halli Jisu'n Simon diang aleiti, “Chimaro; atuun makheiya inphut nanghi mikasur na-esikjei.”
Inmani rakuong kha muongtiang inleinuksuok, angrakip inmathaanna halli Jisu kha inleijui.
Jisu'n khuopui inkhat ah aleiom phakhan, pasal inkhat takbang ri karoon inkhat aheiwa, ama'n Jisu aleimu phakhan, inbok ah Jisu diang aleini, “Pumi, nang nalungdou e-inchu keihi namindam mator nate!”
Jisu'n akut duongnga ama kha aleikatook, “Kei'n kazoot,” “Damtaro!” khawapha takkhan takbang ri'n amathaanjei.
Jisu'n amadiang chongpena aleinei, “Tudiang tipimaro, takkha nang in si inlang thiampu ngaidiang juoinmuro; khale inruoiya nang mindamna jarra Moses chongpeii dungjuiya mipui diang sakhi enasik doiphur juoinchangro.”
Takkha Jisu jarra chongkha kheella rilthiangna inlainei, halli mipui'n amadiang chong karangaisik khat-um kana ngaikha indamnasik amadiang inheiwa.
Takkha Jisu'n mi lengmakna mun ngaikhan aleisiya Pathian aleini.
Nisuo khatni Jisu'n aleiminchu phakhan, Galilee, Judea khat-um Jerusalem khuopui makheiya kaheiwa Pharisee li juina Dan karu ngai'n akoolla inlei in-ong, halli Pumi ranak mindam matornakha Jisu diang aleiom.
Pasal lekkhat in apangkathi miring inkhat azaalnale inruoiya inheichoi, halli inmani'n mindamnasik beiya insuungtiang keiluutnasik khat-um Jisu koolla danasik ah inleitho.
Mipui katamtak in ajar eya leiluutpui matormu, inmani'n innchungnga inkaalla innchung inminwengnga ama zaalna khale inruoiya mipui karra Jisu maikuungnga injuomachum.
Jisu'n inmani ngamna aleimupha khan ama'n ati, “Suopui, Nang namanu ngaikha kanangai dampijei.”
Dan karu ngaili Pharisee ngai'n inmalung suungnga inngaidonna inleiti, “Pathian karilsehi tume? Pathian eleiya, tu innum manu ngaidam matormu!”
Jisu'n inmani i-ngaidonkha aleijet phakhan inmani diang aleitipi, “Angjarra hiwa ngaihi ning malungnga ning ngaidonme?
‘Nang namanu ngaikha kana ngaidamjei,’ emakli ‘Inthei inlang sitaro’ tihi hume kabei?
Nangni'n jetningte miring Sapa in manmasituolla manu ngaidamnasik ranak anei” Ama'n apang kathipa diang ati, “Kei'n nang nadiang kanati, inthei inlang nazaalna choi inlang na inntiang kirtaro.”
Khawa phakhan pasalpa khan inmani maikuungnga intheiya ama azaalna kha achoiya inntiang Pathian minpaak ah aleikirjei.
Inmani rakip in ngakna inleineiya Pathian inleiminpaak, halli kachi khan leisip ah inti, “Awini eini'n angtuk inlak chuonme nimujei!”
Hiwahi ahekli Jisu'n aleisuok ah rampar kakhom araming Levi kha ama chuon thona inna in-ongnga ileiomkha aleimu, Jisu'n amadiang atipi, “Kei najuiro.”
Angrakip ama'n amathaanna khat-um intheiya Jisu nuk ajuijei.
Halli Levi'n a-inna bubakna kalok inkhat Jisu sik-ah aleiminsuuk, khawakha rampar kakhoom khat-um aleiilaak mi katamtak inmani khale inlei-inong.
Pharisee li Dan karu lekkhat in asiamruoi ngaidiang inleitipi. “Ang jarrame nangni'n rampar kakhoom li manu karoon ngaile bak-in suomna ningnei?”
Jisu'n inmani diang leimasang, “Kanamak ngaidiang kathiam arei ommak, takkha kana ngaisik achu areiom.
Kei'n Pathian kajetngai kakoi kijuo emak, takkha manukaroon ngai malung minthuulnasik kijuo eii.”
Inmani'n Jisu diang inleiti, “Ang jarrame John siamruoi ngai'n apha rakip bu ingeiya Pathian inni, halli Pharisee siamruoi ngai um khawa angnga inleitho; takkha nang nasiamruoi ngaichu inbak in-in.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Moipa kha inmanile omsuom laikhan moikaruoi kajuo mi ngaikha bu minngei niyabe?
Takkha moipa kha inmani diangnga inphut laruoidel nasik nikhuo kha alajuosik eii, khawapha khan inmani'n bu inngeisik eii.”
Jisu'n hiwa chong minkhina aleitipi: “Tuteii in puonkathar lek inkhat puonmaruo ah kathuidelmu, khawakha natho inchu akathar lek kha kamaruo le inhoinuni.
Tuteii in theibomju kathar kha jutuong maruo khan damu, khawakha ningtho inchu theibomju kathar in jutuong maruo kha minkoita aminmangsik eii.
Takkha theibomju kathar khachu akatha jutuongnga nidasik eii!
halli inkhat innum theibomju maruo innli thabomju kathar kha inzootnunu, ajarchu ama'n ati, theibomju maruo hi athadoom.”
Sabbath nikhuoni Jisu'n gehubil laiya rakaanna aleisi, halli ama siamruoi ngai'n gehulor ngaikha inmani'n inchinna inkut ah inkanurra inleibak.
Pharisee lekkhat in inleitipi, “Sabbath nikhuoni thosik ka-emak chuonkha angsia nithome?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Nangni'n lasermak chube, David in awon chaampili ama inruoipui ngaile inthokha angme?
Ama'n angtho thoa Pathian inna aluutli Thiampu eleiya tuteii innum bakkachamak Pathian diang inpeii waipool kha aleiya abak halli ama inruoipui mi ngaidiang um aleipeii.”
Jisu'n inmanidiang aleitipi, “Miring sapa hi Sabbath Pumi kha um eii.”
Sabbath nikhatni Jisu'n synagogue ah aleisiya minchuna aleinei, Pasal inkhat akut changtiang kathi inkhat aleiom.
Sabbath nikhuoni Jisu'n mi mindambe tia Dan karu li Pharisee lekkhat in ama kha injuichak ah noonkuung penasik ah ajar inleientok.
Takkha Jisu'n inmani rakip ngaidonna kha aleijetpi, halli akut kathi pasal padiang aleitipi, “Inthei inlang matiang juongirro.” Pasalpa'n intheiya khawakhan ajuongir.
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleitipi, “Kei'n nangnidiang kanarakel: Sabbath nikhuoni Dan in izoot thokacha kha katha khabe emakli kase khabe? tichu ringkhuo sansik emakli ringkhuo minmang sikbe?”
Ama'n amit en minloonna inmani diang ahei enna; pasal padiang ati “Nakutkha heisoonro.” Ama'n aheisoon, halli ama kutkha aleidam nookjei.
Inmani'n inraangtheiya Jisu chungnga angme nithomatorsik tia khatli khatdiang inlei inbiak.
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n amuoltiang aleikalla Pathian kani aleisi, halli zaansoot Pathian diang aleini.
Khuokha ajuowarra, ama siamruoi ngaikha akoichunna inmani karra soomleini kadangnga inmanikha Tirton tia raming aleiphuo:
Simon (amahi Peter tia inkoi) halli ama anai Andrew; James, John, Philip khat-um Bartholomew,
Matthew li Thomas, James Alphaeus sapa, Simon Zealot tia inkoi,
Judas, James sapa, halli Judas Iscariot Jisu kajuorpa eii.
Jisu'n chingmuol makheiya atirton ngaile ajuochumma inzoolna munna asiamruoi angjetle injuongir. Halli mipui katamtak Judea ramsuung khat-um Jerusalem makheiya khat-um Tyre li Sidon tuipuikham makheiya;
Jisu koolla karangaisik khat-um inmani kana rakip mindamnasik ah inheiwa. Khale inruoiya ratha kathamak ngai'n minpoongna kaneingai um inheiwa ah inleidam.
Mipui'n ama kha katooknasik inleitho, halli ama ranak khan aheisuok ah mi rakip damna inleinei.
Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang ahei enna aleiti, “Sara ngaikha rawaan katha in-eii, ajarchu Pathian Rengram kha nangnita eii!”
“Tuunna won kachaam nangni ngaikha rawaan katha ning eii ajarchu; nangnikha nawai minkhopsik eii.” “Tuunna Kachap nangni kha rawaan katha ning eii ajarchu; ningla innuisik eii!”
“Miring sapa jarra mirakip in namatir, nazootmak, narilthai, halli nangkha kathamak na eii kanati nangni kha rawaan khatha ning ejei!”
Rokru khawa phakhan, rok in laamru, ajarchu nang nachuon thomankha marwaan ramma alok, khawakha angnga inmani pile pu ngaikhannum Pathian chong kachoi ngaidiang inleitho.
“Takkha angtuk poongna khame inchong nangnidiang, nangni'n hoina ningmusuojei!”
“Tuunna won kasipngai nangni kha angtuk chikaome ajarchu; nangni'n inwai ningta kachaam in lasipsik eii! Tuunna ka-innui ngai nangnidiang angtuk chikaomme ajarchu; nangni'n in-ngui ningta ninglachapsik eii!”
“Mi rakip in innaminpaak nangnikha Poongna kha eii; ajarchu inpi inpu ngai innum kadikmak Pathian chong kachoi ngaidiang hiwa angnga inleitho.”
“Takkha kei kadiang kanarangai nangnidiang kei'n kanati, ning inhalpui ngaikha minriangru, kana enzootmak mi diang kathakha thoru,
nang nadiang khumak kanasaam ngaikha rawaan pero, halli nang nadiang kase kanatho ngaisik Pathian diang nipiro.
Mi ngai'n na-ngeem inkhattiang inkabeel inchu inkhattiang um doupi nookro; nang napuonsin kha mi inkhat in nakasut inchu nasongkol kha um pedelro.
Nang nadiang kanani mi rakipdiang pero, halli nang naneinaak kaleikha nikirkhai maro.
Nang in mi ngaidiang ni minthozoot angnga nang innum mi ngaidiang thoro.”
“Nang kanaminriang mi ngaikhabit naminriang inle, angtho thoa rawaan mutinname? manukaroon ngai innum inmani kamiriang ngaikha inminriang!
Halli nang in nang nadiang katha katho ngaidiangbit katha natho inchu, angtho thoa rawaan mutinname? manu karoon ngai innum khawachu intho!
Khat-um nang in kanape matorsik ngaidiangbit sial naminwei inle, angmo nemna mutinna? Manu karoon ngai um manu karoon ngaidiang sial inminwei, in-ang rip ah munooknasik-ah.
Ning inhalpui ngaidiang mingriangru khat-um akatha kha thoru; minweiru halli nachangnook sik eii tia ngaidon khaimaru, Nang nathoman kha kalok ah nachangsik, halli nang in insaangkhet Pathian sangai na-esik eii, Ajarchu ama'n minriang kajetmak khat-um manukaroon ngaidiang aminriang.
Nipa Pathian hi minriang kajet angnga minriang kajet eru.
“Mi ngaidiang chong tanmaru, halli nangnidiang um Pathian in chong natannuni, mi ngai rilsemaru, halli Pathian innum nang narilsenuni, ngaidamru, nangkha um Pathian in nangaidam sik eii.
Mi ngaidiang pero, halli Pathian innum nangdiang napete. Katha minteiichu, namdeen inlang, kanik inlang khat-um minliamthaak inlang pero, halli nang iminteii angnga Pathian innum minteiita najuo penooksik eii.”
Jisu'n inmani diang hiwachong minkhinahi aleiti: Mit kacho inkhat in mit kacho inkhat lam keitheiniabe? akei inchu, inmani innikha khurra tamaknuwabe?
Inchu mi rakip in ama karu neek ah kalok ommu, takkhat inchu mi rakip in kathatak ah inchusuo inchu inmani kha inkaru in-angsik eii.
“Namit ah kaom thinglek kha mulekleiya, angjarra na-u nanai mit ah kaom madir kha nimume?
Angtho thoa na-u nanai ngaidiang natisime, namit ah madir kha nakhaipi kate, tichu nang in namit ah thinglek kha mulekleiya? Nang mi katha omchanna inleem mi! mansakhet ah namit ah thinglek kha khaimasaro, kha e-inchu nang na-u nanai mit ah kaom madir kha inthiangnga munate.”
Thingkuung katha'n akara kathamak karanuni khat-um thingkuung kathamak in akara katha karanuni.
Thingkuung rakip akara khan nijetmator; ralingbil makheiya theichang kara khiaknunu, halli ralingkuung makheiya theibom kara khiaknunu.
Akatha mi'n amalung suungnga akatha abuk ah idakhan akatha omchan aheikeisuo, halli akathamak mi'n amalung suungnga kathamak abuk ah idakhan akathamak omchan aheikeisuo.
“Ang jarra ‘Pumi, Pumi,’ tia ningnakoime, halli kei iti khachu thomakchu?
Halli atu ka-ang in kei kadiang heiwali kachong rakip karangai khat-um kajui amakha keihi nangdiang angkachang mi eme tikha kanaminmusik eii.
Ama kha khur inthuuk akhuorra lungpui chungnga inn kasak miring inkhatle in-ang eii. Halli tuikha ajuolianna inn kha ajuoshuk ah inn kha katuul matormak, ajarchu inn kha katha ah asak jarra eii.
Takkha atu ka-ang in kachongchu karangai kajuichu kajuimak mi khachu, inn ngirna boolleiya neipil chungnga inn kasak ka-ang eii, halli tui ajuolianna inn kha woikhat ajuosuk phakhan inn kha aleichiam darjei!”
Jisu'n mipui rakipdiang chong aleirilsuo phakhan, ama'n Capernaum tiang aleiluut.
Halli Rome raalmi kalokpa'n iminriangkhet suok inkhat aleiom; khawa mipa kha ana-ah thisik aleitho,
Roman kalokpa'n Jisu jarra aleijet phakhan, Jisu kha heiwa inlang suokpa kha juomindam nasik-ah, Jihudi upa lekkhatdiang juotipinasik aleitir.
Inmani'n Jisu koolla inheiwa ah katha tak-ah inleiti, “Hiwa mi'n nang sannakha inthiangnga amanuom.
Ama'n keini mi ngai aminriang khat-um ama'n keinisik-ah synagogue anasakpi.”
Khale inruoiya Jisu'n inmanile aleisi, ama'n inn makkheiya inlaakjen phakhan, raalmi kalokpa'n ama asapngai aleitirra ajuominti, “Pumi natheinuo ah poongna inneimaro, nang in kei ka-inna heiwasik hi rahoi kasuok emong,
halli kei um nang nakoolla kaheiwasik rahoi kasuok emong, khawa jarra Chongnga natipiro halli kei kasuokpa kha adamsik eii.
Ajarchu kei um ranak kanei nuoiya kaom ka eii, halli kei kanuoiya raalmi angjet inom, Kei'n chongpena kanei, ‘Siru!’ katili insi; halli aleiilaak diang, ‘Heiwaru!’ katili inheiwa; halli kei'n kasuok ngaidiang, ‘Hiwahi thoru!’ katili intho.”
Jisu'n hiwa ajet phakhan amadiang ngakna aleinei; halli Jisu'n inlet-ah ama nukkajui mipuidiang aleitipi, “Kei'n nangnidiang kanati, hiwa ka-ang ingamna kalok hi kei'n Israel ngai kara-um lamumong!”
Halli i-tir mi ngaikha inntiang inleikirra, inmani'n ama suokpa kha adamma ileiom kha injuomu.
Khawa suoli Jisu'n Nain inti khopuikhan aleisi, halli asiamruoi khat-um mipui katamtak amale inleisi.
Khuopui luutna kotkuung aleinai phakhan, mikathi inkhat reii-nasik ah inheisuokpui, akathi mikha chuulmei sapa inkhatbit kha alei eii, halli mipui katamtak in khawa khuopui makheiya numeisanule inleisuok.
Pumi'n khawaneinu amu phakhan, Ama malungnga khawa nainusik-ah poongna aleinei, halli ama'n aleiti, “Chap maro,”
halli ama'n asiya u-pukha ajuo katookli akathipa karapuut ngaikha inleingir, halli Jisu'n ati, “Kadoong pasal! Kei'n kanati, intheiro!”
Halli akathi miringpakha ahong intheiya chongkaril aleiphut, halli Jisu'n naipang pakha anudiang aleipeii.
Inmani rakipkha kachi'n leisip ah Pathian inleiminpaak ah inti, “Eini karra Pathian chongkachoi kalian inkhat inlarjei!” Halli inmani'n inti, “Pathian in ama mi ngai kasansik ajuojei.”
Khawa ramsuung khat-um innaipui khuopuisuung rakip ah Jisu jarra inleirilthang.
Halli John siamruoi ngai'n angrakip kasuok ngaikha amadiang inleirilpi phakhan, ama'n inmani inni kha aleikoi,
halli John in asiamruo inni kha Pumi diang hintho inlang juorakelru tia aleiminsi, “Nanghi John in ileiti akalajuosik ama kha na-ebe? emakli keini'n miring inkhat kinla-en sikbe?”
Halli Inmani'n Jisu koolla inleitung phakhan inleitipi, “John Baptist in keinihi hintho inlang juorakelru tia nang nadiang naheitir eii, nanghi kalajuosik mi kha na-ebe, emakli keini'n aleiilaak inkhat kinla-en sikbe?”
Khawapha takkhan Jisu'n kana angjet, rirai kathamak, khat-um ratha kathamak angjet aleimindam, halli mitkacho angjet-um aleiminmu.
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Mitkacho khan muna innei, kasitheimak in insithei, takbangri karoonngai amindam, kuorkaseet in injet, kathi kha aminring, halli chongkahoi kha sara ngaidiang arilpi tia nangni'n ningmuli ning ijet ngaihi si inlang John diang juotipiru.
Kei jarra inngamsammak mi ngaikha rawaan katha in-eii!”
John siamruoi ngai'n inleisisuoli, Jisu'n mipuidiang John jarra chongkaril aleiphut: “Nangni'n ang mukate tia neelramma ningsime? thikaraang in leihar ikatuul ka-en ningsibe?
Ang ka-enme ningni'n ningsuok ah ningsi? puondiar katha inluk ah kaom mi ka-en ningsibe? Enru, enzoot kaom puondiar inluk mi khachu reng inna nimusik eii.
Angme ningsiya ningjuo en? Pathian chongkachoipa khabe? kei'n nangnidiang kanati, takkha nangni'n ningjuomu kha Pathian chong kachoipa neek-ah kakheel eii.
Ajarchu John hi eii chong inthiang in ileitikha. ‘Pathian in ati, kei'n nang nalam kaboolsik katirton kha nang matiang kajuotirsik eii.’
Khat-um Kei'n nangnidiang kanati,” “Tuteii innum John neek-ah kalok kaleiring laommu. Takkha Pathian Rengramma kasiinkhet kha John neek-ah alokwiai.”
Khawajarra miring rakip in Jisu diang inlei rangai, khat-um aru ka-eya rampar kakhoomngai innum John diang makheiya baptized inthoa Pathian kha kadik eii tia inzoot.
Takkha Pharisee ngaili dankaru ngai inchu Pathian lungdou kha inmanisik-ah leizootmu halli John in baptized inthosik kha-um leizootmu.
Halli Jisui'n aleitinook, “Atuunlaiya mi ngaidiang kei'n angle kaminkhi sikme? halli angme inmani imanuom?
Inmani ngaihi phaiya naipang in-ongnga khatli inkhat diang inkheek ah hin intia kaom ka-ang eii, ‘Keini'n inmanisik moiruoina dar kinminringpi phakhan, inmani'n laamnunu! keini'n mithina laa kinsakpi phakhan inmani'n chapnunu.’
Han John Baptist ajuolai bu a-ngei halli ju inmak halli nangni'n ningti, ‘Amadiang raikhuo om!’
Pathian sapa kha abak a-inna aleijuo phakhan, ‘Enru, Ama hi! mahaam kalian khat-um jubuolrai eii, halli rampar kakhoom ngaili manukaroon ngai sappui eii tia nangni'n ningti!’
Pathian singna theinakha, ama kangamna mi rakip in kadik eii tia inleiminmu.”
Halli Pharisee inkhat in Jisu kha amale bubaknasik aleikoi, halli Jisu'n ama inna aleisiya bubaknasik ah alei in-ong.
Halli khawa khuopui suungkhan manu karoon numeisa inkhat aleiom, Khawa numeisanu khan Jisu kha Pharisee ngai inna bu bak-ah om tihi inleijet phakhan, ama'n alabaster kok kasip arim kahoi sariak aheichoi,
halli Jisu kekuungnga aleingirra achap ah akeiikha amit rathi'n aleiminthupi, halli asamma akeiikha aleinuulpi, akeiikha aleimazoop, halli sariakrim kahoikha aleikanootpi.
Pharisee pa'n aleimu phakhan atheinuo ah alei in-ngaidon, “Hiwa miringpa hi inthiangnga Pathian chong kachoi e-inchu, ama'n ajetsik suok atume khat-um angkachang numeisame ama kakatook hi, ajarchu amahi manu karoon mi eii!”
Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Simon, Kei'n nang nadiang angkemekhat kanatisik aom.” “Ama'n leimasang, angme Karu?”
Halli Jisu'n kamindik aleiphut, “Sepupa diang sialkapuuk miring inni inleiom,” “Miring inkhat in dangkaru rajara-nga aleipuuk halli miring inkhat pa'n dangka soomra-nga aleipuuk.
Han Inmani inni'n leithuul matormujei, khale inruoiya ama'n inmani inni kha ngaidampi jei, atu khame ama'n iminriangdoom?”
Simon in amasang, “Kei'n kangaidon” “Katamma intuol mipa diang. Halli Jisu'n aleiti,” “Nang in kadik ah nanamasang jei.”
Jisu'n numeisanu diang enna Simon diang aleitinook, “Hiwa numeisanu hi namubo? Kei'n nang na-inna kajuoluut phakhan kakeii rasunasik nang in tui napemakche, takkha enro hiwa numeisanu inchu amit rathiya kakeii minthu halli asamma nanuulpi.
Nang in namazoop inlang nadon makche, takkha kei kaheiluut ah inphut hiwa numeisanu inchu kakeii kamazoop ladamak.
Nang in kei kalu khan sariak nakanoot pimakche, takkha hiwa numeisanu inchu sariakrim kahoihi kakeiiya nakanootpi.
Kei'n kanati, ama manu katamtak kha ngaidampina kaneijei, ajarchu ama minriang nakha alok; halli tu ka-ang ngaidamna lekteii kamu khan lekteii minriang.”
Khale inruoiya Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleitipi, “Nang namanu ngaikha kana-ngaidam pijei.”
Khawa khamtuolla in-ongnga kaom leiilaak mi ngai'n inmani karra inkel, “Tume hiwahi, manu ngai kha-um ka-ngaidam?”
Takkha Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleitipi, “Nang ngamna khan ringna naminmujei; kadaiya sitaro.”
Khawahekli Jisu'n khuopui rakip khat-um khuo ah asiya Pathian Rengram jarra chongkahoi aleiril, halli siamruoi soomleini ngai kha-um amale inleisi.
Halli ama'n numeisa lekkhat-um kathamak ratha khat-um rirai kana ngai makheiya imindampi inmani ngaikha amale inleisi, Mary (Magdalene tia inkoi) ratha kathamak sari ipuutsuokpi numeisanu kha-um Jisu le aleisi.
Chuza numei Joanna Herod inna chuon kaensui kalei eii, khat-um Susanna le katamtak aleiilaak numeisa ngai'n inmani neinaakngai inliingna-ah Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngaikha sanna inleinei.
Khuopui khatli khuopui khat makheiya mipui angjet inheisuok-ah Jisu koolla inlei-inchun halli Ama'n hiwa minkhinahi aleirilpi:
“Aru kaworpa'n asuok ah arukawor aleisi; halli ama'n aleiwor phakhan, lekkhat in lamma inleichulla mi ngaikhan inleitouwa halli wa ngai'n inleiruutjei.
Lekkhat in lungbuk ah inchulla inhongmongnga innottheiya incharjei, ajarchu neipil kha leinommak.
Aru lekkhat in ralingbilla inchulla, ralingkhale inhongmoong suomma raling in adiipthatjei.
Aleiilaak aru'n akatha neipilla inchulla inhongmoongnga inwor makheiya tum rajakhat inliak inleikara” Jisu'n ahekna ah aleiril, “Rangairu kuor kanei rakip!”
Ama siamruoi ngai'n Jisu diang inleirakel hiwa minkhinahi ang tiname,
halli Jisu'n aleimasang, “Pathian Rengram jarra inthup chongkha nangnidiang innaminjet kha eii, takkha aleiilaak ngaidiangchu minkhina-ah aminmusik, khawajarra inmani ngai'n in-enpumma mununu, halli inrangai pumma jetnunu.”
Hiwahi minkhina aratha kha eii: arukha Pathian chongkha eii.
Lamma kachul aru tinachu Pathian chong chu karangai, takkha inmani ngaikha ngamna khat-um ringna minmumaknasik seitan aheiwa ah inmani malungnga inphut Pathian chongkha akeisuopi.
Lungkarra akachul aru ngai tinachu Pathian chong injetli karok ah kakeiluut, halli inmani'n malung inthuuk-ah kakeiluutmak in eii, inmani ngamna kha aphakhat sikbit eii, halli matheemna heiwa phakhan purna innei.
Raling karra kachul aru tinachu, inmani ngaikha chongchu karangai, takkha malungkadong, kaneikanung halli ringkhuo hoinakhan inmanikha aminmang halli inmani kara kha minmatormak.
Nuoipil hoina ah kachul aru ngai tinachu, Pathian chong inrangaili katha khat-um chongkajui malungnga inda ah inra maklaiseng kadei mi ngaikha in eii.
Tuteii in sariakmei kawar kha kok nuoiya makhu inlang damakmi, khat-um zaalmun nuoiya damakmi, takkha meiserkeii khan nida inchu mipui kaheiwa rakip in awarkha muinte.
“Ang rakip ruukchuon ngaikha la-inlarsik, khat-um chonginthup ngai rakipkha inlajetsik.”
“Khawajarra nangni'n angtho thoa ningjetme, iringtheiru, ajarchu tu ka-ang kanei amadiang kheella apesik, takkha tu ka-ang kaneimak amadiang lekteii kanei tia i-ngaidon kha-um inleidelsik eii.”
Jisu anuli anai ngaikha Jisu diang inheiwa, takkha inmani'n mipuikhan ajar eya Jisu le lei-inmu matormu.
Tu ka-ang khat in Jisu diang inleitipi, “Nang nanuli nanai ngai'n tuolla inngirra nang kana inmupuisik-ah inom.”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Kei kanuli kanai ngai khachu Pathian chong karangaili kajuingai kha in eii.”
Jisu'n nisuokhat ama siamruoi ngaile rakuongnga inleiluut ah inmani diang aleiti, “Eini'n hiwa tuidiilpang khattiang rakaan inlang sirui.” Halli inmani'n kasi inleiphut.
Inmani'n rakuong inleisep phakhan, Jisu kha aleizaaljei, jetlei theileiya thikaraang kangar inkhat khawa tuidiil khan alei-inthei halli rakuong kha tui ahongluut ah inmani rakipkha poongna inleinei.
Ama siamruoi ngai'n Jisu koolla insiya Jisu kha inlei keitheiya inleiti, “Karu, Karu! keini kathisik kin-ejei!” Jisu'n intheiya thiraang li tuithisiip diangkhan chong aleipei halli thiraang li tuithisiip kha ajuodaijei.
Halli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleitipi, “Hume nangni ngamna kha?” Takkha inmani'n ngaknale china inleinei, halli inmani khatli khat inlei-inkel, “Amahi tume? Thiraang li tuithisiip innnum ama chongpe injui!”
Khat-um inmani'n Galilee tuidiil raalkhattiang kaom Gerasene ramkha inleituung.
Jisu'n khawa tuidiilpang aleitung phakhan, ama'n khawa khuopui makheiya raikhuo kaluut pasal inkhat alei intongpui, apha kasoot tak-ah puondiar inlukmak khat-um inna kaommakjei, thaantaang reiya kaom mi alei eii.
Jisu kha aleimuli akheek ah ahongchap halli Jisu kekuungnga inbok ah rasa inringnga aleiti, “Jisu, Insaangkhet Pathian sapa! Angme nang in kei kadiang nimanuom? kei'n kanani, narachaak maro!”
Jisu'n mipa makheiya heisuok nasik raikhuo diang chong aleipeii, apha angjet ah ama kha surna anei, khat-um ama kha mikhumna khan inleida, ama kutli akeii thirruiya inleikhit takkha ama'n kapotchat ah raikhuo in ramrouk tiang aleiruoi.
Jisu'n amadiang aleirakel, “Naraming angme inti?” “Kei karaming chu ‘Katam,’ ” tia aleimasang, ajarchu ama takchungnga raikhuo angjet inleiom jarra eii.
Raikhuo ngai'n Jisu diang inleimatheem poongna meikhur khan keinihi naminsimaro.
Khawa chingpang khan wok rahooi inleiom, khawa raikhuo ngaikhan wokngai suungnga luutnasik ah Jisu diang inleini halli ama'n aleizootpi,
Pasalpa makheiya insuok ah wok ngaidiang inleiluutjei halli wok rakip kha insuknatiang sumplingkhang inthoa tuidiilla inlei inraakthatjei.
Khawa wok kakhaal mi ngai'n kasuok rakip inmuli intaanna insiya, kasuok omchan ngaikha khuopui khat-um khuosir khuopangnga kaom mipuidiang inleirilpi.
Mipui'n angme kasuok tia kaen inleisi, halli Jisu koolla inheitung phakhan, raikhuo kaluut pasalpa kha Jisu kekuungnga in-ong kha inleimu, ama'n puondiar katha ilei-inluk le inruoiya herweengnga ileiom injuomu phakhan, inmani rakip in china inleinei.
Akamu rakip in angtho thoa raikhuo kaluut ama kha idamme tikha mipuidiang inleirilpi.
Khale inruoiya khawa ramma kaom mipui ngai'n Jisu kha sitro inleitipi, ajarchu inmani'n khatuk china inleinei, khale inruoiya Jisu'n rakuong achuongnga khawa munkha aleimathaan.
Raikhuo ipuut suokpi pasalpa'n Jisu diang aleini, “Kei um nangle sikate.” Takkha Jisu'n hin tipiya aleiminsi,
“Nang in na-inntiang kir-inlang, Pathian in nang nadiang itho chounkha juorilpiro.” Pasalpa khan khuopui suungnga aluut ah, Jisu'n ama diangnga itho rakip aleirilthang.
Jisu'n tuidiil raalkhattiang aleikir phakhan mipui'n inleingaak chak ah ama kha karok ah donna inleinei.
Synagogue karoon, Jairus intia inkoi miring inkhat aheiwa ah, ama'n Jisu kekuungnga inbok ah a-inna sirui tia biakna aleinei.
Ajarchu kum soomleini ka-ejei asanu inkhatbit kha thisik leithojei. Jisu'n aleisi phakhan mipui'n inlei-uum.
Inmani karra numeisa kum soomleini thikasar inkhat aleiom; ama'n inei rakip keisuoa kathiam ngaidiang in-en innum tuteii innum ama kha leimindam matormu.
Khawa numeisanu khan nuuktiang makheiya Jisu nuk ah aheiwa ah apuonmor aleikatook halli khawapha takkhan athikasar kha aleidamjei.
Jisu'n aleirakel, “Tume kei kanakatook?” Mipui'n leizootmu, halli Peter in aheiti, “Karu, mipui'n nang nakoolla na-uumma inom.”
Takkha Jisu'n aleiti, Kei'n kajet miring inkhat anakatook, ajarchu kei karana kkha kei diang makheiya isuok kajet.
Khawa numeisanu khan anajetjei tia amupha khan ama'n intuul pumma aheiwa ah Jisu kekuungnga ajuo inbok, khawa munkhan mi rakip maikuungnga ama'n Jisu diang angsik-ah ama kha ikatookme, han, ang omchanna innnoottheiya idamme tikha aleiril.
Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleitipi, “Kasanu, nang ngamna khan nadamjei, kadaiya sitaro.”
Jisu'n hiwa chong arillaitak, waikaroonpa inn makheiya taangwa inkhat aheiwa, ama'n Jairus diang ati, “Nasanu kha athijet” “Karu kha minpoong khaimaro.”
Takkha Jisu'n hiwahi ajetli Jairus diang aheiti, “Nang in chimaro; ngamnabit ngamnaro, halli ama kha adamsik eii.”
Jisu'n inn atung phakhan, Peter, John, Jame, halli naipangnu nuli pa eleiya tuteii amale kaluut sik leizootpimak.
Khanna kaom mi rakip in numeisanu sikbeiya chapnali poongna inleinei, takkha Jisu'n aleiti, “Chapmaru, naipang nuhi kathi emak kalazaal keeng!”
Numeisanu kha kathi eii tia injet jarra inmani rakip in Jisu kha innuipuina inleinei.
Ama'n naipangnu kha akut ah mahuumma aleiti, “Naipangnu intheitaro!”
Halli khawapha takkhan ama'n ahongringnga hong intheijei, halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, bakphur inkhat peru.
Halli anule apa'n ngakna inleinei, takkha Jisu'n inmani diang akasuok hi tuteii diang rilpimaknasik chong aleitipi.
Jisu'n siamruoi soomleini ngaikha akoichunna kathamak raikhuo puutsook nasik khat-um kanangai rakip mindam matorna ranak khat-um thomatorna aleipeii.
Khale inruoiya ama'n Pathian Rengram rilthangnasik khat-um kana mindamnasik aleiminsi.
Halli inmani diang atipi, “Nangni'n ningsi phakhan iteii choimaru, kherol, khouchou, baksik, sial, songkool inliak kha-um choimaru.
Khawa khuopui ningmathaan maklaiseng nangni innadonna innkhan omru.
Hun enum mi ngai'n nangnikha innadonmakna khuopui kha mathaanru, halli inmani diang chongmakhaina ningleida angnga ningkeiiya kaom rahutkha kathingthaak inlang leidaru.”
Inmani'n khuosuung rakip inluut ah Pathian chong kahoi inrillarra khat-um mikana ngai kha-um amun rakip-ah inmindampi.
Galilee karoonpa Herod in angrakip kasuok choun ngaihi ajet phakhan ama malungkha inhaangna aleinei, ajarchu mipui lekhat in John Baptist kha ahongring nookjei tia inleiril.
Mi lekkhat in inti Elijah eii nimunook jeihi, halli mipui lekkhat in inti tiallaiya Pathian chongkachoingai karra inkhat eii hongkaring nookjeihi.
Herod in aleiti, Kei'n John ariing kitan ejei, tuunna kei'n kijetnook amahi tume? halli ama'n Jisu kha munasik-ah alei entok.
Tirton ngaikha inheikirra, inmani chountho rakip Jisu diang inleirilpi, halli Ama'n inmani kha aleiruoiya Bethsaida inti khuopuitiang inleisi.
Mipui'n inleijet phakhan ama nuk inleijui, khat-um Ama'n inmani kha aleidonna inmani diang Pathian Rengram chongkha aleirilpi, khat-um kadamzoot ngaikha inleimindam.
Kani ahongta phakhan siamruoi soomleini ngai'n inheiwa ah amadiang inleiril, “Hiwa munhi ramchik ejarra khuosir khuopangnga sisu-inlang baksik insik khat-um riakna zaalna injuo entok nasik mi ngaihi minsitaro.”
Takkha Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni'n inmani baksik peru.” Inmani'n inleimasang, “Keini'n waipool ra-ngali nga inni kinnei, Nang in hiwa mipui ngaisik-ah baksak juorachasik namanuombe?”
(Khawa khan Pasal lising ra-nga inleiom.) Jisu'n ama siamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Mipui rakip kha buk khat ah mi soomra-nga soomra-nga daam heimin ongru.”
Ama siamruoi ngai'n khawakha inthosuoli,
Jisu'n waipool ra-ngali nga inni aleiya marwaan tiang enna Pathian iminpaak le inruoiya akather khoiya ama siamruoi ngaidiang sempinasik aleipeii.
Inmani rakip in inbak ah inleikhopjei, halli asiamruoi ngai'n inbakbang kaliam kok soomleini inleikhoomchun.
Jisu'n atheinuo ah Pathian aleini phakhan asiamruoi ngaikha amadiang inheiwa, halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleirakel mipui'n keihi tu-eii innatime?
“Mi lekkhat in innati nanghi John Baptist na eii,” inmani'n inleimasang. “Leiilaak in nanghi Elijah innati, khat-um mi lekkhat in innati tiallaiya Pathain chongkachoi ngai inkhat kahong kirnook ejei innati.”
Inmani diang aleirakel, “Nangni inle keihi tu-eii ningnatime?” Peter in aleimasang, “Nanghi Pathian Messiah na eii.”
Khawasuoa Jisu'n inmani diang hiwahi tudiang rilpimaknasik chongkacheet aleipeii.
Ama innum inmandiang hin aleitipi, “Miring sapa kha poongna angjet aneisik khat-um katar ngai, thiampu kalian ngai halli Dan karu ngai'n zootnunu khat-um ama kha thina inpesik eii, takkha nithum huuini ahongring nooksik eii.”
Halli inmani rakipdiang aleitipi, “Tu ka-ang in keile kasi amanuom inchu, ama'n apumkha inzoot marase, cross kha nisuorakip kadomrase halli kei kha najuirase.
Ajarchu atu ka-ang in aringkhuo kaminringzoot mi khan amangsik eii, takkha tu ka-ang in kei kasikbeiya aringkhuo kaminmang mi khan ringna aneisik eii.
Mi inkhat in nuoipilchung pumpui amata min e-innum ama ringkhuo kha aminmang inchu angme anemna kaom?
Nangni ngai'n kei kasikli kachongsik-ah ning injak inchu, miring sapa innum ama apoina khat-um Apa Pathian li tirton ngai poina kha achoiya ajuonikhan nangnidiang injaksik eii.
Kei'n inthiangnga kanati, hiwahin mi lekkhat Pathian Rengram inmumak laiseng kathimaksik inom.”
Hiwa chongngai rakip atipina niriat athengli, Jisu'n Peter, John, khat-um James aruoiya chingmuoltiang Pathian kani inleisi.
Jisu'n Pathian aleini phakhan ama meelsuo kha ahong inthuul, halli ama puondiar kachek in nalei-eel.
Jetlei theileiya, miring inni kha amale chong inleiril, inmani kha Moses li Elijah inlei eii.
Inmani'n marwaan poina khan injuo inlarra Jisu'n Jerusalemma ang omchanna thisikme tijarra Pathian chuon minsuok sikkha innottheiya huui mintungnasik chong jarra inlei inbiak.
Peter li ama sappui ngai'n inzaalbirra inleiom, takkha inmani'n inhong inthei phakhan Jisu apoinale miring inni amale inngir suomma inleiom kha inleimu.
Khawa mi inni ngai'n Jisu kha inleimathaan siktiang, Peter in Jisu diang aleiti, “Karu, eini'n hin niomhi angtuk kathame! eini'n maichaam inn inthum, sakrui, nangsik inkhat, Moses sik inkhat, halli Elijah sik inkhat.” (Peter in angme itikha ama innum leijet matormak.)
Ama'n chong aleiril phakhan, suumphai khan aheiwa ah inmani ngai rakipkha aleimakhu; halli suumphai khan aleimakhu phakhan siamruoi ngai'n inleichi.
Suumphai bukkhan rasa inkhat in aheiti, “Hiwahi kei ikadang kasapa eii, nangni'n ama iril chongkha rangairu!”
Rasa khan aleirilsuoli Jisu kha atheinuo ah aleiom, halli khawa phakhan asiamruoi ngai'n inmu rakip ngaikha tudiang rillekleiya inleiomchian.
Ziingkhuo warli Jisule asiamruoi inthum ngai'n chingmuol makheiya injuochum phakhan, Mipui'n Jisu kha inlei inmupui.
Mipui karra pasal inkhat in ahongkheek, “Karu! Kei'n nangdiang kanani kasapa inkhatbit hi na-enpiro!
Enro, ratha kathamak in amakha asurra jetlei theileiya akheek halli akeichang khangnga aleideengjuon halli inkei-orra amurra amachilphuonbit lei eii, halli angjet aleiminpoong kachak-ah asuokzoot makpumma aleisuok kachak.
Kei'n nang siamruoi ngaidiang puutsuok nasik ah kaleini, takkha inmani'n leimatormu.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Angtuk ngamna kasuolli kathamak mi ning eme! nangnile angtuk soot kalaom sikme? angtuk kasoot nangnile kanaladeipui sikme?” khawasuoli khawa mipadiang atipi “Nang nasapa kha hin heiruoiro.”
Neipangpa'n heiwa phakhan raikhuo khan ama kha nuoipilla juomapura inkei-orra omjei, halli Jisu'n ratha kathamak diang chong aleipeii, halli naipang pakha amindamma apadiang aleipeii.
Pathian ranak kalokkha mipui rakip in ngakna inleinei. Takkha Mi rakip in Jisu itho rakip ah ngakna inleinei phakhan, asiamruoi ngaidiang aleitipi,
“Angme kei'n nangnidiang kanarilpisik hi manilmaru! Miring Sapahi ranak kanei manmasi kutchungnga inpesik eii.”
(Takkha asiamruoi ngai'n hiwahi angtiname tihi leijetmu, hiwahi inmani'n injet mator maknasik inthup chongkha alei eii, hiwajarra inmani'n amadiang karakelsik um inleichi.)
Khawa phakhan atume kalokkhet tia siamruoi karra muruolsiak inleitho.
Jisu'n inmani i-ngaidon kha aleijet, khale inruoiya ama koolla kaom naipang inkhat aheiruoiya akoolla aleiminngir,
halli inmani diang aleti, “Tu e-innum hiwa naipang pahi kei karamingnga ningkeiluut inchu, keikha ningna keiluut ejei, halli atu ka-ang in kei ningna keiluut inchu kei kanajuotirpa kha-um ningkeiluut ejei, hanna nangni karra kasiinkhet mi kha kalokkhet esik eii.”
John in aleimasang, “Karu, keini'n miring inkhat nang naramingnga raikhuo ipuutsook kinmu, halli ama kha eini karra inchelmak jarra ama kha kinkhaap.”
“Takkha Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, nangni'n ama kha khaapmaru,” “Tichu nangni kana inhalpuimak mi kha nangni mi eii.”
Jisu kha marwaan tiang kalnasik aheinai phakhan, ama'n Jerusalem tiang sinasik aleingaidonna kasi aleiphut.
Halli ama taangwa ngaikha ama neek ah ma minsa-ah aleiminsi, inmani'n ama sikbeiya angrakip insuuksik-ah Samaria khuo khan inleisi.
Takkha Jisu kha Jerusalem tiang kasisik ejarra mipui'n ama kha leidonzootmu.
Asiamruoi James li John in hiwa injetpha khan, Inmani'n inti, “Pumi, marwaanna inphut keini'n mei koithak ah inmani minmangsik hi nang in namanoumbe?”
Jisu'n inlet ah inmani kha ranna aleinei.
Khalle inruoiya Jisu li asiamruoi ngaikha aleiilaak khuotiang inleisi.
Inmani'n lamma inleisi phakhan, mi inkhat in Jisu diang aleiti, “Kei-um nang nasina rakip ah nanuk kanajuisik eii.”
Jisu'n amadiang aheimasang, “Ram-ui ngaichu inkhur om, wa ngai-um inrabu innei, takkha miring sapa chu alu danasik um amun ommak.”
Jisu'n miring inkhatpa diang ati, “Kanuk najuiro.” Takkha ama'n aheiti, “Karu, kei'n mansakhet ah kirkata kapa juophuumdirong.”
Jisu'n aheimasang, “Akathi ngai'n akathi ngaikha leiphuumrasu, takkha nangchu si-inlang Pathian Rengram chongkha juorilthangro.”
Miring inkhat innum ati, Karu; “Kei um nang kanajuisik eii, takkha mansakhet ah kei insuungkhur mi ngaidiang chong juomathaan masadirong.”
Jisu'n amadiang atipi, “Atu ka-ang in akut ah laangkuol mahuumli anuktiang enna leikakhuoi miring kha Pathian Rengram sik-ah rahoi emak.”
Hiwahi hekli Pumi'n miring soomsari leini aleikadangnga halli ama amatiang miring inni inniya ama sinasik khuopui rakip ah aleitir.
Jisu'n inmani diang aleitipi, “Leirakhool sikchu atam, takkha karakhoolsik michu lekteii in eii, leimapupa diang niru leikarakhoolsik mi angjet ajuo minjuonasik.
Siru! Kei'n nangni ngaihi malang karra keelngamtei angnga kinatir eii.
Nangni'n sialkhou, bunina khou khat-um kekok choimaru; halli lamma ning intongpui mi ngaikha rakooknasik ngirmaru.
Hun enum nangni'n ningluutna inna mansakhet ah ‘Inn khan Kadai omrase tiru.’
Khawa khan kadai kamanuom mi om-inchu, Nang diangnga kadaikha ama takchungnga omsik, kha emak inchu, ning ipeii kadai kha keikirnookru.
Inmani'n naperei kha bak inlang innkhan omro, tichu chuon kathopa'n athoman amusik hi rahoi suok, innkhat makheiya innkhat ah leeng-inlang ommaru.
Nangni'n khuopui ningluutpha khan, inmani'n innaleidon inchu ningmaikuungnga innaperei kha bakru.
Khawa khuopuiya mi kana ngaikha mindampiru, halli inmani diang tipiru Pathian Rengram kha ajuonaijei.
Takkha ang ka-ang ningsina khuopuiya inmani'n innaleidonmak inchu, inmani lampui ngaikhan si-inlang tipiru,
Tichu ning khuopui makheiya ningkeiiya kakop rahuut kikathingthaak hi nangni kinzootmakna eii, halli nangni'n ngaidonru Pathian Rengram kha nangnidiang ajuonaijei.
Kei'n nangnidiang kanati, hiwa khuopuihi Sodom poongna khaneek ah hiwahin poongna omsik eii!
“Angtuk poongna esikme Chorazin nangdiang! angtuk poongna esikme Bethsaida nangdiang um! nangni diangnga intho chuon inlak kha Tyre li Sidon diang inleitho inchu, buorasongkol kahak inta, khat-um inkilrahut inthekthuon inta inmani'n manu makheiya inmalung kha apha matiang leithuuljei inte.
Pathian chongtan Nikhuoni khan nangni neek ah Tyre li Sidon diang aminriang nakha omsik eii.
Capernaum! Nanghi, marwaan katung na-indomsaang zootbe? etheinuni, nangchu meikhur khan nadeengluutsik eii!”
Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang ati, tu-ennum ningchong karangai mikha kei kachong karangai kha in-eii; tu-ennum nangni kanazootmak ngaikha, kei kanazootmak in-eii; halli tu-ennum kei kanazootmak mi kha, kei kana juotirpa ama kha um izootmak kha eii.
Mi soomsari leini ngaikha ratha karok ah inheikirjei, inmani'n inleiti, “Pumi,” “Nang naramingnga chongpena kinnei phakhan raikhuo ngai innum kinchong injui!”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Kei'n marwaan makheiya seitan kha kool-inlek angnga ijuota kaleimu.
Rangairu! kei'n maruul khat-um ailuweetngai chungnga simatornasik halli ningnile ning inhalpui ratha kanei rakip daimatornasik ranak kanapejei, han iteii in nangnikha nakatooknuni.”
Takkha nangni'n ratha kathamak ngai'n ningchong injuijarra rokmaru, khawa neek ah marwaanna ningraming injia jarra rokru.
Khawa phakhan Jisu kha Ratha Inthiang in aleisip jarra arok ah aleiti, marwaan le nuoipil Pumi E-Kapa! nangkha kei'n kanaminpaak ajarchu kasing kathei ngai'n injetmak khat-um inmu matormak kha, i-kajetmak diang namalarpijei. Oh, Kapa, hiwahi nang inmanuom li nalungduotak kasuok ejei.
Kapa'n angrakip kei kadiang napejei, halli asapa hi tume tikha apa elekleiya tuteii in jetmu, emakli atu khame apa tihi-um asapa eleiya tuteii in jetmu, khawa jarra asapa'n ikadang mi ngaidiang ama kha amalarsik eii.
Khale inruoiya Jisu'n inlet ah asiamruoi ngaidiang ruuk-ah aleitipi, “ Ningmit in musik ka eii phur rakip ningmu kha rawaan katha ning eii!
Khawajarra nangnidiang kanati, Pathian chong kachoi ngaili rengngai innum, nangni imu rakipkha inmuzoot, takkha inmani'n mumatormu, halli nangni irangai kha inrangaizoot, takkha rangai phangnunu.”
Dan kathei ocha inkhat in aheiwa-ah Jisu'n angme namasang tia, ama'n chong rakelna aleinei, “Karu” “Hektik kaboi ringkhuo munasik ah kei'n angme kathosik?”
Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Chong inthiang in angme iti? nangni'n angtho thoa ningmaletme?”
Halli ama'n aleimasang, “ ‘Pumi na Pathian kha namalung pumpuiya naminriangsik, khat-um na ratha pumpuiya, naranak pumpuiya, halli na-ngaidonna rakip ah ama kha naminriangsik’ halli ‘Indiang inwai ngaikha napum ni inriang angnga naminriangsik eii.’ ”
Jisu'n aheimasang “Nang in kadik ah natijei,” “Hiwahi thoro halli ringna namusik eii.”
Takkha Dan kathei ocha in atheinuomma kadik ezoot jarra Jisu diang aheirakel, “Tu khame kei indiang inwaipui?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Miring inkhat Jerusalem makheiya Jericho tiang aleichumma aleisi, halli inruup ngai'n ama kha puondiar inliikpiya wuokna inleinei khat-um inwuokthat dengnga inleida.
Jetlei theileija thiampu inkhat in khawa lamkhan ajuochum, halli khawa miring pakha alei intongpui, takkha alooiya aleisi.
Khawa angnga Levite inkhat um khawakhan aheiwa ah miring pakha aleimu, ama innum alooiya aleisi.
Takkha Samaritan miring inkhat in khawa lamkhan aheiwa ah miring pakha aleimu phakhan, ama malungkhan minriang in aleisip.
Amadiang asiya kapop rakipkha sariak li theibomtui abunpiya khuopina anei, halli ama salungdai chungnga minchongnga khomal tungna innkhat ah aleiruoiya ama kha sepa thona aleinei.
Ziingkhuo warli khawa inn kangaak padiang dangkapum inni ama diang aleipe. Halli inn kangaak padiang aleiti. ‘Ama kha sepa leithoro,’ woikhat kahei kirnookli, ‘Kei'n ama diangnga niminluut rakip kanapesik eii.’ ”
“Hi ngai inthum karra tukhame nang in inruup ngai'n inleiwuok ah inleidapa diang indiang inwaipui eii tia ningaidon?”
Dan kathei ocha in aleimasang, “Ama diang katha tak-ah sepa katho mipa kha eii.” Jisu'n aheimasang, “Nang in si-inlang hiwa angnga juothotaro.”
Jisu li asiamruoi ngai'n lamma inleisi phakhan ama'n khou aleiluut, araming Martha inti numeisanu'n Jisu kha a-inna aleidon.
Khawa numeisanu nainu inkhat aleiom araming mary inleiti, ama'n Pumi kenuoiya in-ongnga Pumi minchuna kha aleirangai.
Takkha Martha'n ama chounthosik khan malungsena aleinei, ama'n aheiwa ah Jisu diang aleiti, “Pumi, nang in jetmakchebe kei kanainu'n katheinuobit chuon inaminthohi? Amadiang kei najuosan nasik tipiro!”
Pumi'n ama diang aleimasang, “Martha, Martha! Nang in ang rakip sik-ah namalung namindongnga naom,
takkha inkhatbit khakeeng arei kaom, Mary in akadik kha ikadang ejei, halli amadiang makheiya woikhat leikir nunujei.”
Nisuokhat Jisu'n amun inkhat ah Pathian aleini phakhan, khawa aminhek suoli asiamruoi inkhat in amadiang aleiti, “John in asiamruoi ngaidiang iminchu angnga, Pumi, Pathian kani naminchuro.”
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Nangni'n ningni phakhan hintiru: ‘Kapa: naraming inthiangkha kayarasu narengram kha juotungrase.
Nisuo rakip ah kinbaksik napero.
Kin manu rakip nangaidampiro, keini innum keinidiang kathamak kanatho ngai kinngaidam angnga, intheemna khan naminchulmaro takkha kathamak ah inphut nasanro.’ ”
Halli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aheiti, “Nangni karra tu ka-ang inkhat in suopui inkhat omtia ngaidonrui, han ama'n zaanchimma asiya amadiang ajuoti, ‘Suopui waipool inthumdam leipuuk kate.
Tichu kei kasappui inkhat khuol-injil eya ka-inna ahongtungnga omjei, halli kei'n ama kha iteii minbaksik neimong!’
Halli ama'n insuungnga inphut aheimasang, kahoimak nathokhai maro, kei'n kot kha-um kakharjei, halli kei kasa ngaile zaalmunna kinomjei, kei'n intheili phurkhat napesik hi matorkhai nuningjei.
Kei'n kanati, nanghi kasappuipa na-eii tia ama'n intheiya iteii nape matormak innum, nang in injak omleiya naninook naninook inchu ama'n intheita nang diang arei kaom rakip anapesik eii.
Khawa jarra, kei'n nangnidiang kanati, Niro, halli nangnidiang anapesik, ratokru, nangni'n muningte, khat-um rakhoongru, nangnidiang namalongpite.
Tichu, Akani rakip in muinte, kaentok inmani in muinte, halli karakhoong rakipdiang malongpite.
Nangni karra tu ka-ang asapa'n apa diang nga anili maruul peniabe?
Emakli ama'n artui anili, apa'n ailuweet peniabe?
Nangni kathamak mi ning e-innum, ningsa ngaidiangchu kutchoi katha angjet pesik ningjet inle, marwaanna kaom ningpa Pathian in angtuk kheella, kaniya kaom nangni ngaidiang Ratha inthiang napemak niame!”
Jisu'n raikhuo kaluut chongkaril theimak khat aleiputsuokpi; raikhuo kha aleisuok phakhan chongkaril theimak mipa kha chongkaril aleiphut, halli mipui'n ngakna inleinei.
Takkha mi lekkhat in inti “Raikhuo ngai karra kachingpa Beelzebul ama'n raikhuo puutsuok matornasik ama diang ranak ipekha eii.”
Mi lekkhat in Jisu diang surnasik-ah ensuina inleinei, khawa jarra inman'n amahi Pathian izoot inkhat eii tia jetnasik-ah choun inlak thonasik inleini.
Takkha Jisu'n inmani i-ngaidon kha aleijetle inruoiya ama'n aleimasang, “Rengram inkhat in insuungnga inthenkhoina inneiya khatli khat raal intho inchu kasoot ah omnunijei, halli inmani karra inthenkhoi insuungkhur kha akoidarsik eii.”
Seitan rengram suungnga inthenkhoiya khatli khat raal intho inchu khawa rengram kha angtho thoa angir matorsikme? nangni'n ningti kei'n raikhuo kipuutsuok hi Beelzebul itho eii ningti.
Kei'n Beelzebul ranak ah raikhuo ipuutsuok ningnate inle, angtho thoa nangni nukkajui ngai'n inmani kha inpuutsuokme? Khawa jarra inmani ngai'n nangni chungnga chongkatan ngaikha in esik eii.
Pathian ranak ah kei'n raikhuo ngaihi kipuutsuok e-inchu, Pathian Rengram kha nangnidiang ijuo ejei.
“Mi kangar inkhat in, aomna innkhan chemli thalle inruoiya angaak inchu ama neinaak ngaikha mangtheinuni.
Takkha mi kangar inkhat aheiwali ama kha insuol puiya amatorjei, halli ama'n inn kangaak pa'n inn ngaak theinasik ah ida chemli thal ngai achoidella halli inei rakip achoidelsik eii.”
“Keile kaommak mikha kei kanazootmak mi eii; keile inruoimak mi kha inchekchaisik eii.
“Ratha kathamak inkhat in mi inkhat diangnga inphut asuok phakhan, ama'n asi ahongnga poong machumnasik-ah ahuulnamun aleientok, ama'n amumak phakhan atheinuoa inti, ‘Kei'n kaheisuokna innkhan kirnook takte.’
Woikhat ama'n aheikirpha khan innkha inthiang hiaiya khat-um intiam week ah ileiomkha ajuomu.
Halli ama'n ratha kathamak sari inliak ama neek ah kathamak heiruoi nook ah khawakhan injuo-om, halli khawa khan inmani'n inleiluut ah inleiom, halli ahekna khanchu mipa omchan kha matiangnga neek ah ahongse detjei.”
Hiwahi Jisu'n aleiti phakhan, “Numeisa inkhat in mipui kar makheiya ahongkheek ah amadiang ahongti, nang kanawon numeisa khat-um kanawailok ama kha rawaan katha eii!”
Takkha Jisu'n aheimasang, “Khawa neek ah, Pathian chong karangaili kajui ngaikhan angtuk ah rawaan katha in-eme!”
Mipui katamtak in Jisu kha inhei-uum phakhan ama'n masonna chong ajuoril nook, “Hiwa khangnga mi ngaihi kathamak khang in-eii, inmani'n inlak chuon inentok, takkha Jonah diangnga inlakchuon aleiya etei inkhat um penunijei.
Tichu Jonah in Nineveh mi rakipdiang choun inlak ajuo inchang, khawa angnga Miring sapa innum hiwa khang sik-ah jetna inkhat esik eii.
Chongtan Nikhuoni Simtiangnga rengnu'n hongngirta tuunna pha miring ngai chungnga rilsena aneisik eii, tichu hiwa rengnu khan aramtak makheiya Solomon singna chongminchu kha karangai aleihong, enru, Solomon neek ah kalian inkhat hin aomjeii.
Chongtan Nikhoni Nineveh ah kaom miring rakip in inthei inta hiwa khangnga mi ngaikha minsena inneisik eii, ajarchu inmani kha Jonah chongril inrangai phakhan inmalung inthuul halli enru, Jonah neek ah kalian miring inkhat hin omjei.
“Tuteii in sariakmei kha minkaili kok suungnga danuni; takkha akaheiluut mi ngai'n warkha inmunasik sariakmei kha meiserkeii chungnga inda.
Nang namit kha nataksa war eii, namit kha adam inchu, nataksa pumpui war in asipsik eii; takkha namit kha thamak inchu napum raja aziingsik eii.
Khawa jarra, nangni war kha ziingmak nasik inringtheiru,
Nang napum saram rakip kawar in asip inchu nang nadiang kaziing omnunijei, han sariakmei khan awar phakhan nangdiang na-eelwar angnga nang napum rakip awarsik ejei.”
Jisu'n chong aleirilsuoli, Pharisee pa'n amale bubak nasik aleikoi, halli ama'n asiya bubak nasik ah alei in-ong.
Jisu'n bubak ma-ah kut leirasumak jarra Pharisee pa'n ngakna aleinei.
Khale inruoiya Pumi'n ama diang aleitipi, “Atuunchu, Pharisee nangni'n putiangnga ningrabing li ningbukheeng ngai ningminthiang, takkha nangni malung suungnga chu kathamak li mikathazoot in asip.
Ka-am nangni! jetmak chube, Pathian in tuoltiang abool halli suungtiang kha-um ibool ema abe?
Takkha nangni'n ning bukheeng li ning rabiingnga kaom ngaikha sara ngaidiang peru, halli angrakip nangni sinadan dungjuiya inthiang kha ejei.”
“Nangni Pharisee ngai angtuk chi kaomme! ninglei makheiya kamoong phurrakip, thikaraanglei (mint) rue, ngaikha tum soomma tumkhat ningpeii, takkha Pathian kadik khat-um minriang ngaikha ningmathaanjei, hiwa ngai rakip hi nangni'n mi ngaidiang manil lekleiya chuonna ningthosik eii.”
“Nangni Pharisee ngai angtuk chikaomme! nangni'n Synagogues in-ong na mun kahoi kakadang ningmanuom, halli phai suungnga khoya kaomma naleikoi kha ningmanuom.
Angtuk poong kaomme nangnidiang! nangnihi musik kaommak thaankha ning eii, halli mi gai'n jetmuwa khawa thaan chungnga insiya inom.”
Dan kathei ocha inkhat in Jisu diang aheiti, “Karu, hiwa natinachu, nang in keinidiang ninarilse eii!”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Chongkatan karu ngaidiang um poongna kha omrase! nangni'n mi ngai chungnga inroon matormaksik phurrik kha ningpeii, takkha nang inchu khawa phurrik roonpuinasik nakutmor kha-um heisoonmakche.
Poongna kha omrase nangnidiang! ajarchu nangni'n ningpa ngai'n inleithat Pathian chong kachoingai thaankha ningboolla ning om.
Nangni'n ningpa ngai inleitho chuonkhan ning inpesuok ah sakhi ning inchangjei; inmani'n Pathian chong kachoi ngaikha inthat, halli nangni'n thaan ngaikha ningboolla ning omjei.
Hiwa jarra Pathian singna theina khan ati, Kei'n Pathian chong kachoi khat-um Pathian tirton ngaikha kajuotirsik eii; Inmani'n lekkhat inthatsik eii khat-um inrachaaksik eii.
Khawa jarra manmasituol inbool makheiya inphut Pathian chongkachoi ngai thisen kasar kha atuunna khang ngai'n poongna kha ningmusik eii.
Kei'n nangnidiang kanati, Abel thisen makheiya Zechariah thisen katung khat-um maichaam inn makheiya Inthiang namun katung koongkarra kathi ngaikha atuunna khang mi ngai'n poongna inneisik eii! ”
“Angtuk poongna khame Dan karu ngaidiang! ajarchu nangni'n singna theina sou kha ningleijei, halli nangni inchu khawakhan luutmak chujei, halli nangni'n akaluut mi ngaidiang isuina ning ejei!”
Khawa mun kha Jisu'n alei mathaanna aleisili, Dan karu ngaili Pharisee ngai'n Jisu kha setheiya inleirilthai, halli amadiang chong angjet rakelna inleinei.
Ama surtheinasik ah chong kase rilbe tia inngaak chak ah inleiom.
Mipui lising angjet intuothatsik inthoa inlei-intuup, halli Jisu'n mansakhet ah asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Katha inleem Pharisee ngai chol makheiya inngaaktheiru.
Inkhu-ah kaleiom kha inlongsik eii khat-um ruukchong rakip inlajetsik eii.
Khawajarra angrakip aziingna muna ningril kha awarna ah inlajetsik eii, khale inruoiya insuungnga ning inbiakchian kha innchung makheiya inlaril thangsik eii.
“Kasapngai, kei'n nangnidiang kanati, taksa kathat mi ngaikha chimaru, khawasuoli inmani'n iteii nathomatorsik ommak.
Takkha atu khame nangni'n ningchisik kei'n namindik kate, kei'n nangnidiang kanati, Pathian kha eii nichisik, anathat suoli woikhat meikhurra kanadeengluut mator ranak kanei Pathian kha chiru!”
“Wacharek ra-nga kha dangkapum innisik-ah jormak chuwabe? takkha Pathian inchu wacharek inkhat kha-um manilmak.
Ningluwa kaom ningsam ramol rakip khaum anateelpi, khawa jarra chimaru; nangni ngaihi wacharek katamtak neek ah aman katam ning eii!”
“Kei'n nangni diang kanati, mipui maikuungnga kei kami kin eii intia inrilsuok inchu, Miring sapa innum Pathian tirtonngai maikuungnga anarilsuok pisik eii.
Takkha atu ka-ang in keihi mipui maikuungnga ningnazootmak inchu, Pathian innum tirtonngai maikuungnga nazootpinuni.”
“Atu ka-ang in Miring sapa zootmakna chong aril inchu ngaidamna apesik eii; takkha atu ka-ang in Ratha inthiang diang kathamak ah karilse khachu ngaidamna omnuni.”
“Nangkha inmani'n synagogue li choun karool ngai, halli ranak kanei ngai koolla innaruoi phakhan, nang in angtho thoa kamasang sikme khat-um karilsikme tia malung dongna neimaru.
Khawa phakhan Ratha inthiang in nangdiang angme narilsikkha naminchute.”
Mipui kara mi inkhat in Jisu diang aheiti, “Karu, kei ka-u diang Kapa inleida neinaak rakip insemnasik natipiro.”
Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Suopui, nangni inni kara neinaak nasempinasik atu'n kei kadiang khawa inzootna chongtannasik anapeyame?”
Halli ama'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni rakip mahaam kalian makheiya in-entheiru khat-um insingtheiru; tichu miring ringkho hi neinaak kaneihut in arei emak.”
Khale inruoiya Jisu'n hiwa minkhinahi aleirilpi: “Inchong inkhat saanglebaal katamtak kaminsuok ram inkhat aleinei.
Ama'n atheinuoa aleingaidon, angme kei'n kathosik? ‘Kei saanglebaan ngai reiinasik amun neimongjei,
khawa jarra sasiar thiatkata’ halli ‘Sasiar kalok inkhat sakkata kasaangli kaneinaak rakip hiwahin kadasik eii tia ama'n hiwahi thonasik-ah atheinuoa alei inngaidong.
Khale inruoiya rawaan katha mi! ka intisik tia atheinuoa alei inngaidon, nang in kum angjetsik-ah arei ka eii neinaak katha ngaikha nabuk ah nadajei, ringkhuo hi kahoithei ejei, kabak, ka-in thoinlang natheinuoa hoitaro!’
Takkha Pathian in amadiang ati, ‘Aka-am nang! Awini zaan makheiya nang naringkhuo kha aheksikjei; halli natheinuo sik-ah nabuk ah nida karei rakip ngaikha atu'n leiniame?’ ”
Halli Jisu'n hinthoa minhek, “Atu ka-ang in neinaak rakip atheinuo sik-ah abuk ah ada-innum Pathian diang chu inchongna emak.”
Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aheiti, “Hiwa jarra kei'n nangnidiang kanati, ningbaksik, niringnasik, khat-um taksa sik-ah areikaom puondiar sik-ah ningmalung mindongmaru.
Ringkhuo hi baksik neek ah arei kaom eii, khat-um taksa hi puondiar neek ah arei kaom eii.
Wa-ak ngaidiang enru: inmani'n aru kha lingmu khat-um khoomma damu; inmani'n buknasik inn khat-um sasiar damu; Pathian in inmani kha awairing! nangni ngaihi wa ngai neek ah aman katam ning eii!
Ningmalung ningmindoongli atu'n ning ringkhuo kha ningminseidet matorme?
Nang in akasiin chounkhat sik ah iteii ningtho matormak inchu, angjarra aleiilaak sik-ah malung ning mindoogme?
Ngaidonru angtho thoa ramreibet in imoongme, inmani'n choun um thomu emakli puondiar um boolmu: takkha kei'n kanati Solomon rengpa'n ama inchong puondiar atho innum hiwa reibet inkhat katha angnga thamatormak.
Pathian in hiwa leiya chinthouhi aminmong, Takkha awini kamong chinthuohi ziingngachu mei-oot nasik-ah inhaalsik eii, nangni ngamna kasiin ngai! ama'n nangni kha kheella puondiar napemak niabe?”
“Nangni'n angme ningbak ning-in sik tia ningmalung minsemaru.
(Manmasituolla zaatlop ngai'n apha rakip ah hiwasik-ah ratokna innei.) Hiwa ngaihi nangnasik arei om tia napa Pathian in ajet.
Hineek achu Pathian Rengram kha ratokru, halli hiwa rakip ngaihi nangnidiang anapesik eii.
“Nangni keelngam rahooi kadoong ngai, china neimaru, tichu Nipa'n Rengram napenasik-ah aratha arok.
Nangni'n ningnei neinaak rakip jour inlang sara ngaidiang peru, nangni'n kamaruo maksik sialkhou kha choiru, halli Marwaanna inchuongna kha mintuupru khawa khan inkei omnuni, ajarchu inruup luuttheinuni, khat-um inngeii innum minmang matornunujei.
Nangni karei omna rakip ah, ningmalung khaum aomsik eii.
“Puondiar inluk inlang khat-um sariakmei minkai inlang angrakip indeipuisik-ah insuukchak inlang omru.
Suok inkhat akaru kha moiruoina makheiya heikirli ama'n innkhar kha woikhat aheirakhoong li heirakhoongmak kamalongpi sik-ah kangaak ka-ang ngaikha in eii.
Kei'n inthiangnga kanati, inringchak ah akaru kaheiwa ngaak ah kaom suok ngaikha angtuk rokna khame ama'n ajuomupha khan! ama'n asongkol inchuol kha liikta ama kha sepa inthosik-ah khamtuol khan juo in-ongsik eii.
Angtuk inroksikme Ama'n zaanchim khat-um khaneek ah inmoa aheiwa innum! inringchak ah kangaak ah kaomngai ajuomu phakhan.
Takkha hiwahi jetru: inn mapupa'n inruup heiwanasik apha ajet inchu angtiseng innkha mangnasik-ah a-inn mathannuni.
Khawajarra nangni innum inringchak inlang omru, ajarchu miring sapa kha ni-ngaidonmak phakhan ajuosik eii.”
Peter in ati, “Karu, Hiwa minkhinahi keinisik emakli mi rakip sik-ah nitibe?”
Pumi'n aheimasang, atu khame huoikajou khat-um akasing suok? ama kha karu'n a-inn kaensui sik khat-um aleiilaak suok rakip kha bu apha kacha-ah leiminbaknasik iminhuum suok khabe.
Ama karu'n aheikir phakhan angrakip katha tak ah aleithopi inchu, khawa suokpa kha angtuk rokna esikme.
Kei'n inthiangnga kanati, ama'n aneinaak rakip kaensui amin-esik eii.
Takkha soukpa'n atheinuoa i-ngaidon ama karu kha inmo ah aheiwosik eii tia numeisali pasal asuok ngaikha aleiwuok ah khat-um ju ka-inli kabak thoa inruiya leiomma,
ama karu kha a-ngaidon makna nikhuo khat-um ajetmakna phakhan aheiwasik halli ama kha abong abongnga tuktanta huoikajoumak tia aleisik eii.
“Khat-um suok in akaru lungdou kha angme tia kajet, takkha insuuk leiya kaom, emakli ama lungdou nuoiyabit kasi ama kha kasetheiya awuoksik eii.
Halli suok in ama karu imanuom kajetmak, takkha sungmol kabaksik kasuok chuon lekkhat katho ama kha lekkhat wuoksik eii. Katamma inpeii midiang katamma ani; katamdoomma inpeii ama diang katamdoomma ani.
“Kei'n nuoipil chunghi meiya kaminkaang kijuo eii, halli kei'n kaleikangjei kha kamanuom!
Kei'n Baptism ka-inthosik om, halli kei kadiang angtuk malungsename khawakha ahekmaklaiseng!
Kei'n nuoipil chungnga kadai kanapesik kijuo eii tia nangni'n ningngai donbe? emak, kei'n natipikate, kanakhoithen sik-ah kijuo eii.
