Kadikmak nunchan inchuol khat-um marwaan tirton ngai chubei katho tuteii inkhat innum nangni chungnga chongtansik rahoi min-ommarasu, khawa ka-ang mi khan inmu-ngai jarra kaseiya inril, takkha iteii arei omlekleiya khawa ka-ang mi khan inmani manmasi i-ngaidon lamma in-or
halli inmani ngaikha alu ka-eii Christa khale injommujei. Christa in taksa pumpui kha ru-zaang mindon khat-um minjom, halli taksa kha Pathian imanuom dungjuiya insoon.
Nangni'n Christa le hiwa manmasituol waikaroon ratha ngai diangnga inphut ningthijei keengnga, angjarra halle nangni'n hiwa manmasituol mi ning-angnga ninglaring titme? Angjarra khawa sinadan ngaikha ninglajuime,
“Mahuum khaimaru,” “Mintem khaimaru,” “Katook khaimaru”
Hiwa ngai rakip ni-inliingna-ah kamangsik eii, ajarchu hiwa rakip ngaihi manmasi chongpeii khat-um minchuna kha in-eii.
Khawa juisikdan ngaikha inlungdouwa inminsuuk chubei eii, akadikmak nunchan inchuol khat-um inpum kha intheinuo-ah karachaak lungsing lungwar eii; intaksa manuom insurna khan iteii innemna ommak.
Christa le inruoiya nangni naminringjei keengnga, chungtiangnga kaom phurngai kha ningmalungnga entokru, khawakhan Christa in Pathian kutchangtiang in-ong.
Chungtiangnga kaom phurngai sik-ah ningmalungnga ngaidonru, nuoipilchungnga kaom phurngai sik-ah ngaidonmaru.
Ajarchu nangni ningthijei, halli nangni ringkhuo kha Christa le Pathian diang om.
Nangni ringkhuo ka-eii, Christa juo-inlar phakhan, nangni um lurna lianna khan amale ning-inlarsik eii.
Zool-inthai, inthiangmak, taksa imanuom, akathamak nimanuom khat-um kara-ot, ramil chubei katho, nuoipilchung nunchan ka-eii rakip ngaikha nangni diang makheiya minthitaru.
Hiwa ngai jarra, Pathian raangna kha ama chongkajuimak mi ngaidiang ajuosik eii.
Inmani karra ningleiomlai, nangni um aphakhat achu khawa ringkhuo khan ningleiring.
Takkha tuunchu, akaraang, mikathatzoot, miringkhat thamaknasik ka-ngaidon, mi karilse khat-um murra inphut chongkathamak karil, hiwa rakip ngaihi mathaanru.
Akamaruo mikha anunchan le inruoiya nidajei keengnga, inkhatli inkhatdiang maleisei rilkhaimaru
halli akaboolpa aramil tak-ah singna theina dungjuiya mintharna akathar mi kha ning-inlukjei.
Khawa jarra, Greek li Jihudi, wun katan li katanmak, ka-am, kamo, suok li suok ka-emak ommakjei, takkha angrakip-ah Christa om, halli Christa kha angrakip eii.
Pathian inakadang inthiang khat-um inaminriang ning-eii jarra, inriang, minriang kajet, nunchan inchuol, malung kadai khat-um kadei karaat hiwa ngaihin ningpum ngaikha insuunru.
Inkhat li inkhat inzootnaru halli miringkhat chungnga miring inkhat in kahoimak angjet ngaikha in-ngaidamru. Pumi'n nangni ina-ngaidam angnga nangni innum in-ngaidamru.
Halli hiwa ngai rakip pui katungnga kakhuopchun inriang hi neiru.
Christa diangnga kahoi kadai khan ningmalung ngaikhan wai roonrase, pumkhatbit taksa ngai ning-eii jarra nangni hi kahoi kadai sik-ak inakoi kha ning-eii. Halli nangni'n rokru.
Nangni'n lungsing lungwar rakip-ah inkhatli inkhat inchu indikru, nangni minpaak laa, rokpuina laa khat-um ratha laa khan Pathian diang ningmalung karok-ah sakru, Christa chongkha nangni diang insam omlekleiya omrase.
Halli ning-itho rakip, chuonna emakli chongnga, angrakip kha ama diangnga inphut Pa Pathian kha minpaak inlang Pumi Jisu ramingnga thoru.
Pumi diang rahoi ka-eii angnga, inkaneijei numeisa ngai ningruothar ngai nuoiya omru.
Pakhat ngai, ningnumei ngai minriangru halli inmani chungnga kese-ah thomaru.
Sangai, ang rakip-ah ningnu ningpa chong juiru, ajarchu hiwahi Pumi imanuon kha eii.
Nu li pa ngai, ningsa ngai malung kahoimak suokmanasik inmani raangnasik chuon thomaru.
Suokngai, ningkaru ngai'n na-enphabit khat-um inmani'n naminriangnasik elekleiya; takkha Pumi ningchile inruoiya ningmalung kaluut-ah angrakip-ah nuoipilchungnga kaom ningkaru ngaikha juiru.
Ning-itho rakip-ah, mi sik-ah kitho emak Pumi sik-ah kitho eii ngaidon inlang, ningmalung pumpuiya thoru.
Pumi Christa kha eii sepa nitho. Ama mi ngai sik-ah idajei chuonthoman kha Pumi diangnga inphut ningmusik eii itihi ngaidonru.
Akadikmak akatho ama khan adikmakna kha amusik eii, ajarchu khawa khan mimeel mimai ensik ommak.
Karu ngai, katuunna khat-um katha-ah ningsuok ngaikha inliingnaru, ajarchu marwaanna nangni-um Karu om itihi ningjet.
Inchatlekleiya Pathian niru, Pathian minpaakle inruoiya inringchakru.
Halli kei'n mikhumna ah kaomna ajarchu, chongkahoi sik-ah Pathian in lam anamalongpi nasik halli Christa inthuukna kha keini'n kinril matornasik nangni'n Pathian nanipiru.
Kei'n karilsik kasuok kha inthiarra karil nasik-ah Pathian nanipiru.
Apha kacha ningmuna rakip-ah Pathian kajetmak mi ngaidiang ningomchan minsingtheiru.
Mi rakip diang akadik-ah ningmasang theinasik ah, ningchongrilna rakip-ah minhoitheiru khat-um ra-ngaizoot minomcheiru,
Minriang kaom nisap Tychicus, huoikajouwa chuonkatho khat-um einile Pumi suok ka-eii ama'n kei jarra angrakip kha nangnidiang narilpite.
Keini'n angtho thoa kinlaomme iti ningjetnasik khat-um ningmalung amasoknasik jarra kei'n nangnidiang ama kiheitir eii.
Nangni mi ka-ejei, huoikajou khat-um minriang kaom nisuopui Onesimus le inruoiya ama ajuosik eii. Inmani inni'n hiwa hinna akasuok rakip ngai jarra narilpijei inte.
Keile mikhumna ah kaomsuom Aristarchus in nangnidiang inpaakna chong najuominchoi, Barnabas tupa ka-eii Mark innum inpaakna chong najuominchoi. (Ama jarra nangni'n ningjetjei; ama'n nangnidiang ajuo inchu, ama kha leidonru.)
Justus tia-um inkoi Joshua innum inpaakna chong najuominchoi. Jihudi ngai karra inmani inthumbit in-eii Pathian kajet khat-um keile Pathian rengram sik-ah chuonkatho, inmani'n kei kadiang akalok ah sanna innanei.
Nangni mi ka-eii khat-um Christa Jisu suok-um ka-eii Epaphras in anaminpaak. Nangni'n Pathian lungdou khan kacheet-ah ningngirnasik, akachang khat-um kacheet-ah ka-ngamna ning enasik inchatlekleiya Pathian diang ananipi.
Kei'n ama jarra karilmator khachu amahi nangni sik khat-um Laodicea li Hierapolis ah kaom inmani sik-ah ranak-ah chuon atho.
Minriang kaom kathiam Luke khat-um Demas inmani inni innum inpaakna chong innajuominchoi.
Kei inpaakna chonghi Laodicea ah akaom ule nai ngaidiang, Nympha diang halli ama inn khan inchun koisuok ngaidiang peru.
Hiwa injia chonghi nangnidiang nateelpisuo thengnga Laodicea koisuok khannum inteel kha erase halli Laodicea makheiya nahongpeii injia chongkha nangni'n teelru.
Halli Archippus kha “Pumi sik-ah thosik inpeii chuon ngaikha huui mintungnasik” tipiru.
Hiwa minpaakna hi Paul kei kakut tak-in kimajia eii. Kei thirruiya innakhuop kha ngaidonru. Riangwai kha nangni chungnga omrase.
Paul le Silas khat-um Timothy in, Pa Pathian khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa ta ka-eii Thessalonia koisuok mi ngaidiang: Riangwai khat-um malungkadai kha ningta erase.
Keini'n Pathian kinnina rakip-ah nangni kinnangaidon, halli pha rakip ah nangni ngai rakipsik Pathian kinminpaak.
Ajarchu eini Pathian khat-um Nipa maikuungnga nangni inngamna kha chuonna ningtho, nangni minriangna khan chuon ranak-ah ningtho, halli Nipumi Jisu Christa diang ningngamna kacheet kha keini'n kinngaidon.
Ulenai ngai, nangni Pathian in naminriangnga ama sik-ah nangni inakadang kha keini'n kinjet.
Ajarchu keini'n nangnidiang Chong Kahoi kinheichoi kha, chongbit emak, takkha ranakle inruoiya Ratha Inthiang khat-um khawa akadik puikatung malungthuulna kha-um eii. Keini'n nangnile niom suomlai khan nangni thanasik, angtho thoa kin-omme tikha nangni'n ningjet.
Nangni'n Poongna akatamtak ningdei innum, Ratha Inthiangnga inphut roknachong akajuo kha ningmujei: nangni'n keini khat-um Pumi omchan kha ningjuijei.
Khawa jarra nangni'n Macedonia khat-um Achaia ah kaom akangamna rakipdiang minkhina inkhat kha ning-ejei.
Ajarchu nangni diangnga inphut ah Pumi jarra chong kha Macedonia le Achaia rampumpui inthangbit emak, takkha Pathian ningngamna jar kha-um amun rakip atungjei. Khawa jarra khawa kheella eini'n rilsik arei iteii ommakjei.
Nangnidiang kinhonglai ningnaleidon, halli akatuun le akaringchak Pathian sepa thonasik ah, kutbool pathian ngai ningmathaanna jar,
halli akajuosik Pathian lunghongna ah inphut nakasanpa, Pathian in kathiya inphut iminring Asapa Jisu kha marwaanna inphut akajuosik ningngaak kha mi rakip in inriljei.
Ulenai ngai, keini'n nangnidiang kinhong kha anemna kaboi emak tikha nangnitak in ningjet.
Thessalonica ah nangnidiang kinhongma Philippi ah kasetak le jakna kaomtak ah keini innatho kha nangni'n ningjet. Khawa khan naka-en zootmak khatuk intam innum, Pathian diangnga inphut Chong Kahoi nangni diangnga karilsik ah eini Pathian in malung ngarna analeipeii.
Ajarchu keini'n nangnidiang kinril chonghi akadikmak, emakli inthiangmak malungroonna, tu-inkhat diang um palaak kintho emak.
Khawa rathuulla, Pathian in keinidiang inamintho zootkha apha rakip ah keini'n kinril, ajarchu ama'n keini chong natansuoa Chong Kahoi karil sik-ah rahoikasuok anamin-ejei. Keini'n miring malung mintainasik ratokmung, takkha kinmalung ka-ensui Pathian malung tainasik kha kinril kha eii.
Keini'n minpaak inleem chongril le inruoiya, emakli phamraikase chong ngai kamakhu keini nangnidiang kinhong emak tihi nangni'n katha ah ningjet, Pathian in keini sakhi eii!
Nangni chungnga keini Christa tirton kin-ena ranak kinnei innum, tu-inkhat diangnga inphut, nangni diangnga inphut emakli aleiilak diangnga inphut innaminpaak nasik ratokmung,
keini'n Christa tirton ngai kin-eya nangnidiang chong kinnapemator takkha nu inkhat in asa ngai imarit angnga, keini'n ningkarra kinomlai khannum malung inniam kha kinlei eii.
Ajarchu nangni kinnaminriang jarra Pathian diangnga inphut Chong Kahoi khabit eleiya, keini ringkhuo hi-um napesik kin-insuuk eii, ajarchu nangni kha keini maritkhet ngaikha ninghong ejei.
Ulenai ngai, nangni'n keini angtho thoa chuon kintho halli poongna kindei kha inthiangnga leingaidon ningte! Keini'n Pathian Chong Kahoi kha nangnidiang kinrilpha nangni tu-inkhat um naminpoong maknasik ah suun li zaan chuon kinleitho.
Kangamna nangni ngaidiang keini omchan kha inthiang, atuun halli kachok ommak tihi nangni'n keini sakhi ning-eii, halli Pathian um eii.
Pa ngai'n insa ngaidiang omchan kathatak intho kha angnga keini'n nangni rakip diangnga omchan katha kintho kha nangni'n ningjet.
Anakakoipa Pathian ama rengram le alurna tum kha munasik ah, halli Pathian malung taina khawa ka-ang ringkhuo khan ningring nasik ah, keini'n nangni kinnamasok, kinnamatheemtai halli nathopiru tia nina kinnanei.
Hanna hiwa aleiilak jarra hin, keini'n apha rakip ah Pathian kha kinminpaak chak. Tichu keini'n Pathian chong kinheichoi hi nangni'n ningjet li chonghi miring ngai diangnga inphut emak takkha Pathian chongtak eii tia nangni'n ningleiralaang, khawakha akatuuntak kha eii. Akangamna nangni karra Pathian in chuon kha itho eii.
Ulenai ngai, Judea ah kaom Pathian koisuok ngaidiang, Christa Jisu mi ka-e ngai diangnga omchan kasuok khale in-ang rip-ah nangnidiang um akasuok eii. Tichu inmani'n Jihudi ngai diangnga inphut poongraalna inmu angnga, nangni um ningrammi ngaidiangnga inphut poongraalna in-angrip kha ningmu eii.
Pumi Jisu li ama chongkachoi ngai kaleithat Jihudi mi ngaikhan keini um innaminpoong. Inmani'n angtuk mi rakip kha inlei-inhalpuime! Pathian malungkha angtuk inleiminhoipi makme!
Zaatlop ngaidiang sanminringna heikachoi sik chong kinwarilsik kha-um inmani'n leizootmu. Inmani'n apha rakip ah intho manu ngaikha hin-inthoa pui-inmintungjei. Halli tuunchu ahekna ah Pathian raangna kha inchungnga ajuotungjei.
Ulenai ngai, keinisik achu, nangni diangnga inphut phabong khat ni-inthenpha, keini malungngaidon nachu ka-emak, takkha taksa bit-ah keini'n nangni kha angtuk kinnamu zootme halli woikhat namunasik angtuk ranak kinsongme!
Nangnidiang hongkir nooksik hi keini'n kinmanuom. Kei kapumtak in inlet inlet-ah hongsik kalei-insuuk, takkha Seitan in kinlam analeikhanjei.
Nipumi Jisu ajuopha ama maikuungnga, kinraal matorna jarra kin in-orna, kinrokna khat-um kin-inngamna kha nangni jarra eii, nangni hi aleiilak ngaineek ah akatasam emakchu.
Inthiangtak-ah, keini in-orna li roknachu nangni ning eii.
Ajarchu ajuohekna-ah, keini'n kasoot deimator khaimungnga, keini innibit Athenna omsik hi kinminthajei.
Halli Christa jarra Chong Kahoi kinrilla keinile Pathian sik-ah kinchuon thopui eini ulenai Timothy kha kinheitirjei. Ama hi nangni inngamna tiang kanaminngarsik khat-um anakasansik kinheitir eii,
Kha e-inchu hiwa poongraalna hin ajar eya nangni tuteii in nuktiang kirnutunjei. Hiwa ka-ang poongraal deisik hi einisik ah Pathian lungdou eii ti ningtheinuoa ningjet.
Keini'n phabong khat kinnaleiompui laikhan, eini innaminpoongsik eii tia apha matiang kinnaleirilpi kha, nangni'n kathatak-ah ningjet khawatak kha juokasuok ejei.
Khawa jarra kei'n kasoottak deimator khaimongnga, Timothy kha kei'n kaheitir ejei. Seitan in nangni kha naleimatheem jeite, halli nichuontho kha-um anemna kaboi esikbe tia kachi jarra kei'n nangni inngamna jetnasik ah ama hi kaheitirjei!
Tuunchu Timothy aheikirjei, nangni ning-inngamna li ning-inriangna jarra chongkahoi ngaikha keinidiang aheichoijei. keini'n nangni kinnamuzoot angnga nangni'n um keini naleimuzoot ningte apha rakip khan katha ah ningnangaidon tia keinidiang um ajuoriljei.
Khawa jarra ulenai ngai, keini poongna le raalna rakip khan nangni jarra kinmalungnga ratharokna kinnei. Kinratha roknahi ning-inngamna jarra eii.
Ajarchu nangni'n ningringkhuo ah Pumi le inchunna kacheet-ah ningngir jarra keini tuun inthiangnga kinlaring.
Khawa jarra tuunchu keini'n nangni jarra eini Pathian kha minpaak matorna kinneijei. Nangni jarra Pathian maikuungnga rokna kinnei jarra ama kinminpaak.
Keini'n nangni kha ningpumtak ah inmupui nasik khat-um angme nangni ngamna khan arei kaom rakip kinnape matornasik, suun li zaan amadiang kinmalung pumpuiya kinnichak-ah kinleiom.
Keini'n nangnidiang kinhongnasik lamkha, eini Pumi Jisu khat-um eini Pathian le Nipa amatak in naboolpi kha etarase.
Keini'n nangni kinnaminriang angnga, nangni khat li khat sik halli mi rakipsik ningminriangna kha kheel kheella insoonnasik Pumi'n inaboolpi erase.
Eini Pumi Jisu ami ngai rakiple inruoiya ajuopha, eini Pathian khat-um Nipa maikuungnga nangni inthiang le puikatung enasik hinthoa ama'n nangni naminngarsik eii.
Ajuohekna ah ulenai ngai, nangni'n keini diangnga inphut angtho-thoa Pathian malung kamintai ringkhuo ah ringnasik ah ning-inchu angnga. Adik, hiwahi, nangni'n hiwa ringkhuo lam hin ninglaring, tuunchu nangni'n Pumi Jisu ramingnga kheella thonasik ah keini'n nina khat-um masokna kinnanei.
Ajarchu Pumi Jisu ranak khan nangni kinnaminchuna ngaikha nangni'n ningjet.
Nangni inthiangsik khat-um zool-inthaiya inphut pum-inthiang inthiang sik hi Pathian imanuom kha eii.
Inkanei pasal nangni rakip in ningnumei le inthiang khat-um kaya kaomma karing ning-inchu sik eii,
Pathian kajetmak zaatlop ngai'n taksa imanuom lamma inring kha emaru.
Hiwa jarra, nangni tu inkhat innum Christian inkhat diang akatuunmak thomarasu emakli inmani chungnga nemna leimarasu. Khawa katho ngaikha Pumi'n arachaaksik eii tihi matiang khan keini'n kinleiriljei halli keini'n nangnidiang kanatak-ah chongpena kinaleineijei.
Pathian in eini omchan inthiangmak ah kaom sik-ah inakoi emak, takkha inthiang sik-ah inakoi eii.
Khawa jarra tu e-innum hiwa minchuna kajuimak mi khan miring minchuna ijuimak emak, takkha ama Ratha Inthiang nakapeii Pathian minchuna ijuimak eii.
Nangni inkhat li inkhat inriang nasik jarra majiasik arei ommakjei. Ajarchu nangni inkhat li inkhat angtho-thoa inriang sikme tihi nangni ningpumtak diang Pathian in anaminchu suojei.
Macedonia ah kangamna rakip diang nangni'n hika-ang inthiang omchan katha ningthojei. Khawa jarra ulenai ngai kakheel doomma omchan katha ningthosik hi kinamasok eii.
Matiangnga kinnaleirilpi angnga, ringkhuo kahoiya omnasik, ningchuon ningchuon inngaidonru halli ningtheinuoa ringnasik inthoru.
Hinthoa nangni'n akangamna makngai diangnga inphut kayana ningmusik eii khat-um nangnisik ah angme arei kaom kha tu inkhat diang-um inngaimak kha ning esik eii.
Takkha ulenai ngai inngamna kaneimak ngai angnga ninmalung minpoong maknasik, akathi ngai jarra inthiang kha nangni'n ningjetsik hi keini'n kinmanuom.
Jisu hi athijei halli aringnook jei tihi eini'n ningamna, khawa jarra ama kangamna-ah akathi ngaikha Jisu le inruoiya Pathian in aruoisik eii tihi ningamna eii.
Ajarchu tuunna angme keini'n kinnaminchu hi Pumi minchuna kha eii: Pumi ajuoni, aleikaringnga kaom eini'n, aleikathi ngai neek-ah ma-sanumin.
Ajarchu Pumi apumtak Marwaanna inphut oong rasale, marwaan tirton kaliankhetpa rasa khat-um Pathian tampaloi rasale inruoiya ajuochumsik eii. Halli Christa kangamna-ah aleikathi ngaikha ma-insa-ah aminringsik eii,
khawapha takkhan eini aleikaringseng in intuupnita inmanile inruoiya suumphai chungnga Pumi inmupui nasik lairalak ah nikalsik ejei. Halli Pumi le inruoiya hektik neileiya niomsuom sik ejei.
Khawa jarra hiwa chong ngai hin nangni inkhat li inkhat malung insoknaru.
Ulenai ngai, apha khat-um kumli tha ngai jarra angtikme hiwa ngai kasuoksik nangnidiang heimajiasik rangaimakjei.
Ajarchu inruup inkhat in zaanna iheiwa angnga Pumi Nikhuo kha ajuotungsik eii tihi nangni'n inthiangnga ningjet.
Mi ngai'n, “Angrakip adaijei khat-um chisik ommak jei,” inti pha, jetlei-theileiya inmangna kha inmani chungnga ajuosik eii. Nai kaneisik numeisa inkhat chungnga jetlei-theileiya naiha kana kahong angnga Pumi Nikhuo kha-um ajuosik eii, halli khawa kha inmani'n inlit matornunu.
Takkha ulenai ngai, nangnichu akaziingnga kaom emakchu jei, inruup khan nangni naminlai angnga khawa Nikhuo khan nangni naminlai marase.
Ajarchu nangni rakip suunta ka-eii, war mi ngaikha ning-ejei. Eini zaan mi emakmi emakli akaziingta emakmi.
Khawa jarra, aleiilak ngai angnga zaalkhai mui; eini harchakrui halli inringchakrui.
Zaan phakhan mi ngai'n inzaal; halli ju-inrui mi ngaikhan Zaankhan in-inrui.
Takkha eini suun mi ni-eii, halli eini ni-inringchak sik eii. minriang li ingamna hi eini'n phou nimin-esik eii, halli sanminringna inngamna kha raallukhu nimin-esik eii.
Pathian in eini hi ama raangna kha kamusik-ah inakadang emak, takkha eini Nipumi Jisu Christa jarra sanminringna kamusik ah inakadang ejei,
Ama ajuopha, eini nileithi emakli nileiring innum, amale inruoiya niring suomnasik ah ama'n einisik anathipi jei.
Khawa jarra nangni'n tuunna ningtho angnga, inkhat li inkhat insanru halli inkhat li inkhat malung insokru.
Ulenai ngai, Christian ringkhuo tiang nangni karra chuon katho ngai, nangni kanaminchu khat-um lamkakei ngaikha akatha ah khoya thoru tia nangnidiang nina kinheinei.
Inmani'n khawa chuon intho jarra minriangna le inruoiya kheella inmani kha khoya thoru. nangni karra akadai omrase.
Ulenai ngai, keini'n nangni masokna kinheinei, akadool ngaikha rakookru, akachi ngaikha malung minngarpiru, akasuol ngaikha sanru, mirakip le kadeiraat eru.
Tu inkhat innum akathamak kha akathamak khan mi inkhat diang maletkir marase, takkha apha rakip-ah mi rakip diang halli inkhat li inkhat diang katha thonasik entokru.
Apha rakip ah rokru,
inchat omleiya niru,
angrakip-ah minpaakru. Hiwahi Christa Jisu diang nangni sik-ah Pathian lungdou kha eii.
Ratha Inthiang kha minnuor maru;
Pathian chongkachoi ngai chong ngaikha ralaangmak thomaru.
Takkha chong rakip ngaikha enminru: akatha kha kacheet-ah mahuumru
halli akathamak rakip ngaikha mathaanru.
Kadai kanape Pathian ama khan, nangni kha angrakip-ah naminthiang rase, halli eini Nipumi Jisu Christa ajuopha khan. Ningratha, ningringphuuk, khat-um ningtaksa pumpui kha inthiangnga nadarase,
Nangni kanakoipa kha ngamna kaom ejarra, ama'n khawakha anathopisik eii.
Ulenai ngai, keinisik um nanipiru.
Inthiang inzoople inruoiya kangamna rakip khoya inthoru.
Hiwa chemajia hi kangamna rakip diang teelpinasik kei'n Pumi thomatorna ranak khan nangni masokna kaheinei.
Nipumi Jisu Christa riangwai khan nangni kha naompui rase.
Paul, Silas khat-um Timothy, Thessalonica ah kaom nipa Pathian khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa mi ka-eii koisuok ngaidiang:
Nipa Pathian khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa diangnga inphut nangni chungnga riangwai khat-um kahoi kadai kha omrase.
Ule naingai, eini'n apha rakip-ah nangnisik bit-ah Pathian niminpaaksik eii. Ajarchu hiwahi eini'n thosik-ah rahoi suok, ajarchu nangni ngamna kha hong-insoon halli nangni rakip in inkhatli inkhat ning-inriang kha-um ahonglok.
Khawa jarra keini kinpum tak-in Pathian koisuokngai diang nangni jarra in-orna kinnei. Nangni'n ningtongpui poongraalna rakip-ah ningdei khat-um ngamna ningcheet jarra um in-orna kinnei.
Hiwa rakip ngai'n Pathian chongtan khachu adik tia amalar, nangni'n ningpoong khan ajar-eya Pathian rengram sik-ah nangni rahoi ning-eii.
Pathian chu akadik kha eii: nangni kanaminpoong ngaikha ama'n aminpoongsik eii,
halli ama'n keini poongna khat-um nangni poongna kha anakhaipisik eii. Hiwahi ama'n Pumi Jisu kha marwaan makheiya ranak kangar ama marwaan tirton ngaikha mei machuon le inruoiya ajuoni khan,
Pathian kajetmak khat-um Pumi Jisu chongkahoi kajuimak mi ngai khachu ama'n mei le inruoiya arachaak sik eii.
Inmani khachu Pumi makheiya inlaak khat-um ama lurna lianna ranak makheiya inlaak kumsoot mangna kha inmusik eii,
ama mi rakip diang lurna lianna khat-um ama ka-ngamna rakip diang khoya kaleisik-ah ajuo Nikhuo nikhan, nangni um inmani karra ning-inchelsik eii ajarchu nangnidiang kinril chongpui kha nangni'n ngamna ningneijei.
Khawa jarra keini'n nangni sik-ah inchat lekleiya Pathian diang kinni. Pathian nakoina ringkhuo khan nangni'n rahoi ka-eya ningring matornasik keini'n Pathian diang kinnanipi. Nangni i-ngaidon akatha rakip khat-um nangni ngamna kaom chuon ngaikha ama ranak khan huui namintungpi erase.
Hinthoa Eini Pumi Jisu raming kha nangni diangnga inphut lurna lianna kha amusik eii, halli eini Pathian khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa riangwai jarra inphut nangni'n lurna lianna kha amadiang makheiya ningmusik eii.
Eini Pumi Jisu Christa akajuosik halli eini'n amadiang ni-inchunsik jarra, kei'n ule nai nangnidiang hiwa ngaihi kanaminthozoot,
khachu ratha-ah erase, chongpuiya erase, emakli keini imajia chongnga erase, Pumi Nikhuo kha ajuojei iti chongkhan nangni innottheiya ningmalung mindongmaru khat-um ningka-iit kha emaru.
Tuteii innum maleisei thoa nangni kha ang rakip-ah lamleiitiang inruoimaru. Ajarchu ahekna kathamak pha heiwa masa makleiseng halli meikhurra kaluutsik Manu Mi kha inlarmasa maklaiseng khawa Nikhuo kha heiwanuni.
Ama'n chubei thosik ah rahoi ka-eii Pathian emakli phur rakip kha zootnuni halli apum takkha hiwangai rakip chungnga inchoisaang. Ama'n sita Pathian biak-inn khannum in-ongta Pathian ka eii atisik eii.
Nangni'n ngaidonmakchu bejei? Kei'n nangnile kalei omlai hiwangai rakip hi nangnidiang kei'n kaleiriljei.
Hiwahi tuun laminsuok maknasik ook-ah kaom inkhat om halli khawa kha nangni'n ningjetjei, apha chei tinikhan Manu Mi kha inlarsik eii.
Inthup ah kaom Manu Mi ranak kha tuun chuon athoa omjei, takkha tuun aka-ook ama kha lam makheiya inkhaimaklaiseng akasuoksik kha lasuoknuni.
Halli khawapha khanchu Manu Mi kha malarsik ejei, takkha Pumi Jisu ajuoni khan, Manu Mi kha Pumi mur makheiya aphuksaan ranakkhan ama kha athatsik eii halli Pumi ra-aang khan Manu Mi kha aminmangsik eii.
Manu Mi khan Seitan ranak-ah heiwata kadikmak inlakchuon khat-um ngak kaom angjet ngaikha athosik eii,
halli Pathian kajetmak kamangnga kaom mi ngaidiang rilkacha maleisei angjet arilsik eii. Inmani ngaikha inthisik eii ajarchu ringna sik-ah akadikkha inmalungnga keiluutmu.
Hiwa jarra inmani'n akadikmak kha ngamnarasu tia Pathian in akadikmak ranak kha inmani diang chuon katho sik-ah ijuotir eii.
Ajuotirna ajarchu akadik kha kangamnamak, takkha akathamak kamanuom mi rakip kha minmangnasik eii.
Pumi'n inaminriang ule naingai, nangni sik bit-ah keini'n inchatlekleiya Pathian minpaaksik rahoi eii. Ajarchu Pathian'n nangni kha sanminringna sik-ah Ratha ranak-ah khat-um akadik kha ningngamna jarra ama sik-ah inthiang mi ngai namin-enasik mansakhet-ah inakadang kha ning-ejei.
Eini Pumi Jisu Christa lurna lianna khan tum ningchang nasik-ah, Pathian'n nangnikha keini'n kinril chongkahoi khan inakoi kha eii.
Khawa jarra, ule naingai, kacheet-ah ngirru halli kinmurra kinril emakli kinmajia chongnga keini'n nangnidiang kinnaminchu akadik ngaikha kacheet-ah mahuumru.
Eini kanaminriang halli ama riangwai khan masokna khat-um ngamna kacheet kanapeii eini Pumi Jisu Christa khat-um nipa Pathian in
nangnikha kumsoot akatha katho khat-um akadik karil ning-enasik bit-ah nasongpui khat-um na-ngirpui kha erase.
Ahekna khet-ah, ule naingai, nangni diang aleikasuok kha angnga, Pumi chongkahoi hi innottheiya khat-um kalurra inkeiluut nasik-ah keini sik-ah Pathian diang nanipiru.
Pathian in keini hi manu khat-um akathamak mi ngai diangnga inphut anasan nasik-um Pathian nanipiru, ajarchu mi rakip in chongkahoi hi ka-ngamna emu.
Takkha Pumi chu ngamna kaom eii, halli ama'n nangni kha anamin-ngarsik khat-um Seitan diangnga inphut anasansik eii.
Keini'n Pumi diang nangni jarra ngamna kinnei, khachu nangni'n ningtho khat-um nangnidiang thoru kinti ngaikha thochei ningte tiya kinlei.
Pathian minriangna khat-um Christa in poongraal ideikha incheen doomma ningjetnasik Pumi'n nangni kha nanruoipui erase.
Ule naingai, akadool ule nai khat-um keini naleipeii dan ngaikha akajuimak inmani rakip makheiya inphut kalaak-ak omru tia eini Pumi Jisu Christa ramingnga chongpeii hi nangnidiang kinda.
Nangni'n keini omchan ngaikha angtho tholia ningjutsikme tikha ningjetjei. Keini'n nangnile kinom laikhan eini akadool kha emakmi.
Keini'n tuteii bukha aman pelekleiya bakmung, takkha nangni tuteii diang-um phurrik emaknasik keini'n inchatlekleiya suunli zaan boiya chuon kintho.
Hiwa kinthona jarhi, keini'n nangni diang nasanru kinti nasik kinrei ommak jarra emak, takkha nangni juisik-ah abi inkhat kindazoot-ah kintho eii.
Keini'n nangnile kinlei omlai, keini'n nangni diang kinleiti kachak, “Chuon kathomak mi kha bak marase.”
Nangni karra chuon tholekleiya, chor intiya halkaom, akadool miring lekkhat inom tihi keini'n kinjet.
Khawa mi ngaidiang keini'n Pumi Jisu Christa ramingnga omchian inlang chuon tho-inlang ringnasik chuon thoru tia kinmasok khat-um chongpeii kinda.
Ule naingai, chuon katha katho sik kapoongkha emaru.
Hiwa chemajia larik hinna juisik-ah kinleida kajuimak miring lekkhat omthei eii, khawa mi ngaikha katha-ah jetru halli inmani ngaikha jakna inmunasik inmani khale inlopmaru.
Takkha inhalpui mit-enna inmani ngaikha enmaru; khawa rathuulla, ule nai mit-enna minchuru.
Akahoi akadai thutbul, Pumi ama tak-in, chuon rakip-ah khat-um apha rakip-ah akahoi akadai kha inapeii erase. Pumi'n nangni rakip nanruoipuichak erase.
Kei'n hiwa inpaakna chonghi kakut tak-in kimajia kha eii. Kacheii majia rakip-ah Paul kei'n katia jetnabi kadeeng; hin thoa kei'n kamajia.
Eini Pumi Jisu Christa riangwai kha nangni rakip chungnga omrase.
Eini Kanakatanpa Pathian khat-um eini inngamna ka eii Christa Jisu chongpeii dungjuiya Christa Jisu tirton Paul makheiya eii.
Inngamna jarra inthiang kei kasapa Timothy diang um: Pa Pathian khat-um Christa Jisu eini Pumi'n riangwai, minriang, khat-um kadaikha naparase.
Kei'n Macedonia kasina lamma nangnadiang kinamasokzoot khachu, nang in Ephesus khan omro khawakha e-inchu miring lekkhatkha kathamak kaminchu ngaikha daru tia chong napesik eii.
Tiallaiya thurchi khat-um hekdan kaommak nipi nipu ngai khangjarra murruolsiak bit thonasik ka-ekha mathaan nasik tipiru, ajarchu inngamna ah nijet Pathian ingaidon kha inmani'n sepa thomujei.
Hiwa chongpeii jarra thosik arei khachu inthiang malungsuung makheiya kahongsuok minriang, kase katha jetna malung, khat-um inthiangnga inngamna kanei enasik eii.
Mi lekkhat in hiwa ngairakip inmathaanna, aka-am ngai inbiakna tiang inletjei.
Inmani'n Pathian Dan karu inlei ezoot, takkha inmani'n inpumtak ah chongngai emakli inngamnatheiya inril chong rakip kha um leijetmatormu.
Tichu eini'n nijet Danhi inliingnasik munna inliingna inchu katha eii.
Hiwahi jetru, Danhi kadik mi ngaisik ah inbool emak, takkha Dankajui mak li chongkajuimak ngaisik, han Pathian kajetmak ngaisik, manu karoon ngaisik, han Pathain sepa kathomak li Pathian kachimak ngaisik, anu apa kathat ngaisik, khat-um mi kathat ngaisik,
zool-inthai ngaisik, pasalli pasal zool-inthai ngaisik, kathamak ah mi kasur ngaisik, maleisei karil ngaisik, kadikmak sakhi kapei ngaisik emakli katha chongminchu kajuimak ngaisik-ah ibool eii.
Kalurkalian khat-um rawaan katha Pathian makheiya chongkahoi ngaihi chongkahoiya nimu minchuna dungjuiya karilsuok sik-ah kei kadiang anapejei.
Kachuon thomatornasik ah ranak kanapeii eini Pumi Christa Jisu kha kaminpaak. Ama sepa kathosik rahoi ka-eii tia ana-ngaidon jarra khat-um anakadang jarra kei'n ama kha kaminpaak.
Akatheng pha ah kei'n ama kha kathamak ah kaleiril khat-um kaleirilthai halli kaleirachaak, takkha Pathian in keikadiang anaminriang, ajarchu kei'n inngamnakha leineimong halli kei'n angme kitho kha kaleijetmak jarra eii.
Eini Pumi riangwai khale inruoiya Christa Jisu diangnga kaom inngamnali minriang nakha ama'n kei kadiang katamma anajuobunthuon pijei.
Hiwahi akadik chongril kha eii, inthiangnga keiluutsik khat-um ngamnasik eii: Christa Jisu'n nuoipilchungnga ijuohi manu karoon ngai sanringnasik eii, inmani ngai karra keihi manu karoonkhet ka-eii.
Takkha Pathian in manu karoonkhet kei kadiang anaminriang jarra Christa Jisu in ama malung dainakha keikadiang naminmute, akahongsik pha-ah amadiang ka-inngamnasik khat-um hektik kaboi ringna kalamusik inmanidiang minkhina inchangnasik eii.
Khale inruoiya hektik kaneimaksik reng, kathi maksik khat-um nimumak Pathian khabit, kayarui khat-um hektik kaboiya minlurrui! Amen.
Kasapa Timothy, tiallaiya Pathian chongkachoi ngai'n nang najarra inleiril chongngai kha kei'n nangnadiang hiwa chongpehi kinapeii ejei. Hiwa chong rakip ngaihi raalkha kathatak-ah indeipuinasik-ah raalphurra inliingnaro,
halli inngamna khat-um katha kajet malungkha roonro. Mi lekkhat in inmani malung kha ra-ngai mujei halli inmani inngamna kha inminmangjei.
Inmani ngai karra Hymenaeus khat-um Alexander hium Pathian karilse kada inchunna sik-ah kei'n karachaak ah Seitan kutchungnga kapeluutjei.
Kei'n kanati, mansakhet ah, kanipi, Pathian kani, kabiak, halli minpaakna kamalar hi mirakip sik-ah Pathian diang thopiru;
halli reng rakipsik khat-um aleilaak ranak kanei rakip sik, khawakha e-inchu einirakip in omchan katha khat-um Pathian kachi tak-ah kahoi kadaiya ringna neinite.
Hiwahi akatha eii halli kanakatanpa Pathian izoot kha um eii,
mi rakip ngaihi sanringnasik khat-um akadik minjetsik hi ama inmanuom kha eii.
Khale inruoiya Pathian inkhat bit aom, halli Pathian li miring ngai minchunna sik-ah mi inkhat aom, miringpa khachu Christa Jisu eii,
ama'n miringngai rakip nakatanasik apum takkha inpesuok, khawakha'n mirakip kha Pathian in aphakacha ah sanzootna sakhi eii.
Khat-um kei'n maleisei kiril emak, inthiang kha kiril eii, hiwajarra kei'n ingamna khat-um kadik hi rilsuok nasik ah kei'n zaatlop ngai tirton khat-um karu sik-ah innajuotir eii!
Pasal rakip in biak-inn chubeithona rakip ah Pathian kanihi kei'n kamanuom, halli Pathian diang amalung inpesuok Pasal rakip in inkut thaangnga khat-um karaang li murruolsiak tholekleiya nisik kei'n kamanuom.
Kei'n kamanuom, numeisa ngai'n inpuondiar ngaikha enzootkaom khat-um kathatak ah inluknasik-ah jetrasu, kahurthei samchoi inlak, emakli enzoot omnasik soonna katonhut, emakli aman katam kuorbet, raka kaor emakli puondiar aman katam inluk emaru,
takkha akatha chuon katho numeisa in Pathian kajet numeisa eii tia injetna.
Numeisa rakip nunchan inchuol kha omchian inlang inchu rasu.
Halli numeisa ngai'n pasal ngai chungnga minchusik khat-um waikaroon esik hi kei'n zootmong, takkha inmani'n inomchian sik eii.
Tichu Adam kha mansakhet ah abool halli Eve abool.
Halli Adam kha emak matheemna ah kaleichul, takkha numeisanu kha eii matheemna ah leichulla halli Pathian Dan kamakoi.
Takkha numeisa ngai'n inpoong inraal innnum inngamna, minriang, khat-um nunchan katha kha insongnga inom-inchu inmani kha nai inneichungnga sanna aneisik eii.
Hiwahi akadik chongril kha eii, miring inkhat in Koisuok karoon a-ezoot inchu, ama'n akathathei chuon imanuom kha eii.
Kathamak noonkuung kaboi mi'n Koisuok karoon esik eii, ama kha numeisa inkhatbit ruothar esik, inlermak, malung insurthei, omchan katha, khuolmi kadonthei, halli kaminchuthei ah esik,
ama kha juinrui emakli karaangraat etheinuni, takkha minriang kanei khat-um malung kadai esik eii, halli sial kamanuom um ethei nuni;
ama'n a-insuungkhur katha tak ah karoon mator halli asa ngai'n amadiang chongkajui tak-ah kayana kaminnei mator esik eii.
Tichu a-insuungkhur katha ah karoon matormak mi'n angtho thoa Pathian koisuok kha karoon mator eniame?
Ama'n ngamna ah kachang inkhat esik eii, kha e-inchu ama in-orna kha honglok nunijei halli Seitan angnga chongtanna mununu jei.
Ama kha koisuok ka-emak mi ngai innum inkaya mi ah esik eii, khawa e-inchu ama kha injakna mununi khat-um Seitan chaangnga inkhit nunijei.
Koisuok Deacon ngai'n omchan katha khat-um malung inthiang in esik, halli theibomju kha katamma ka-inmak emakli sialsumma mahaam kalian emaru,
Inmani'n inthuuk tak-ah kadik ka eii innaleimalarpi inngamna kha kase katha jetna malung khan inthiangnga inmahuum sik eii.
Inmani ngaikha mansakhet ah ni-encheen masasik eii, halli inmani'n rahoi kasuok in-e-inchu deacon chuonkha thorasu.
Han inmani numei ngai kha um akatha khangchan in esik khat-um mi karilthai echa mak; inmani'n angrakip ah malung insurthei khat-um malung inthiang mi in-esik eii.
Koisuok Deacon ngai'n numeisa inkhatbit kanei in-esik, halli asa ngaili a-inn suungkhur katha ah waikaroon mator in esik eii.
Deacon chuonna katha-ah katho inmanikha mi ngai'n kayana inneisik eii, halli Christa Jisu diang inngamna jarkha inmani'n kachi omleiya inrilsuok mator.
Hiwa cheiihi nangdiang kimajia le inruoiya kei'n nakoolla innoottheiya heiwali inmuna sik-ah kangaidon.
Takkha kei'n kajuo inmo inchu, Pathian inna angkachang omchanna ningleeng sikme tihi jetnasik-ah hiwa cheii hin kamajia jei, khawa khachu karing Pathian koisuok in-eii, eini sik-ah kachou khat-um kadik kanadeipi sik-ah eii.
Khat-um atuteii in hituk inthuuk eini Pathian sinadan hi zootmak thonunu: Ama'n manmasi taksa ah ajuo inlar, Ratha innum akadik eii tikha amalar, marwaan tirton ngai innum inmu. Ama kha zaat rakipdiang inrilsuok, nuoipilchung mi ngai'n inngamna jei, halli marwaan tiang inruoijei.
Tichu Ratha'n inthiangnga ati, khawa khachu mi lekkhat in akalahong sik pha ah ngamnahi inlamathaan sik eii, halli inmani'n maleisei ratha ngai halli raikhuo ngai minchuna kha inlajuisik eii.
Thir inling meikasa ikaang angnga ikaangjei kase katha thentheina malung kathi ngai'n hiwa ka-ang kasetheija maleisei karil ngai'n hiwa minchunahi inleirilthang.
Inmani'n inn neisik tihi kathamak eii khat-um saak angjet baksik um kathamak eii tia inleiminchu. Takkha kangamna khat-um kadik kajet ngai'n baksaak rakip sik ah Pathian inminpaakle inruoiya baksaak rakip baksik ah Pathian in ilei-bool kha eii.
Pathian ibool phur rakip atha; iteii hiaisik ommak, takkha angrakip Pathian niminpaak le inruoiya nibaksik eii,
ajarchu Pathian chong khat-um Pathian nini jarra Pathian in anazootpijei.
Nang in inngamna chongkadik khat-um akadik minchunna nijui khan natheinuo ah ni-inwaisip angnga, nang in hiwa minchunna ngaihi kangamna ngaidiang namindik inchu nang in Christa Jisu sik ah katha suokkha na-esik eii.
Takkha rilsik ka-emak Pathian inchenmak thurchi kha mathaanru, halli natheinuo ah Pathian kajet ringkhuo enasik ah inchuchak inlang omro.
Taksa thanasik insuukna kha anemna lekkhat om, takkha Ratha ngarnasik insuukna anemna khachu atuunna khat-um kahongsik ringkhuo han alam rakip ah anemna om tia chong-inkhitna anei.
Hiwahi kadik chongril kha eii, hiwarakip hi keiluutsik khat-um ngamnasik eii.
Mi rakip Kanakatanpa halli aru ka-edoomma ngamna kanei ngai kasanring akaring Pathian diang keini'n ngamna kinda jarra, keini'n chuon ranak kintho ah khat-um kapoongnga kinsongnga kin-om.
Hiwa inchuna ngaili indikna ngaihi inmani diang peru.
Nang khangdoong na eii tia tuteii inkhat in enselmusit inthomaro; takkha nachongrilla kangamna ngaisik-ah, naomchana, minriangnga, ingamna ah, inthiangga minkhina katha inchangro.
Kei'n nang nakoolla kaheiwa maklaiseng, mi ngai karra chong inthiang ngaikha karil, kamasok, khat-um kaminchuwa apha kaminluut khat-um malung kaluut ero.
Pathian chong kachoi ngai'n inrilsuokle inruoiya upa ngai'n nang nachungnga kut induong pha ah najuope ratha kutchoi kha i-emak ti-inlang leimaro.
Mi rakip in nachountho insoon kha inmunasik ah hiwa minchu mindikna ngaihi napumtak in huoikajou ah juiro khat-um thoro.
Napum khat-um naminchuna khan insingtheiro, hi ngai rakip hi thochak inlang omro, ajarchu hiwa natho inchu, nang nachong karangai ngaili nang napum takkha sanringnasik eii.
Upa kha kese ah ranmaro, khawa rathuulla napa angnga malung masokpiro, halli khangdong ngaikha nanai ngai angnga,
numeisa upa ngaikha nanu ngai angnga, halli khangdoong numeisa ngaikha nasar angnga malung inthiangnga inloppuiro.
Sansik ah arei kaom Chuulmei ka-etak ngaikha kayaro.
Takkha chuulmeinu'n asa emakli atu ngai aom inchu, mansakhet ah inmani'n Pathian kajet chuonkha inmani insuungkhur khan thomasarasu, halli hiwa'n innu inpa ngai khat-um inpi inpu ngai chuontho maleiikirna eii, ajarchu hiwahi Pathian malungtaina eii.
Atheinuo ah kaom chuulmei khat-um tuteii sepa inthosik kaneimak ama'n, Pathian khabit ngamna ada ah, suunle zaan inchat omleiya Pathain niya Pathian in juosanna sik-ah aniya aom.
Takkha taksa hoina ah apum inpesuok chuulmeinu kha aring innum kathi a-ejei.
Hiwa indiknahi inmani diang peru, khawa e-inchu tuteii in inmani diang kadikmak noonkuung penunujei.
Takkha atu ka-ang in inmani in-u innai khat-um akathadoomma inmani insuungkhur mi ngaikha inensui theimak inchu, inmani'n inngam nakha inzootmak eii halli inmani ngaikha ka-ngamna makngai neek ah kathamak in eii.
Kum soomruk kalakheelmak chuulmei kha chuulmei eii tia leimaru, halli ama kha pasal inkhat diangbit inn kaleinei numeisa esik eii
halli ama kha akatha chuon katho sik-ah araming kasi erase, asa ngaikha katha ah kahong keiruoi, khuolmi ngaikha a-inna kadonzoot, aleiilaak Christian ngaidiang sepa katha kathothei, mikapoong ngai kasan, halli ama'n akatha chuon rakip ah apumtak kathozoot erase.
Takkha akadoong chuulmei ngaikha chuulmei eii tia leimaru; ajarchu inmani'n inmalungnga inn inhongneizoot phakhan, Christa diang makheiya inletsik eii.
Halli inmani'n mansakhet chonginkhit nakha inmakoi jarra kathamak in-ejei.
Inmani'n akadool inchuwa inn khat makheiya inn khat ah inlonbulla inom, takkha akadoolbit ema ah, rilmaksik chong inrilla inchuon inmin-et ah, mikarilthai khat-um chongriam karil inchuwa inom.
Khawajarra kei'n chuulmei kadoong ngaikha inn neisik hi kei'n kamanuom, sa neirasu, halli in innluo ngaikha boolrasu, khantho inlang eini ni-inhalpui ngai'n kathamak ah naril nasik ah amun pemui.
Tichu chuulmei lekkhat in Seitan nuk juinasik-ah inmalung inmaletsuojei.
Tichu atu ka-ang Christa nukkajui numeisa inna chuulmei inom inchu, ama'n chuulmei ngaikha ensui rase, halli inmani jarra koisuok ngaidiang poongna pemarasu, khawakha e-inchu sansik ah arei kaom chuulmei ngaiseng kha koisuok ngai'n sanna nei inte.
Chuonkatha katho upa lam kanakei ngai, khat-um akathadoomma kapoong tak ah Pathian chong karil li kanaminchu ngaikha, chan inni kha pesik ah rahoi kasuok in eii.
Tichu chong inthiang in aril, “Saang narakhool na-ah ni-inliingna saraatchal kha amur khuop maro” halli “Chuon katho ngai kha inchuon thoman nipesik suok.”
Mi inni emakli inni kheella sakhi narangaimaklai seng, upa inkhat chungnga kathamak inheichoi kha leimaru.
Manu katho mi ngaikha mipui maikuungnga ranru, khawakha e-inchu aleiilaak ngaikhan num china nei-inte.
Khawale inruoiya hiwa minchuna ngaihi kei'n nangnadiang Pathian khat-um Christa Jisu khat-um inthiang marwaan tirton ngai maikuungnga tuteii diang nachuonthona rakip ah mimeel mimai enlekleiya khat-um mikarathiat thomaro tia chongpena kananei.
Miring inkhat diang Pumi chuon minthonasik beiya inmani chungnga kutduongnga peluut nasik-ah innot emaro. Halli miring inkhat manu rakip chuonna nang inchelmaro, napumkha inthiangnga daro.
Halli tui khabit inkhai maro, ajarchu nang in nanaliip jarra nabak na-in intumnasik ah theibomju lekkhat kha um inro.
Mi lekkhat manu ngai khachu musik ah abeitek, halli inmani manu ngaikha inmani neek ah chongtanna munkhan aleitung masajei, takkha mi lekkha manu ngai khachu nuk ah inmusik eii.
Hiwale in-angrip ah akatha chuontho khachu inlarpong, halli inlarmak ah kaom ngaikha um thupthei nunujei.
Atu ka-ang suok ka eii ngai'n inmani karu ngaikha kaya sik-ah rahoi kasuok innei tia inngaidon sik eii, halli atuteii in Pathian raming khat-um eini minchunna kha kathamak ah rilnunu.
Christian karu ngai suok eya kaom rakip in inmani kha mateek marasu, ajarchu inmani kha-um kangamna ngai in eii, khawa neek achu inmani kha kathadoomma sepa thoru, ajarchu inmani chuonna nemna kapeii ngaikha inmani'n inminriang ka-ngamna ngaikha in eii. Hiwa ngaihi minchu inlang rilpiru.
Atuka-ang in intei ka eii kathamak chong kaminchu khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa kadikchong halli ratha lamtiang minchunna kazootmak mikha,
iteii kajetmak khat-um in-orthei mi kha eii. Halli ama'n chong rakip ah murruolsiak khat-um inseiina thonasik-ah kathamak malung anei, hiwa'n kara-ot, insuol inkhal, mi karilthai, halli mi kaminnuor aheichoi,
halli kathamak malung khat-um kadik hi kaneimak ngai'n mi ngaile apharakip ah murruolsiak inthosik eii. Halli Pathian nukkajuihi inchongna eii tia inmani'n inngaidon.
Takkha ni-inei rakip ah nikhopthei inchu, Pathain kajet hi kheella inchongna eii.
Ajarchu manmasituol hin iteii jachoimakmi, halli eini'n manmasituol makheiya iteii nichoitheisik ommak.
Khawajarra, eini'n bak sili retruo ngaihi ninei inchu, eini'n khawa khan nihunsik eii.
Takkha atu ka-ang ka-inchong zoot in matheemna ah inchul halli ka-am angjet li kathamak manuomna chaangnga inkhit, hiwa'n inmanikha minsenali minmangna tiang akeiruoi.
Khawajarra siallesum kamanuom hi kathamak rakip inphutna akuung kha eii, mi lekkhat in siallesum kaneizootthei inom khawajarra inmani ngamna makheiya lamleiitiang insijei halli inmani malung kha kahoimak angjet in amakoijei.
Nang Pathian kajet mi, hiwa ngai rakip hi looiro, halli kadik, Pathain kajet, ngamna, minriang, kadeikaraat, khat-um malung inniam munasik ah kasong ero.
Ngamna sik-ah raal kha katha tak-ah indeipuiro, hektik kaommak ringna kha kacheet ah mahuumro khawa sik-ah nangkha anakoi jei, halli sakhi angjet maikuungnga akatha ngamna kha aril suokjei.
Phurrakip diang ringkhuo kapeii Pathian maikuungnga halli ama inngamna kha Pontius Pilate maikuungnga um kacheet ah ka-ngirra karilsuok jei Christa Jisu maikuungnga um kei'n nangnadiang chongpena kanei,
khawa khachu eini Pumi Jisu Christa ajuo inlarna nikhuo emaklaiseng chongpeii hi kamasial emakli noonkuung kape elekleiya juiro.
Rengngai karra Rengchungnung halli Pumi ngai karra Pumi ka eii halli rawaan kathakhet khat-um kanaroon amabit Pathian in apha kachatak ah Christa kha ajuominlar sik eii.
Amabit eii kathi kaom mak, atu inkhat in intung matormakna war khan aringnga om. Halli atu inkhat innum lamumu khat-um atuteii in mu-um mukhai nunu. Ama diang kayasik khat-um hektik kaboi ranak kha omrase! Amen.
Atuunlaiya manmasituolla kainchongnga kaom inmani diang hiwa chongpehi peru, khawa khachu inmani'n in-or marasu, khat-um iteii kaemak inchongna ah inngamnamarasu, takkha angrakip hoina sik-ah katamma kanapeii Karingchak Pathian diang ngamnarusu.
Inmani diang katha chuonna inchongna sik-ah kadik thonasik, halli malung inthiang li karok ah mi ngaidiang kape enasik ah insuuk eru tia inmanidiang chongpeii hi peru.
Khale inruoiya hinthoa inmani'n kalahong apha sik-ah inmani'n akacheet inn mun kadeeng angnga inmani sikbeiya karei inbuk sikjei, hiwa'n inmani ringkhuo ah kadik ringkho inmunasik eii.
Timothy, nangnadiang angrakip na-ngamna ah innape kha katha tak ah daro, chong ka-emak karil, kamo murruolsiak katho khat-um hiwahi mi lekkhat in kaemak ah “Jetna” eii tia inkoi, hiwa ngai makheiya taandelro.
Han mi lekkhat in kijetjei tia inrilsuok, khawajarra inmani in inngamna makheiya lamleiitiang insijei. Pathian riangwai kha nangni ngai rakipdiang naompui chakrase.
Pathian lungdou dungjuiya Christa Jisu tirton Paul in Christa Jisu le inruoiya inchunna suungnga eini'n nimu ringna chong-inkhitna kha rilthang nasik,
Minriang kaom kasapa Timothy nang nadiang kiheimathuon eii: Pa Pathian le eini Pumi Christa Jisu khan riangwai, minriang khat-um akadai kha nape rase.
Kapi kapu ngai'n inleitho angnga, inthiangnga kase katha jetnale inruoiya kei'n asepa kitho Pathian kha kaminpaak. Halli suun li zaanna kei'n Pathian kanina rakip ah nang kanangaidonna ama kha kei'n kaminpaak.
Namit rathi suok ka-ngaidonna, kei karokna pui tungtheinasik, nangkha kana-inmupuizoot.
Napi Lois li nanu Eunice innum inngamna innei angnga na-inngamna inthiang ka-ngaidonna. Khawa kha nang nadiang-um aom ti kei'n ka-inngamna.
Hiwa sik-ah nachungnga kei'n kakut kadapha Pathian nape kutchoi kha karingnga nada theinasik kei'n nangkha kanamin-ngaidon eii.
Ajarchu Pathian in einidiang akachi Ratha kha napemak; khawa rathuulla ama Ratha khan eini nasip-ah ranak, minriang khat-um nipum-insurtheina kha anapejei.
Eini Nipumi jarra sakhi kapesik injak mui; halli Christa sik surra innada keisik um injak maru. Khawa neek-ah Chong Kathasik jarra ranak ngarna Pathian in inape angnga poongna suungkhan tum kha leiru.
Eini ngai'n akatha nitho jarra emak. Takkha amatak lungdou khat-um minriangna jarra, ami naminchang nasik-ah, Christa Jisu diang nuoipil inbool makma anakoiya anasanring jei.
Takkha tuunchu eini Kanasanring Christa Jisu ajuo jarra einidiang namalarpijei. Ama'n thina ranak aminmangnga, halli chongkahoi jarra akathi kaommak ringkhuo kha amalarjei
Chong Katha karil inthangsik, tirton khat-um ocha inkhat angnga Pathian in kei anakadangjei,
hiwa ngaisik jarra kei'n poongraal kidei eii. Takkha hiwa sik-ah kei injakmong, ajarchu ki-ngamna ama kha kei'n kajet; halli ama'n kei diangnga inape nikhuo aheitung maklaiseng ama'n keihi karingnga nada matorte ti kei'n katha tak-ah kajet.
Christa Jisu le inruoiya eini ni-inchunna ka-e inngamna khat-um inriangna khan om chak-ah juinasik, nang sik-ah minkhina kei'n kinaminchu akatuun chong ngaikha kacheet ah mahuumro.
Nang nadiangnga inapeii akatha ngaikha eini suungnga karingnga kaom Ratha Inthiang ranak jarra indatharo.
Phygelus li Hermogenes inchella, Asia ramma kaom mi rakip kei innamathaan jei, tikha nangni'n ningjet.
Onesiphorus innsuungnga Pumi riangwai kha omrase, Ajarchu ama'n apha angjet malung hoina anapeya kei mikhumna ah kiom kha ama lei-injakmak,
takkha ama Rome heitungli heitungmak anamu maklaiseng anaheiratok.
Pumi'n ariangwai kha ama chungnga khawa Nikhuo khan perase! Halli Ephesus ah ama'n keisik angtuk katam ithome tikha nang in katha tak-ah najet.
Kasapa, nang sik-ah Christa Jisu le ni-inchunna suungnga riangwai jarkhan kangar kha ero.
Sakhi katamtak ngai maikuungnga kei diangnga ningjet kanaminchuna ngaikha lei-inlang rilpiro, halli ngamna kaom mi, mileiilak ngai kaminchu mator ngaidiang um pero.
Christa Jisu chongkajui raalmi inkhat angnga Poongraalna kha deiro.
Raalmi eya kaom miringkhan ama lamkakeipa malung mintai sik amanuom khawa jarra micham ngai ringkhuo chuon khale achuon minchunmak.
Ruolsiak taanna-ah kataan inkhat in juisik dan kha ajuimak inchu ataanman kha ralaang matornuni.
Chuon kangarra katho leimi ama khan leirakhool mansakhet tum kha amusik eii.
Pumi'n nangdiang angrakip jetna anapesik ejarra, angme kei'n kirilhi ngaidonro.
Kei'n kiril Chong Katha suungnga kinaminchu angnga, kathiya inphut akaring David phungrui inkhat ka-e Jisu Christa ama kha ngaidon chakro.
Kei'n Chong Katha kha karil jarra dan kamakoi mi inkhat angnga thirruiya innakhit-ah kapoong kaleidei. Takkha Pathian chong khachu leikhit matormu,
khawa jarra Pathian ikadang mi ngai innum Jisu Christa sanminringna jarra akajuo hektik-kaboi lurna kha inmuthei nasik, inmani jarra angrakip kei'n kidei eii.
Hiwahi akadik chongril kha eii: “Eini amale nithisuom inchu, amale eini um niringsuom sik eii.
Eini'n nideichei inchu, amale eini um wai niroon suomsik eii. Eini'n ama nizootmak inchu, ama innum eini nazoot nuni.
Eini ngamna kacha ni-emak innum, amachu ngamna kacha echei, ajarchu ama atheinuo-ah maleisei inthotheimak.”
Hiwa chong ngai chungnga nami ngai'n insuol-inseiimak nasik Pathian maikuungnga kana tak-ah chong pe-inlang minngaidonro. Hiwahi akatha emak, takkha akarangai mi ngaibit mangnasik eii.
Akatuun Pathian chongkha katuunna kaminchu inkhat e-inlang, ama chuonna injak kaneimak chuonmi angnga, Pathian mitmuwa puikatungnga malarnasik nimatorseng kha thoro.
Inthiangmak khat-um kamo inseiina ah inphut looiru, hiwa ngaihin mi ngaikha Pathian diangnga inphut kalaak-ah aruoisik eii.
Khawa ka-ang minchuna khachu akapaan mason-masonna taksa kabaksuo ka-ang kha eii. Khawa ngai kaminchu miring inni khachu, Hymenaeus li Philetus in-eii.
Inmani'n akatuun lamkha inmathaanna, eini ringnookna kha ahekjei tia kangamna angjet ngai ngamna kha inminmang.
Takkha Pathian innmundeeng kacheet khachu, kanikphuk mator enuni; khawa chungnga chongkha hinthoa injia om, “Pumi'n ami ngaiseng kha ajet” halli “Tu ka-ang in inmani Pumi ta kin-eii katingai khachu inthosialna-ah inphut inheikir cheisik eii,” ati.
Innkalok inkhat suungnga bukheeng khat-um ankheeng aphung rakip aom: lekkhat in soonna li dangka ah inbool, aleiilak ngaikhan thingnga khat-um neipilla inbool um aom: lekkhat khachu kapoi chuonna inneiman nasik, halli aleiilak ngai khachu kachamma inneiman angnga inneiman nasik eii.
Tu ka-ang in hiwa akathamak ngai rakip-ah inphut intheinuo ah ininthiang inchu, kapoidom jarra inneimansik eii, ajarchu inmani kha inmani Karu'n neiman sik-ah inpesuok chuon katha rakip sik-ah ininsuuk eii.
Khangdoong laiya taksa manuom ngaikha mathaanro, halli malung inthiang tak-ah Pumi'n asan nasik ah kakoi ngaile inruoiya akatuun tiang, inngamna tiang, minriangna tiang halli akadai kha katha ah juiro.
Takkha akamo li chongkajuimak ngai murruolsiak ah inphut taanro; khawa khachu ahekna-ah insuolna eii, itikha nang-in najet.
Pumi suok inkhat sik-ah, nang mi le insuol emaro. Nangchu mi rakip diang riangwai kanei, akatha, kadeiraat ocha inkhat kha na-esik eii.
Ni-inhalpui ngaikha malung kadaiya namintuunsik eii, ajarchu Pathian in inmani diang malung thuulnasik aphakacha apesik eii halli akatuun kha inhongjetsik eii.
Halli ama'n alungdou minjui sik tia isur ngaikhan inlungsing hongsuokta Seitan chaangnga inphut inheisuoksik eii.
Ajuohekna sik nikhuo ngai khanchu intakthei pha la-esik eii tihi ngaidonro.
Mi ngai'n intheinuo sik, saak-inraam, in-or, khat-um atheinuo ah inriltha, miminjakna, nulepa chongkajuimak, thopiman kajetmak, biaklam kajuimak;
inmani mi minriang kajetmak, riangwai kajetmak mikarilse, insuol-inseii halli chikaom in-esik eii; inmani'n akatha kha inmatirsik eii;
kathamak palaak katho, chuon ka-uoimak, halli in-or khan kasip in esik eii; Pathian neek-ah taksa hoina khan kheella kamanuom;
halli tuol tiangnga eini biaklam kajui omchan katho, takkha khawa inthiangtak ranak khachu inmani'n kazootmak inlahong omsik eii. Hiwa ka-ang mi ngaidiangnga inphut taandelro.
Inmani lekkhat in mi ngai inna inluut-ah manuomna rakip in ruoinarei iruoijei halli inleitho manu ngai'n minpoongnga kaom akasuol numeisa ngai insurra inlei-ompui,
numeisa ngai'n akadik kha apha rakip-ah jetnasik inleitho takkha akadik kha supjet leijet matormu.
Jannes le Jambres in Moses diang inzoot makthei angnga, malung kaziingjei khat-um ngamna jarra kasuoljei hiwa mi ngai innum akadik kha zootmu,
Takkha Jannes le Jambres chungnga kasuok angnga, mi rakip in angtuk inmani inmome tikha inlamusik eii. Inmani akalaak simator nunu.
Takkha nangchu karingkhuo ah kingaidon, kaomchan, halli kanaminchuna ngaikha naheijuijei; halli ka-inngamna, kakhaang raatna, kaminriangna, kadei raatna,
kei kapoongna khat-um karaalna ngaikha naheimujei. Antioch ah, Iconiumma, Lystra ah chikaom poongna kei'n kiheidei, omchan kasuok rakip nang in najet! Takkha khawa ngai rakip ah inphut Pumi'n kei anasanjei.
Christa Jisu le inruoiya inchunna suungnga pathian ringkhuo ah karing kamanuom mi rakip poongraal inmusik eii.
halli mi kathamak ngaile katha omchan katho ngaikhan inmani maleisei intho inta halli mileiilak ngai kha-um maleisei inminthosik eii, akase in ena-ah inphut kheella kase in esik eii.
Takkha nangsik achu, akatuun kha nalei inchu jei halli na-inngamna khan kacheet-ah omtaro. Ajarchu nakaru ngai kha tu ngai in-eme nang in najetjei;
halli nasiinlaiya inphut singna kanape mator Christa Jisu ngamna jarra sanminringna katung nakaruoi Chong Inthiang nijetjei kha nang in ngaidonro.
Ajarchu Chong inthiang rakip hi Pathian phuuksaan khanna eii, akatuun kha minchunasik, akamasial kha rakooknasik, akatuunmak kha mintuunnasik, halli akadik ringkhuo minchuna jarra nemna kaom kha eii.
Khawajarra Pathian sepa katho mi khan chuon katha rakip thonasik ah rahoi kasuok khat-um puikatung enasik kha eii.
Akathi le akaring chongkatan sik Christa Jisu le Pathian maikuungnga kei'n nang riangwai tak-ah kinakoi eii: ajarchu ama reng angnga waikaroonsik alajuosik eii,
Apha e-innum emak innum Pathian chongkha rilro, minjetro, ranro, halli malung masokpiro, halli deiraatna rakiple inruoiya minchuro.
Ajarchu mi ngai'n chongkatuun kha inrangai zootmakpha alahongsik eii. Takkha inpumtak in inmanuom kha jui inta halli inmani'n angme inrangaizoot karilpi ocha ngaikha kheel kheella inmanisik bit-ah inlakhoom chunsik eii.
Inmani'n akatuunna inphut inkuor mahei inta halli thiming maruo ngaikhan inmalung inminluutsik eii.
Takkha nangchu ajar rakip ah natheinuoa malung insurro; kapoong khaangro, Pathian suok inkhat na-ena nachuon rakip malarnasik Chong Katha karil inkhat na-ena chuon kha thoro.
Keisik achu ka-inpesuok nasik phadan ahongnaijei; hiwa ringkhuo hi kamathaan nasik kei sik-ah apha anaijei.
Kei'n ruolsiak kitaan kha katha-ah kataanjei, kei'n ahekna katung kha kataanjei, halli ngamna kha kaneijei.
Tuunchu matorna chuonthoman akatuun renglukhu kha kei sik-ah anangaak chak-ah omjei; khawa nikhuo khan chongtan katuun Pumi khan anapesik ejei. Khawa kha keisik bit emak, takkha ama juo-inlar nasik kha riangwai tak-ah kangaak rakip diang apesik eii.
Keidiang innot-ah naheiwa nasik nang sik-ah kathakhet kha thoro.
Ajarchu Demas in tuunlaiya nuoipilchung hi aminriangnga kei anamathaanna Thessalonica tiang asijei. Crescens in Galatia tiang asijei, halli Titus in Dalmatia tiang asijei.
Luke bitchu keile inruoiya omjei. Nang in Mark kha ratok inlang halli nang in ama kha hongruoiro, ajarchu ama'n kachuon hi anasan mator.
Tychicus chu kei'n Ephesus tiang katirjei.
Nang in nahongpha Carpus diang Troas ah kida kasongkol kalok khale larik ngai kha-um, halli kapoidoomma sawunna inbool larik ngai kha heichoiro.
Alexander thirkasutpa in kei anaminpoong theijei; ama'n angme itho dungjuiya Pumi'n athoman amaleiisik eii.
Ama chungnga nang natheinuoa insingtheiro, ajarchu eini chongril hi zootmak-ah araang theiya om.
Mansakhet-ah kei kapumtak ka-inngaak pha, tuteii kei sik-ah nangirpui mu, inraya-ah kei innataandel. Inmani chungnga Pathian in akathamak machulpi marase!
Takkha kei'n chong kha kariltung matornasik halli zaatlop rakip in chong kha injetnasik, Pumi khan kei anaompui halli keidiang ranak anapeya thina sik-ah inphut kei anasanjei.
Halli Pumi khan akathamak rakip ah inphut nasanta ama marwaan Rengramma kei anaruoisik eii, apha rakip ah ama lurna erase! Amen
Kei'n Priscilla le Aquila han Onesiphorus innsuung mi ngaidiang minpaak chong kanaheipeii.
Erastus in Corinthia ah aom jei, halli Miletus ah Trophimus ama ana jarra kei'n kaheidajei.
Phalbitha matiang heiwanasik nang ranak-ah thoro. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Claudia halli aleiilak Christian rakip ngai'n inmani minpaak chong innaheipeii.
Pumi'n naratha kha naompui pichak rase. Pathian riangwai khan nangni rakip diang naompui chak rase.
Paul, Pathian suok ka-eii khat-um Jisu Christa tirton um ka-eii. Pathian ikadang mi ngai ngamna kha kasansik khat-um eini biaklam in iminchu akadik khan inmani kakeiruoi sik-ah kei hi inakadang khat-um inatir kha eii.
Khawa khachu hektik kaboi ngamna ringkhuo jarra eii. Maleisei karilmak Pathian khan hiwa ringkhuo hi kanapesik eii tia manmasituol abool ma-ah chong inkhitna aneijei,
halli tuun ama'n imadan apha takkha heitung dungjuiya ama chongkha amalarra kei kutchungnga anapeii, halli eini Nakatanpa Pathian chongpeii nuoiya kei'n karil.
Eini le ngamna in-ang kasapa tak ka-eii Titus diang kei'n kimajia eii. Pa Pathian khat-um eini Nakatanpa Christa Jisu in riangwai khat-um kadai kha innapeii erase.
Kei'n nang kha tuiramma kaom Crete ah kanada, kanadana jarchu thosik kalaom chuon ngaikha amason kaomma naminhek nasik khat-um khuopui rakip-ah koisuok karoonsik upa ngaikha nabeii nasik kinada eii. Kei chongpeii ngaikha ngaidonro.
Koisuok karoonsik upa kha noonkuung kaboi mi esik eii; numei inkhatbit kanei mi esik eii, halli ama sangai kha Pathian kajet in-esik eii, lamkathuoi khat-um chongkajuimak sangai in-eii tia inril mi khan etheinuni.
Koisuok karoon upa kha Pathian chuon kathosik mi ejarra, ama kha noonkuung kaboi mi esik eii. Ama kha in-or emakli karaang innot echamak, ju inrui emakli miringkhat chungnga kut kamachun emakli sial kamanuom mi etheinuni.
Ama kha mi ngai kadonthei khat-um akatha kamanuom mi esik eii. Apum insur mator, kadik katho, inthiang khat-um nunchan katuun mi esik eii.
Ngamna kaom chongpui khat-um Pathian chong le injom chong ngaikha kacheet-ah amahuumsik eii. Hiwa lamma ama khan akadik minchuna khan mi ngaikha masok matorte halli akadik kazootmak mi ngaidiang nangni itho ngaikha dikmak tia minmu matorte.
Ajarchu akadik kazootmak mi katamtak inom, khawa ngai khachu aru ekhet-ah Judaism makheiya malung kaheithuul inmani ngai'n aleiilaak mi ngaidiang maleisei khat-um chongriam inril.
Inmani ngaikha chong minril maksik hi arei eii, ajarchu inmani ngai'n minchusik ka-emak ngaikha inminchu halli insuungkhur pumpui kha inminhaang, khawa ngai rakip kha jakna kaom inmani nemnasik sial loutheina kha inmin-eii.
Apumtak Crete mi ka-eii Pathian chongkachoi inkhat in aleiti: “Crete mi ngaihi maleisei kathobit kha in-eii, chikaom ramsa ngaikha in-eii, akatan khat-um mahaam kalian mi ngaikha in eii.”
Hiwa sakhi hi adik, hiwa jarra nang in inmani ngaikha akadik ngamna kha inmunasik-ah kana tak-ah narakooksik eii,
khawa nirakook khan inmani ngaikha Jihudi ngai thiming khat-um akadik kazootmak ngai'n inbool sinadan ngaikha inmathaansik eii.
Inthiang mi ngai diangchu angrakip inthiang; takkha inthiangmak khat-um ngamna kaneimak mi ngai diangchu angrakip achok. Ajarchu inmani kase katha jetna khat-um ngaidonna ngai kha-um achokjei.
Inmani ngai'n Pathian kinjet inti, takkha inchuon thokhan zootmak. Inmani ngaikha matir kaom khat-um chong kajuimak in insip, akatha kathosik-ah iteii rahoi emu.
Takkha nangchu akadik minchuna khale inzootna ngaikha nang in naminchusik kha eii.
Upa ka eii pasal ngai'n inlermaru, khoya kaomtak-ah omru, ningpum insurru; ngamna khan cheetru, minriang kacheet eru khat-um kadei karaat eru ti-inlang minchuro.
In-angrip-ah numeisa upa ngaikha inthiang ringkhuo nunchan kapoiya ringru ti-inlang minchuro. Inmani ngaikha mi karilsemak khat-um theibomju inruimak in-esik eii. Takkha akatha kaminchu kha in-esik eii,
ajarchu numeisa khangdoong ngaidiang inruothar khat-um insa ngaikha minriangru,
inpum insurru khat-um inthiangru, halli inruothar ngai nuoiya kaom nupuinu eru, ti-inlang michuro, khawa e-inchu tuteii inkhat innum Pathian chongkha kathamak-ah rilnunu.
In-angrip ah pasal khangdoong ngai-um inpum insurnasik ah masokro.
Ang rakip-ah nangni ningpum tak-in akatha chuon tho-inlang juisik kha eru. Nangni minchuna khan ningmalung minluutru khat-um dingtak min-eru.
Kheetsik kaommak akadik chong ngaikha inliingnaru, ajarchu nangni inhalpui mi ngaikha'n eini jarra akathamak iteii rilsik inmumakli injakkha erasu.
Suokngai khan inkaru ngai nuoiya omrasu halli ang rakip-ah inkaru ngai malung mintairasu. Suok ngai'n inkaru ngaidiang chong saanmarusu
emakli inmani diang makheiya maruupmarusu. Khawa rathuulla, ang rakip-ah inmani'n Pathian eini Nakatanpa minchuna kha inminlur nasik-ah, inmani'n apha rakip-ah akatha khat-um ngamna kaom kin-eii tikha minmurusu.
Ajarchu Pathian kha'n ama riangwai kha miring rakip sik-ah sanminringna eii tia amalarjei.
Khachu riangwai kha'n Pathian kajetmak ringkhuo khat-um manmasituol ringkhuo kha mathaantru, halli ningpum insurru, akatuun khat-um Pathian kajet-ah hiwa manmasituolla karing eru tia anaminchu,
Inthang Pathian, Nakatanpa Jisu Christa kul ra-aangle kajuosik rawaan katha Nikhuo ka-ngaak ngaikha ni eii.
Akathamak rakip makheiya eini nakatan nasik halli ama mi khabit ka-eii khat-um akatha kathosik-ah kangaaklan inthiang mi ngai namin enasik-ah ama'n apum takkha eini sik-ah nanphalpi.
Hiwa ngaihi minchuro halli thomatorna ranak kha inliingna inlang masokro khat-um rakookro. Inmani tuteii inkhat innum nang kha kamo eii tia namumarusu.
Waikaroon ngaili thomatorna ranak kanei ngai nuoiya omru, inmani ngai itikha juiru halli ang rakip-ah akatha kathosik-ah inringchakru ti-inlang nang mi ngaikha minjettharro.
Tuteii chungnga kathamak rilmaru tipiro, khawa rathuulla mi rakiple inzootnaru khat-um sap eru, halli nunchan kadaikha mi rakip diang minmuru.
Apha inkhat-ah eini ngaihi akamo, chongkajuimak, akadikmak halli taksa hoina li taksa imanuom rakip ngai suok nilei eii. Eini akathamak khat-um kara-ot nilei eii; leiilaak mi ngai'n eini naleimatir halli eini'n inmani nileimatir.
Takkha Pathian eini Nakatanpa minriang khat-um athana kha juo-inlarpha khanchu,
ama'n eini nasanjei, eini'n akatha chuon nileitho jarra emak, takkha ama tak minriang nakhan ama'n eini narasuthiangnga naminneithar khat-um akathar ringkhuo kanapeii Ratha Inthiang diangnga inphut eini anasanjei.
Pathian in Ratha Inthiang kha eini chungnga insam omlekleiya Jisu Christa eini Nakatanpa diangnga inphut anajuobunpi,
ama riangwai jarra Pathian le inzootna khat-um eini'n ningamna kumsoot ringna kha niralaang matornasik eii.
Hiwahi akadik chong kha eii. Hiwa jar ngaihin nangni'n kalurdoomma ningngaidon kha kei'n kamanuom, ajarchu Pathian kangamnajei inmani'n chuonkatha ngaikha inmalung kaluut-ah inthonasik eii. Hiwa ngaihi mi rakip sik-ah akatha khat-um nemna kaomthei kha eii.
Takkha ka-am murruolsiak, pirui purui jarra, inseii khat-um Sinadan jarra insuol emaru, ajarchu khawa ngaikha arei kaboi khat-um nemna kaboi eii.
Inkhoithen kamasuok inmani ngai chungnga chong woikhat woini minchuro, halli aleimak inchu inloppui maro.
Khawa mi ngaikha akadikmak in-eii iti nang in najet, halli inmani itho inmanu khan inmani dikmu itikha inlar.
Kei'n nangdiang Artimas emakli Tychicus kaheitir phakhan, nang in Nicopolis ah kei koolla juonger nasik thoro ajarchu phalbi suungseng khawakhan omsik itihi kei'n kangaidon suojei.
Nang in nithotheiseng tho-inlang dankathei Zenas khat-um Apollos kha insinasik lamma arei kaom rakip kha penasik thoro.
Arei ka-eii ngaikha inmunasik halli nemna kaboiya inringmaknasik eini mi ngaikha akatha kathosik-ah inmalung kaluut kha inchurasu.
Keile kaomsuom mi rakip ngai'n nangdiang minpaakna chong kinnahong minchoi. Einile ngamna kaneisuom mi rakip diang keini'n minpaakna chong kinhongmalar ti-inlang nang in leitipiro. Pathian riangwai kha nangni rakip chungnga omrase.
Paul, Christa Jisu sik-ah mikhumna ah kaom khat-um einile ulenai ka-eii Timothy inmani inni'n, einile sap ka-eii khat-um nichuon thopui Philemon diang,
halli ninainu Apphia diang khat-um einile raalmi ka-eii Archippus, han nang inna inchun koisuok ngaidiang:
Nipa Pathian khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa in nangnidiang riangwai li kadai kha inapeii erase.
Philemon, Kei'n Pathian kaniracham, kei'n nang sik-ah kani halli Pathian kha kaminpaak.
Ajarchu Pathian mi ngai rakip niminriang khat-um Pumi Jisu ningamna kha kei'n kajet.
Eini'n Christa diangnga nimu akatha phur rakip ngaihi inmani'n injetwiak nasik ranak-ah nang ngamna kha narilnasik-ah kei'n Pathian diang kani.
Minriang kaom Philemon, nang minriangna khan keidiang rokna angjet khat-um masokna kamujei, ajarchu nang in Pathian mi ngai malungkha naminrokjei.
Hiwasik jarra kei'n ranak kaneiya thosik kasuok hi thoro tiya Christa diang ulenai inkhat-ah chongpeii napethei eii.
Takkha Paul kei'n, Christa Jisu sik-ah chuonkatho, halli tuun Christa Jisu sik-ah mikhumna ah kaom ka-e innum, minriang jarra, kei'n nangdiang ngaidam kinani eii.
Kei'n mikhumna ah kaompha Christa diang kasapa kimin ejei Onesimus rathuulla kei'n nangdiang ngaidam kinani eii.
Aphakhat ama hi nangdiang nemna kaboi alei-eii, takkha tuunchu ama hi nang sik-um kei sik-um nemna kaomkha ejei.
Kamalung ka-ejei Onesimus hi nangdiang kei'n inlet-ah kiheitirnook ejei.
Kei'n chongkahoi jarra mikhumna ah kaomlaiseng kei kanasan sik-ah ama hi kakoolla nang rathuulla kadazoot.
Takkha nang izoot omlekleiya kei'n iteii thonuning, nazootmak pumma nitho elekleiya; khawa rathuulla nang in nazootli napum tak-in karok-ah nithokha kamanuom.
Onesimus apha bongkhat nangdiangnga inphut isikha apha rakip-ah nangdiang kaom enasik bit-ah kasuok kha eii.
Onesimus suok enunijei, takkha suok neek-ah katha kha eii. Christa diang minriang kaom unai kha ejei. Kei'n ama hi kaminriang takkha nang indoom ama hi suok inkhat-ah khat-um Pumi diang ulenai inkhat-ah naminriang doomsik eii.
Nang in keihi nachuon thopui inkhat-ah nanalei inchu, nang in kei nanadonsik angnga ama hi donthar nookro.
Ama'n nangdiang kadikmak khat-um intuol om-inchu keidiang na-ep ro.
Paul kei'n kakut tak-ah kimajia kha eii: kei'n kanathuulsik eii. Takkha nang ringkhuo ah keidiang ni-intuol hichu kei'n rilnuningjei.
Minriang kaom suopui, Pumi sik-ah hiwahi nathopi inlang Christa diang kamalung naminrokpiro.
Kei'n kimajiale inruoiya kana-ngamna, khachu kei itihi nang in thonate tia kingamnabit elekleiya nang in kheella thonate tia kalei.
Hile inruoiya kei omnasik-ah nang inna omna mun inkhat leiboolro ajarchu kei'n nangni koolla juonasik nangni'n Pathian ningni kha namasangjeiti tia kangamna.
Christa Jisu sik-ah keile mikhumna ah kaomsuom Epaphras in minpaakna chong anahongminchoi
halli khale in-ang rip-ah kachuon thopui Mark, Aristarchus, Demas khat-um Luke inmani innum minpaakna chong innahongminchoi.
Pumi Jisu Christa riangwai kha nangni rakip chungnga kaom kha erase.
Tiallaichu, Pathian chongkachoi ngai diangnga inphut amun angjet khat-um alam angjet-ah Pathian in nipi-nipu ngaidiang aleiril,
takkha hiwa ajuohekna nikhuoni ngai hinchu Asapa diangnga inphut eini na-inbiak puijei. Pathian in Asapa diangnga inphut nuoipilchung hi abool, halli ahekna-ah Pathian in ikadang ama kha angrakip mapu amin ejei.
Ama'n Pathian poina ra-ang kha ejei, halli Pathian tak omchan rathuul kha ama ejei, ama ranak neina chong khan manmasituol pumpui mahuumma aleida. Miring rakip manu ngai ngaidamna apesuoli, Ranak Kaneikhet Pathian changtiang marwaan khan ama in-ongjei.
Sapa kha marwaan tirton ngai neek-ah aminlok, halli Pathian in inmani ngai diangnga ipe raming neek-ah kalok kha amadiang apejei.
Ajarchu Pathian in ama marwaan tirton ngai inkhattak diang-um, “Nang Kasapa na-eii; awini kei Napa ka-ejei.” leitimak. Emakli Pathian in marwaan tirton inkhattak diang, “Kei ama Pa ka-esik eii, halli ama Kasapa esik eii,” timak.
Takkha Pathian in Asapa salutir kha nuoipilchungnga ajuotir siktiang, ama'n ati, “Pathian marwaan tirton rakip in ama kha chubei inthosik eii.”
Takkha Pathian in marwaan tirton ngai jarra hintia aril, “Pathian in ama marwaan tirton ngaikha ratha ngai amin-eii, khat-um ama suok ngaikha meimachuon amin-eii.”
Takkha Pathian in Sapa jarra hintia aril: “Narengram kha, E Pathian, hektik-kaboi esik eii! Nang in nami ngai chungnga katuunna wai naroonsik eii.
Nang in katuun kha namanuom halli katuunmak kha namatir. Khawajarra Pathian, Napathian in nang kha anakadangjei halli nasap ngai diangnga ipekha neek-ah kheella kayana kalok kahoi kha nangdiang anapejei.”
Ama innum aril, “Pumi, nang in, inphutna-ah nuoipil nabool, halli nakuttak in marwaan ngaikha nabool.
Inmani rakip lamangsik eii, takkha nangchu mangnutin jei; inmani rakip kha puondiar ngai angnga amaruosik eii.
Nang in inmani kha songkol inchuol angnga nathepsik eii, halli inmani kha puondiar angnga inthuulsik eii. Takkha nang chu pha rakip-ah inthuul makche, halli naringkhuo um angtikniteii heknuni.”
Pathian in ama marwaan tirton ngai inkhattak diang: “Kei'n nangni inhalpui ngaikha nakeii nuoiya naketouna kamin emak laiseng, kachangtiang hin in-ongro” leitimak.
Hanle, marwaan tirton ngai ang in-eme? Inmani ngaihi Pathian sepa katho halli sanminringna kamusik ngai kasansik ah ama'n ijuotir ratha ngaikha in-eii.
Khawajarra eini anakeisuo maknasik, nijetjei akatuun rakip kha kacheet doomma nimahuumsik ejei.
Marwaan tirton ngai'n eini nipi-nipu ngai diangnga inleipeii chongpui kha adik tia inlar, halli hiwa chong kajuimak li karangaimak inmani'n rahoikasuok rachaakna kha inmu.
Khawajarra hituk-ah sanminringna kalok inkhat kha eini'n iteiiya ningaidon mak inchu, eini angtho thoa nitaan matorsik me? Pumi apumtak in mansakhet-ah sanminringna hi arilsuokjei, halli ama iril kajet ngaikhan einidiang khawakha adik tia inrilcheen.
Khawapha takkhan Pathian in ama sakhi ngaikha chuon-inlak khat-um ngakkaom rakip ngai inthona khan inmani diang athunpidel halli ama lungdou dungjuiya Ratha Inthiang kutchoi ngaikha aleisempi.
Eini'n nirilla niom akahongsik akathar manmasituol waikaroon sik-ah marwaan tirton ngaikha Pathian in ida emak.
Khawa rathuulla, Chong-inthiang munkhat-ah hintia aril: “E Pathian, miring ngaihi ang in-eyame nang in inmani ngaisik hituk ni-ngaidonpi; miring ngaihi ang in-eyame nang in inmani ngai ni-ensui?
Nang in inmanikha marwaan tirton ngai neek-ah lekkhat katadet-ah nabool; nang in lurna khat-um kayana kha inmani naminkhu,
halli inmani kha angrakip chungnga waikaroon namin eii.” Hinthoa ati khachu Pathian in “angrakip chungnga waikaroon sik”; inmani kha abool, hiwahin angrakip inthiangnga incheljei. Takkha miring ngai'n tuunhin angrakip chungnga wai inroon chu eini'n lamumakmi.
Jisu hi aphakhat sik bit-ah marwaan tirton ngai neek-ah matadet-ah ida kha eini'n nimu. Khachu Pathian riangwai jarra miring rakip sik-ah ama'n anathipijei, thina kha aleidei jarra kajana le lurna renglukhu inkhu ama kha tuunchu eini'n nimujei.
Sapa katamtak in ama lurna kha inchang theinasik angrakip kabool khat-um kada Pathian bit in matorna aneiya, Jisu poongna khan pui mintungjei. Khawajarra Jisu kha inmani ngai sanminringna sik lamkakeipa kha eii.
Ama'n mi ngaikha inmanuwa inphut aminthiang, halli i-minthiang rakip ngaile Pa inkhat bit innei suomjei. Khawajarra Jisu'n inmani kha ama innsuungmi eii tia kakoisik injakmak.
Ama'n Pathian diang ati, “Kei'n kami ngaidiang angme nang in nitho kha karilsik eii; Kei'n inmani ngai intuupna khan kanaminpaak sik eii.”
Ama'n hi-um aril, “Kei'n Pathian diang ka-inngamnasik eii.” Halli ama'n hi-um arilnok, “Pathian in kei diangnga inape naipang ngaile Kei hin kaom.”
Takkha miring taksa khat-um thisen karoon mi ngaikha ama'n inmani kha naipang ngai tia ileikoi angnga, Jisu amatak um inmani kapuo inkhat hong eya, miring omchan ahonglei. Halli athina jarra ama'n thina chungnga ranak kanei Seitan kha aminmang thei nasik hiwahi ama'n itho eii,
halli thina kha inchi jarra inringkhuo ah suok kachang ngaiseng kha hinthoa amasuojei.
Ajarchu hiwahi inthiang eii khachu ama'n marwaan tirton ngaikha isan emak. Khawa rathuulla, Abraham tu-suon ngaikha ama'n isan eii.
Hiwa tinachu mi ngai manu ngaikha rangaimidam nasik, ama'n Pathian sepa thona-ah Thiampu kaliankhet minriang kasip le ngamna kaom enasik, alam rakip ah ama mi ngaile in-angnasik eii.
Halli ama tak-um matheemna alei-intongpui halli poongraalna kha aleidei, khawajarra tuunchu matheemna ah kachul ngaikha ama'n asan matorjei.
Pathian in ikoi, Christian ulenai ngai! Pathian ijuotir Thiampu Kaliankhet ningamna-ah nirilsuok Jisu kha eini'n ngaidonru.
Pathian innsuung pumpui sik-ah Moses kha achuon katho ngamna kaom angnga ama chuon katho sik-ah kakadangpa Pathian diang Jisu hi ngamna kaom eii.
Innkasak mi inkhat kha khawa inn kha neek-ah khoya intho angnga, khawa angnga Moses neek-ah Jisu kha kheella khoya thosik rahoi asuok.
Inn rakip hi, tu ka-ang mi inkhat in isak eii, takkha angrakip ngai kabool chu Pathian kha eii.
Pathian innsuungnga Moses hi suok inkhat eya ngamna kaom alei eii, halli Pathian in nuktiangnga arilsik ngaikha ama'n aleiril.
Takkha Sapa khan Pathian innsuung iroon angnga Christa hi ngamna kaom kha eii. Eini ningaidonna khan kacheet-ah inngamna khat-um ni-in-orpuiya ahekna katung nimahuum inchu, eini ama innsuung mi kha ni-ejei.
Ajarchu, Ratha Inthiang in iril angnga, “Awini nangni'n Pathian rasa ningjet inchu,
ningpi-ningpu ngai'n Pathian inhalpui angnga, malung minngar maru, inmani'n khawani neelramma ama kha in-ensin angnga.
Khawa khan inmani'n kum soommili kachuontho inmu innum, kei hi ensuinale enminna innaleinei, Pathian in ati.
Khawajarra kei'n khawa mi ngai chungnga karaangnga kati, ‘Inmani'n apha rakip-ah kayana naneimu halli kei kachongpeii ngaikha juimu.’
Kei karaang halli chong-inkhitna inkhat kaneijei: ‘Kei'n inmani diang kapesik soongmachumna ramkhan inmani'n angtikniteii luutkhai marasu!’ ”
Ulenai ngai, akaring Pathianna inphut nangni tu inkhat nuktiang kirmak nasik, khatuk malung kathamak khat-um kangamnamak nangni karra ommak nasik insingtheiru.
Khawa rathuulla, ning karra tu inkhat um manu matheemna khan ningchulmak nasikle malung kangar ninghong emak nasik, “Awini” inti nikhuo hi omlaiseng nangni inkhatli inkhat nisuo-ah insanru.
Ajarchu eini'n inphutni makheiya ninngamna kha ahekni katung kacheet-ah ninmahuum tit inchu, eini niraya-ah Christa le tum kachangsuom ngaikha ni-ejei.
Chong-inthiang iril kha hi eii: “Awini nangni'n Pathian rasa ningjet inchu, ningpi-ningpu ngai'n Pathian inhalpui angnga malung minngar maru.”
Pathian rasa kajet-ah ama inhalpui mi ngaikha tu ngaime? Moses in Egypt makheiya iheiruoi inmani rakip ngaikha in-eii.
Kum soommili Pathian in iraangpui ngaikha tu ngai khame? Manu inthoa neelramma kathi mi ngaikha in-eii.
Pathian in ama chong-inkhitna anei phakhan, “Inmani'n angtikniteii kei'n inmani diang kapesik soongmachumna ram kha hongluut theinunu”—iti kha tu ngai diangnga irilme? Tu ka-ang chongkajuimak ngai diangnga iril eii.
Inmani'n inngamnamu jarra khawa ramkha leiluut matormu, tihi eini'n nimu.
Tuunchu ama'n ileiril soongmachumna kha eini'n nimu nasik Pathian in einidiang chong-inkhitna kha anapejei. Khawa soongmachumna chong-inkhitna kha nangni tu ka-ang inkhat innum muleiya ommak nasik, eini insingthei inlang omrui.
Ajarchu inmani'n inleijet angnga, eini innum Chongkahoi kha nijetjei. Inmani'n chongkha inleijet, takkha inmanisik khawa kha anemna leiommak, ajarchu inmani'n khawa injet phakhan ngamnale inruoiya leiralaangmu.
Eini akangamna ngai'n Pathian chong-inkhitna soongmachumna kha nimujei. Ama ileiti angnga, “Kei karaangnga chong-inkhitna inkhat kaneijei: ‘Inmani'n angtikniteii kei'n inmani diang kipe soongmachumna ramkha hongluut theinunu!’ ” Ama'n nuoipilchung aboolni makheiya inphut achuon minhek innum hiwahi iril eii.
Ajarchu nisari huuina jarra Chong-inthiang munkhat ah hiwahi aril: “Pathian in achuon rakip-ah inphut nisari huuini soong machum.”
Hiwa jartak hi aril nook-ah: “Inmani'n angtikniteii kei'n inmani diang kapesik soongmachumna ram kha luutnunu.”
Tu ka-ang mansakhet-ah Chongkahoi kajet ngaikhan inngamnamak jarra soongmachumna kha ralaangmu, khawa soongmachumna kha kamusik izootpi lekkhatchu inom.
Hiwa malaarna khachu, “Awini,” inti nikhuo inkhat kha Pathian in inthiangnga aminsuuk ah ida eii. Kum angjet suoa ama'n Chong-inthiangnga kaom kha aleiya David diangnga ileiril kha angnga: “Awini nangni'n Pathian rasa ningjet inchu, malung minngar maru.”
Joshua in Pathian chong-inkhitna soongmachum kha mi ngaidiang aleipe inchu, Pathian in leiilak nikhuo jarra rilkhainuni jei.
Khawa e-innum, nisari huuini Pathian in soong machum angnga, Pathian mi ngai soongmachum nasik alakaom eii.
Ajarchu Pathian in ama chuonna inphut soong machum angnga, tu ka-ang in Pathian soongmachumna kamu ngaikhan inchuonna inphut soong inmachumsik eii.
Khawajarra soongmachumna kha nimunasik eini'n akatha kha thorui, inmani inngamna asiin jarra inluutmak angnga eini tu inkhat um kaluutmak emui.
Ajarchu Pathian chong kha akaringchak le chuon kathochak, chemriam inni indou neek-ah kangei, ratha li malung inchunna, ru le ruthing injomna katung inthuuk ah ka-aat mator. Halli malung ngaidonna le manuomna ngaikha akathenkhoi mator kha eii.
Pathian diangnga inthup matorsik iteii ommak; ibool rakip ama maikuungnga inlar khat-um inlongnga kaom eii. Halli amadiang eini rakip nipumtak-ah nitho chuon jarkha nilape ngersik eii.
Khawajarra eini'n nirilsuok ngamna kha kacheet-ah ma-ourui. Ajarchu Thiampu Kaliankhet inkhat Pathian omna katung kasi Jisu, Pathian Sapa kha eini'n ninei.
Eini Thiampu Kaliankhet khan eini nisuolna ngaikha kanajetpimak kha emak. Khattiang nitili, eini angnga alam rakip-ah matheemna intongpui, takkha manu kathomak, Thiampu Kaliankhet inkhat kha eini'n ninei.
Khawajarra riangwai omna, Pathian reng in-ongna munkhan kachi omleiya nairui. Khawakhan eini'n minriang kha nimusik eii khat-um eini sik-ah arei ompha eini kanasansik ah riangwai kha nimusik eii.
Ajarchu thiampu kaliankhet rakip hi, inmani rathuulla Pathian sepa kathosik, kutchoi ngai kapesik khat-um manu dooiphur ngai kape sik-ah inmani karra inkadang eii.
Ama tak-um alam angjet ah asuol jarra, kamo li akamasial ngaidiang ama malung kadaiya inbiakpui mator.
Halli ama tak-um asuol jarra, mi ngai manu dooiphur bit kape eleiya ama apumtak manu sik-um apesik eii.
Tu inkhat in thiampu kaliankhet inkhat eya khoya inthonasik atheinuo ah indangmak. Aaron ikoi angnga, mi inkhat kha Pathian in akoi libit thiampu kaliankhet in-eii.
Khawale in-ang rip-ah, Christa khan apumtak in thiampu kaliankhet inkhat achangna khoya kha inthomak. Khawa rathuulla, Pathian in amadiang ati, “Nang kasapa na-eii; awini kei napa ka-ejei.”
Ama innum munleiilak inkhat ah ati, “Nang thiampu Melchizedek mason dungjuiya kumsoot-ah thiampu na-echak sik eii.”
Kathiya inphut ama kasanring mator, Pathian diang Jisu'n nuoipilchungnga aringlai, mitrathi sarra inringnga kheek-ah ama'n nina khat-um chana aleinei. Ama malung kadai khat-um Pathian kangamna ejarra, Pathian in ama nina kha aleijetpi.
Takkha ama Pathian sapa e-innum, ama poongraalna khan chongkajui enasik ama'n alei-inchu.
Ama puikatung inmin-epha, tu ka-ang ama chongkajui rakip sik-ah hektik kaneimak sanminringna akuung kha ama hong-ejei,
halli thiampu Melchizedek mason dungjuiya Jisu kha thiampu kaliankhet ejei tia Pathian in amalarjei.
Keini'n hiwa jarra rilsik tamtheichu om, takkha nangnidiang rilmincheensik chu intak, ajarchu nangni kajet hi ning-insuum.
Nangni hiwapha hinchu ocha ngai ekacha ning-ejei, takkha nangni Pathian chongpui mansakhet inchusik kha-um kanaminchusik mi inkhat arei ninglaminom. Burum kabak sik rathuulla, tuunkatung nangni ranutui ka-insik ningla-eii.
Tu ennum tuunkatung ranutui laka-in kha, akatha li akase iteii lakajetmak naiteii kha ala-eii.
Khattiang nitili, burum kabak hichu akatha li akase inni karra kakhoithen mator upa ngaisik eii.
Khawajarra mansakhet-ah inchusik Christian chongpui kha nuktiang da-inlang, puikatung minchuna tiang eini songrui. Eini'n Pathian diang ngamna kha nimathaan li anemna kaommak chuon ngaikha thona sik-ah lam boolmui;
baptize jarra minchuna halli kut duongpina jarra; kathi hongringna jarra khat-um hektik-kaommak chongtanna jar ngaihi eii.
Eini matiang khan songrui! Pathian izootkha e-inchu, hiwahi eii eini thosik kha.
Ajarchu ininngamna kamathaanjei tu ka-ang mi ngaikha angtho thoa woikhat malung minlet-ah heiruoikir mator sikme? Inmani apha khat-ah Pathian warra inomjei; inmani'n marwaan kutchoi kha inleimintemjei halli Ratha Inthiang tum kha-um inleiralaangjei.
